NnEuRu1s6iMe3Hd_PQIFEA.text: Excellent NY Style Pizza!  Very good appetizers, especially the mushrooms. Every ingredient even the salads use only the very best. The service was also very strong. Highly recommended, they do deliver.

7f9dNRCOoUMFW1oo0Arx_g.text: I have eaten at Biaggios a couple times but I have to say their food maybe average but definitely very over priced. I ordered chicken finger my order came with 3 pieces and no fries so I ordered a side if fries they were $4 and I was do unimpressed $15 dollars later for this tiny meal i will not go back.

944nlcEexiVO0Silgk7fdw.text: Just had dinner here. Really good. I ordered a Supreme small minus the green peppers. Because who eats green peppers on pizza?! Anyways - very tasty and I will return. Only one unisex bathroom but that didn't effect the food at all. The gentlemen behind the counter appeared to be owners or what have you. They seemed to be enjoying their jobs and smiling even tho they were busy. That kinda charm I always tend to notice. Great little shop you have there!

yUoTCktjcwHm2pqjwUzMOw.text: I accidentally happened upon this pizzeria while stopping for the Snow Ono shaved ice truck in the parking lot. What an amazing find. I can't begin to describe how fresh all the ingredients were!! We had a Italian Stromboli, the pepperoni had just the right spicy bite w/o the heartburn, onions were sweet to contrast the strong mozzarella that had the perfect cheesy taste, salami was deli fresh, crust was perfectly crunchy, neither soggy or burnt. Simply amazing!!! Please try!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme with roasted tomatoes &amp; spinach. Yum!!

AFRbk8yfe2ypskOradua_A.text: Best pizza and service ever! The marinaded tomatoe and Ricotta cheese pizza is full of flavor and delicious to the last bite! They will make a pizza or salad any way you like, and they want you to be happy with what you get.  Biaggios is truly a home away from home!

mOyd5ckgtgLbwFjfHPh47Q.text: 2nd Review  My boss was craving for some pizza and so I suggested she ate some Biaggio's Pizzeria.  Without hesitation, she gave me her card and ordered the $5.95 two slices of pizza and a drink.  Since I was flying, she said she was buying.  I couldn't wait to try out the pizza's since the last time I wasn't feeling well so I couldn't enjoy the food as much as I wanted to.  My boss also was craving for some garlic bread and ordered that as well.  Mr. Biaggio was really nice and remembered me from the last time I visited.  It's really impressive how he remembers his customers.  It's rare to find an establishment like this.  The last time I felt warm and fuzzy in a restaurant was in BFG Chicken Strips.  But that's a different review in itself.  I finally got my mouth around the pizza and mmmm mmmm mmmmmmmmmmmm, I realize what my boyfriend meant when he said it tasted so good.  Also, what tasted even better was their garlic knots.  The heavenly taste was just "To Die For!"  Mr. Biaggio you definitely have the right words when you describe your heavenly creations.  After work I decided to treat my boyfriend to Biaggio's Pizzeria and he decided to get the meat lover's pizza while I chose the spaghetti with two meatballs.  The combination of the sauce with the meatballs with the spaghetti sauce tasted like an atom bomb.    I am definitely a fan and will order only their pizza from now on.  Thanks for an awesome heavenly pizza experience Mr. Biaggio.  :)

5nHPDI-dy-UoIGmwSEckGg.text: Great food! The best Philly steak in years !! The service was amazing and felt very welcomed with his hospitality and well made food!! I will Definately be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pizza pizza... Yumm

agHS76XrNzdz6VMEI2fxew.text: Best gluten free pizza EVER! I have loved on Vegas for 4 years and always saw this place as it is literally across the street from the entrance to my neighborhood but never tried it as I have Celiacs Disease. One day while family was in town everyone wanted pizza so we tried it out. To my suprize they had gluten free pizza and it was the best I have ever eaten. I have tried numerous gf pizzas in vehas to include Mark Rich's which was gross, BJs also gross and CPK ( they no longer make gf crust)  Biaggio and his business partner are the nicest people and genuinely care about the quality of the food served. If you go and don't like it they will make it right.   What are you waiting for? Go try it and tell them Brittany sent you!

1SGUDxNv8HHKeM6lTfTSTw.text: I'm so glad we finally decided to try Biaggio's.  The reviews don't lie, great pizza.  I repeat, great pizza.  And the owner is totally friendly, hands on and obviously wants to ensure his continued success. Will be back for sure!

Jc4GIyJemkNm6bxVUFA2TA.text: We came in for lunch. It was really good food. Garlic knots are the BOMB!!!!! We will come back for sure. Service was good too.

6pIiWJNNZsDaErE2ICoQSQ.text: We have tried almost everything on the menu and have never been disappointed. We eat here at least once a month. The food is always fresh and the service is second to none. My favorites are the meat lovers pizza and the veggie salad. On the off chance your food is not 100 percent to your satisfaction, let them know and they WILL make sure you leave happy. They really are all about the customers here.

l5Nj1iCUQDdws2N1nMQtRQ.text: What an amazing place! We used them at our school for the Obstacle Run and Biaggio's brought the best pizza and the salad was SO tasty! We will use them every time we can! Thanks Biaggio! You are the best!

7Ga5s_wcv5epf0s7w8PeTw.text: Awesome service, pizza and great wings! Always have my order ready when I pick it up! The owner is always welcoming and professional. He even knows me by name when I come in! You'll know him when you come in, he's the shaved, young and handsome guy! Thumbs up for me.

G-H1JfwrWVcBSirbHbcrEQ.text: Ordered a pickup pizza and was STOKED to come on and see the Lakers game on as it is! Was welcomed with a hello from the owner, Biaggio himself, and felt the friendly greeting immediately. Upon leaving after a brief conversation at the register he told me and my buddy to take a couple bars of ice cream as a complement to our pizzas.   Everything is QUALITY. From the ingredients down to the customer service (not to mention the team selection to play on TV ), biaggios can't go wrong in any aspect!   ps. I've had all the best pizza spots in town from Rocco's, to Secret Pizza, to Detroit pizza and *confidently* I say Biaggio's tops em all. 2 thumbs up.

jdFz03ps9SgWSae5FBCbmQ.text: Great pizza,  the pizza crust was nice and toasty. Great service.  Wings are really crispy and delicious.

FeCQoAt-vNzB1TixshSV6w.text: We came here because we read the reviews on their yelp, either ppl we're lying so we have way different taste!!.... Their chicken wings were yum, and garlic knots were OK... But pizza, heck no, bad sauce, bad pepperoni  ---everything about the pizza was a disappointment Would I be back here? Prob not.

50x0QU0sQay4u64Ze2U0pA.text: Found this place thanks to Yelp. We ordered the Art of Chicken, a medium two topping, garlic knots, and a meatball parm sub. Everything was delicious and well cooked/baked. The garlic knots were outstanding and both pizzas were great. The meatballs were very well seasoned and huge! The menu is very well priced considering how good everything was. Biaggio (the namesake owner) was very friendly and came to check on us at least 4 or 5 times in the 30 minutes we were there. Great experience; we will be back.

nAtLFvqLHDbYqChMT7RpkQ.text: This is the 3rd time eating Biaggio's food and have yet to be disappointed.  Today my wife and I shared a Greek salad as well as a (highly recommended) Philly Cheesesteak sandwich.  I walked out about $20 lighter (not including tip) and had THE BEST Philly Cheesesteak evah!!   The meat was quality (no gristle) and the mushrooms were abundant.   Imagine a hot, grilled, cheesy, mushroomy, sloppy steak sandwich.  Very flavorful without the salt.  Both salad and sandwich prepared without onions at our request.  We always feel welcomed to this community-minded establishment.   We now consider ourselves regulars.

rpEVdBsDDQ4VFUnjCXdd3Q.text: Sunshine n White pizza r my fave!  Love to get the lunch special for 6$; 2 slices and u choose whichever with chicken, pepperoni whatever ur little hear desires and it comes with a big gulp sized drink! Normally end up taking a slice home with me! Staffs amazing!

q95pNmVrudLgAbSt24f-6A.text: Best meatball sub I've ever eaten! Bomb Cesar salad too. Mr. Biaggio himself served us and was a real treat.   You know it's good if he serves it to his own family. Location is off the strip but worth the trip. I highly recommend this place to anyone craving some good Italian food.

-bb_ZmyyvVVDd_IPlN_qYw.text: Came down for a home town visit and through a local radio show, heard about Biaggio's. We stop by for lunch and ordered the Calzone. I have to say it was the best we every had. It has so delicious. The sauce is to die for. We had the chance to meet Mr. Biaggio and hear a little bit about him and the pride he takes in preparing excellent italian food.  This is a restaurant we will always visit when we come back into town. Once you eat there, you will be hooked. This is a great place for wonderful italian food.

iwPPXoljGXbTbnOIdTYJsg.text: Was here on a perfect spring day in April.Excellent Pizza all around good crust, sauce and fresh flavor. Overall a great experience

R5jPNzUjcpdf3590Cke8dg.text: Love this place! Amazing pizza! Great people! Biaggio himself came over and chatted with us. He is a wonderful man! He even spoiled us with a free fried dough dessert because I'm pregnant.  My friend had a meatball parm sub that she loved. Definately check this place out and keep going back for more! Places like this with the whole package of great food, nice people, good prices... are few and far between!

OsD_-a8V24pVMYfqFqRVRw.text: OUT OF TOWNERS BEWARE! I am staying at Mandalay Bay and telephone ordered a pizza and garlic knots for delivery from Biaggio's. NO mention was made of ANY delivery charge but a $6.00 "Strip Delivery Charge" was included when the pizza was delivered. To add insult to injury they omitted the garlic knots. The only saving grace, and perhaps most important, the pizza was very good.  UPDATE: About 30 minutes after I posted this review I got a call from Biaggio's apologizing for my "experience" AND removing any and all charges. Even tho I said he should charge me for the GOOD pizza he said he wouldn't do that. Talk about making things right and then some! I had originally rated my experience 3 stars because of the overall experience. Based on the totally positive attitude Biaggo has displayed, not because of any refund, I'm upgrading my star rating. Yay, I am indeed a fan! Terrific response by a business.

bYVOze309_oiyKPMT2pF8g.text: From the moment you walk in you have a warm welcome and the best pizza ever. I am hooked not going anywhere else tomatoes so sweet got to try.

NLRTlZl-Rsd99WOxv8Fsog.text: I absolutely crave their Greek salad with grilled chicken!  It is a very generous portion and as fresh as it gets!  The dressing is amazing!  In fact, all their salads are extremely yummy!  I have enjoyed the chicken parmesan and their pizza is excellent!  Biaggio himself is warm, inviting and an excellent host!  You can count on the food to be fresh and delicious!

p8OKiA2WF9TNA5HcgSDazQ.text: This place is AWESOME!  The food is fantastic and Mr. Biaggio has to be the nicest man ever!  My husband and I have decided that this is the only pizzeria we wish to go to in the future!    I've tried several of the pies and they are all delicious! The garlic knots are amazing and so is the antipasto salad! The quality of the food and service make this pizza joint #1 in my book!

c90qqC3YKL59JX472MPw6Q.text: For weeks I've looking for pizza that I can't get at chain restaurants, and after reading informative and positive reviews, I decided to try Biaggio's.   I popped in Biaggio's in the morning and was greeted by the man himself! I ordered the New York pizza and two cannolis, He's super friendly; we ended up talking while I waited for my pizza. Every person that I talked to were cool    ;D  Dude, I gotta say that the pizza is spectacular in every way. Cheesy goodness!  ^u^  AND the cannolis. Holy hell were the awesome and best I've had. I think they add a little extra something to the dough (cinnamon??) that amp up the flavor, so it's no plain. The filling is great. Perfect dessert.  YUMMEE Next time I'll order more desserts, like their cookies.  Check out their site!   I enjoyed what I've eaten and will def go back. My #1 place for pizza and stuff, haha

JM58YvY8H70utyF0c4Oskw.text: Upon the recommendation of the fellow yelpers we came to have dinner at Biaggio's Pizzeria. We ordered the white pizza  (mozzarella, ricotta,olive oil,&garlic) it was one of the most amazing pizzas I have had in a very long time!! 3 thumbs up! The owner and the waiter were some of the nicest people I have ever met! Great customer service! If you're in Vegas you should definitely check this place out. It's a little off the beaten path but it wont disappoint. Definitely worth checking out!

RProWqAUENfor8r_Hh2QKA.text: Great !!!  Had the meat lover's stromboli.. It was HUGE!!  It was delicious!  The quality of the food is amazing there!  The dough he uses is to die for!!  My family and I love it!~  My husband had it for the first time last night and was super impressed... it takes alot to impress him !! Sad there are no more donuts :(  Those were amazing !!  Biaggio should look into making them !!

pFcfOaJ2NuhWJMcIAjZn1A.text: Always looking for decent NY-style pizza in Las Vegas, Biaggio's is the closest to the real thing as I've had in nearly 8 years here. Gorgeous thin, foldable crust accompanied our delicious pepperoni pizza. Will return for sure! Biaggio was warm and friendly, wishing me a happy new year and assured me if I didn't like it, he would make it right. No need, it was perfect pizza for us Biaggio, thank you!

9YawjfP664XuRQ5o_HQEIA.text: Awesome pizza. And the Ceasar salad great!  Te service was excellent! So happy we stopped here for this wonderful pizza.

QNe18-lVEwPhD-vs3V-f_Q.text: Had the opportunity to check this place out with my group the Las Vegas Pizza Posse this evening, had a GRRREAT experience. From the moment I walked in the door and was greeted by the smell of pizza in the air to the moment I was thanked for stopping in, it was total 5 star treatment. The pizza was delicious. The right mix of the prefect crust, the right amount of some very tasty sauce, some really good tasting cheese and topped with the just the right amount of toppings, and baked up to a nice golden brown. If your looking for something a little out of the ordinary try the "art of chicken" pizza it's delicious. I have to say the service here was fantastic, got to meet the owner Biaggio and he's very gracious, friendly and definitely understands the meaning of good customer service. I'd have to say this place makes it into my top 5 favorite pizzeria's in the Vegas area. Almost forgot, if your looking for the tasty little sweet treat for after your pizza try the zeppoles, our group got an order and they disappeared just like that. I had to get a second order to bring home.

BsmWu01WVjOTvmqlKs0OfQ.text: A friend of mine had his wedding reception here, and I was absolutely blown away.  Biaggio, the owner of the restaurant, personally catered the whole meal, and everything was perfect.  His wait staff was present but not overbearing, they didn't even flinch when a horde of seattlites requested coffees all around.  The best part was the food, though.  The salad that Biaggio made for us was a great combination of classic italian ingredients mixed with some of his own personal flair - The artichokes and dried tomatoes turned a good salad into a great one.  The stromboli was cooked to perfection, and the trio of meatball, pastrami, and chicken/artichoke covered the spectrum very well (though a veggie-only one might have been a good experiment as well).  The lasagna, though, completely blew my mind.  The sauce was rich and flavorful, the mozzarella was CLEARLY fresh, and the meatballs were spiced to perfection.  I would be a very large man if I had the chance to eat this every day.  The cannoli capped the evening out with a crisp, delicious shell and a cream that was surprisingly light.  Perfect way to end an evening.  The staff's energy was what truly gave this the last half star, though - Like I said before, Biaggio was engaging and informative during the whole dinner, and he really seems to pour his soul into the food he's making.  I should clarify - I'm not sure what the full extent of his daily menu is.  The food for the reception was obviously specially-ordered, but I don't know if you can expect it on a daily basis.

fDsl8EJUtgIt7j_AHkBy0g.text: I love this place. It's great for handouts and dine-ins. This place serves the best chicken wings and meatball dishes. I recommend trying their spaghetti and meatballs. The meatballs are homemade which makes it better! The chickens wings are fried and crispy to perfection!      The owner is awesome! He was very friendly with all the customers, even though he's alone most of the time. When you walk into this restaurant, you will definitely feel like your home. :)

qU8lUfmCbRgcRugxKuNXTA.text: Awesome pizza got to go back again! High on my recommend list of best Pizza joints to visit. The Pizza was great the service was awesome thumbs in my book!

akSN2-lLwzAF-VW7Ojhj1Q.text: I came here because of the high yelp review.  Unfortunately this restaurant is an example of yelp not working.  They repeatedly talked about yelp, and gave us free appetizers and gave us large pizzas instead of the mediums we ordered.  The pizza was not very good.   The crust was tough, the sauce was bland, and the cheese was of a low quality.  The garlic knots were made from the same dough as the pizza and as a result were not very good.  The people working there were really friendly, but friendly does not equal good pizza.  They should spend less time working on their yelp reviews and more time working on their recipes.

2MXNqx6l5hSJfjEdgu862A.text: What a great place! We found Biaggio's with the help of Siri (when we asked for best-rated pizza near us) and she suggested Biaggio's.  We didn't know what to expect when we pulled in since the parking lot and surrounding stores were empty, but when we walked in, there was a bustle in the air, laughter, and the sound of people having a good  time.  The man that greeted us with a smile and rose from the table to meet us ended up being Mr. Biaggio himself.  What a gracious host, I felt like I was in his home.  Our waitress was a delight, and we started our order with the garlic knots.. my boyfriend didn't like the last batch from Angelina's, so he was very skeptical.  The picture on the wall of the garlic knots got his attention and we ordered 2 orders (I love garlic bread!).. he ordered wings and then we got two separate pizzas, mine was the chicken with artichoke and olives.. I ordered with spinach instead of the chicken since I am a vegetarian and they were able to accommodate with a smile.  My BF ordered the Meat Lover's pizza and thought the meatballs were to die for.  The crust on our pizza was simple and delicious, bordering on flaky.. the color was even and cooked to perfection!  We even took pictures of our pizzas, they were so gorgeous.  And they tasted just as good!  Mr Biaggio sat with us for a while and was so very pleasant, even telling us some Italian cooking secrets (!).. (we love the carrot in the tomato sauce to reduce acidity) while he sat with us.  I got bad news by telephone while I was finishing dinner, and Mr. Biaggio even gave me a hug when I left.  How thoughtful and genuine.  What a dear man, I liked him very much.  There were lots of people who came and went for carry-out while we were there, so I know they are popular.. and they should be!!  Our experience was the BEST, and we will come back again and again!  Luckily for us, we live in the area, so we can get delivery!!!

aDn_0c6BENp7-U22GgYtsg.text: Yelp find:  We ordered the plain chicken wings and the garlic knots. Both were good, a little salty (I think most food not made at home is salty - I rarely use salt), but well prepared otherwise. The garlic knots were soft and warm and had the perfect chewy consistency.  The chicken wings were crispy/crunchy on the outside and tender on the inside.  The order was take-out, as we planned to have girls' night in. The order was easy to place, the food was exactly on time, and as soon as I entered I was greeted.  The place had several patrons who looked content.  I won't be ordering pizza (lactose - no thanks - they sprinkle the knots with a bit of cheese, but it is easy to pick off or ask them to leave it off), but the wings again - yes.

qmbEP97kJveYcGAy1wBsoQ.text: My husband, son and I truly enjoyed the service and food! Great Meatball sandwiches, chicken wings are delicious and the brownie cheesecake we had was amazing! Met the owner Biaggio he was very friendly and kind. The waitress was also a sweetheart! Loved this Place! We will be back!

7sWhLf4poQPB131uVEdh2A.text: One star because can't give 0 stars.   $21 for a large meats calzone. The thinnest lackluster calzone I have ever received. Way over priced for crap. $9 for 3 chicken tenders. Expected the largest meatiest tenders ever. Instead. Received paper thin microwave would have been better tenders. For $9 could have gotten a caniac combo at Canes and also received fries, Texas toast, coleslaw, six meaty tenders and a drink.   This place is a disgrace!  If you can't make a calzone or even serve a tender that is thicker than a piece of paper you shouldn't call yourself a pizzeria.   Never again will I waste money on this craphole again. Disappointing. Disgusting. Ripoff. Stay away!

0pSujMJ2EyXPxelJqGC5Uw.text: Great pizza for takeout. Love the veggie pizza and the meat lovers. Great crust, sweet tomato sauce. They are not skimpy on the toppings. Garlic knots were really really good. I also really loved the chicken wings with the hot sauce....my lips felt it for a while.  For take out and very decent prices (well at least compared to San Francisco prices) you cannot beat Biaggio's

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Gh_aKglyct6Wzo6Eau0DvQ.text: I had a calzone (or stromboli) - I don't know the difference delivered by Postmates.  Quality was excellent!   You can tell they use higher end products than most pizza places.  I for sure recommend.

8lG4hTPBIR9pQRmKuDo-VQ.text: First thank you for the kind hospitality when I visited you last Tuesday for lunch. I do not give away 5 stars lightly. I had a meatball sub and a slice of pizza. The meatball was out of this world good. Packed with flavor and excellent density with moisture through out.  The pizza was the best I have had in years. I have spent a lot of my career on the east coast and I would put this pizza against anything I have had there.   Thank you again and keep on making excellent food.

4RllAJV3JZ4ckkFl9dLlEw.text: Great place we found on Yelp. The pizza was awesome! The crust was crisp and soft at the same time. Great toppings without being overwhelming. Also a good salad. Excellent personal service.

XlJpUINvC5M4QjhRT_AaHQ.text: Gluten free Italian food is hard to find but there's numerous options here! Tried the gluten free ravioli and manicotti and both were excellent. Veggie pasta was also super fresh and tasty as an appetizer for 2. Will be coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free spinach ravioli and cheese manicotti

JE_D6YN_u7WKYRlJcvvxFg.text: Amazing interior. Amazing food. Very cool wall color and wall pictures. Seating is like your in Italy.

TLJcmMXxYPvez3mqOms07Q.text: We liked it here.  Friendly.  Not crowded.  Fair prices.

9Om4jIWvu6pfvwAu8fQOyg.text: Ordered a half white and half sausage/jalapenos pizza, white was good but a little flat in taste the sausage was amazing!  The zeppole were plentiful and delicious little pillows of love!  Yummy!!

6ZuW2HDmPAjBTUiaioHo1A.text: Wow. Fail. We used to order food with them a lot, particularly because I have celiac and they're known to be celiac safe.   Tonight we ordered - all from their specific Gluten Free Menu - gluten free chicken Parmesan, gluten free cheese ravioli, and a gluten free Caesar salad. Usually we get pizza.   Upon opening our food containers, the ravioli were not great but decent (and I hadn't had ravioli in years!) and the gf chicken Parmesan came with spaghetti. My boyfriend and I shared both items. After we were halfway through both dishes, we took the salad from the bag and saw that it had giant croutons on it. I even gave them the benefit of the doubt and thought those might be gluten free - until we called.   We were informed that they had messed up our order and the gf chicken Parmesan was supposed to come with gf ravioli; the spaghetti were never gluten free!! We were refunded but that doesn't make my stomach ache go away.   Please don't trust them if you have celiac. I'm really sick now just because they can't read and/or process orders right.  Never again, Biaggio. I hope the owner reads this so he can understand how serious celiac is. I work in food service, and if I served gluten containing food to someone with celiac I would be fired before I can say celiac! Very, VERY upsetting. Please don't come here. These people do NOT care about their customers.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Jc073n8WgJwURWsuO0nKmg.text: The positive hype is definitely about a local owned and run pizza shop that has great service, great food, and a clean establishment.  I had the chicken pizza which was fantastic. It was followed up with Zeppolis that were beyond explainable. I have been searching for this dish for years and haven't found anyplace that could make them as wonderful as Biaggios. They were fantastic to say the least.  I appreciate great service and great food, thank you Biaggio. It is nice to see owners take pride in their establishment and engage with their clients.

CtwEpCrx5XGKkyFZs2p1eQ.text: Ordered a pie a few days ago, just getting around to my review. Ordered a "meat lovers" pizza, was ready when they said it would be (pick up). Great crust, the meat choices were great... great pizza. The only downside was I was only gonna eat a few pieces... save some for the next day. Well, ate the whole pizza!! Loved it.

HSyW6gxEKguITFecPr92qQ.text: Ordered in on a rainy windy day, they accommodated our request for a half Hawaiian and half supreme pizza. Pizza is simple and tasty, not overloaded and droopy, crust is good! Zucchini circles were crisp and delicious. Thank you for the fast delivery!

LIlunv746cPgCp_yl_cCvw.text: My roommate bought a pepperoni pizza from this place and I didn't get to try it till the next day, but let me just tell you that it's soooooo gooood! It's more on the thin side type of pizza and it's kinda greasy but it's got that gooey cheese! The RANCH is AMAZING, and it's homemade!!!! I wish they sold their ranch in bottles!

SN5LvrMfbqTXCkUNuiSYXA.text: I went to this place thinking I could split a sandwich with my significant other. Instead we got something that looked nothing like what they advertised. You robbed me $12. I urge you to remedy this situation.

ZnccohNqPLAvgyldx4Woxg.text: I was trying to recreate a pizza experience I had at a different place. Saying to myself if I copy the ingredients and toppings surely the flavor will be similar right? Wrong. If I were starving and there was nothing else available to eat this pizza would be a godsend. Fortunately for me I am not starving unfortunately for me I ordered this pizza blah blah blah

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1wBiJw2R7ESLMGRK7rof8w.text: Moved here 8 months ago from New England and we haven't found "our" pizza place, until now!   Ordered delivery from here twice so far, and both times exceeded expectations.   Being able to order and pay online is awesome, it's the little things in life. They came sooner than they said they would both times. You pay a little more than other places, but it's obvious you're getting what you paid for. The ingredients are SO fresh, not greasy, and the crust is the best.   They have officially found a new loyal customer!

Iyja8L3YjDtqQUiXWY372g.text: Their pizza is good; I think the ingredients are high quality and fresh (I had a medium with pineapple and mushroom). Thankfully--it's definitely not cheap, so it's good to actually get your money's worth. The people working there are friendly, too. Definitely worth checking out.

YixVd6F4235tJac3t9p0LQ.text: I'm house sitting my best friend's house, and I was craving some pizza. After doing some research, I came across this gem. I've enjoyed some delish pizza in New York, and some crazy awesome cheesy pizza in Chicago (hello Giordano's), but NOTHING compares to the pizza I had tonight at Biaggio's. I ordered half and half of the Art of Chicken (artichokes, roasted tomatoes, olives and garlic) and the other half was the GEM: White Pizza which is mozzarella & ricotta cheese, olive oil, and garlic. Sure it sounds plain like you need a protein, but no. This is hands down the best BEST best pizza I have ever had. Although I enjoyed the Art of Chicken, I was kicking myself for not ordering a whole White Pizza. I'm a crust snob, and this crust was buttery and delicious. I seriously highly recommend!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Art of Chicken and White Pizza

CK4kzhVo191DILiXqlB5Vg.text: Pizza was amazing!! I recently moved here from NYC and needed a goto pizza place. The customer service was top notch, pizza was to die for and the price was right. I will definitely be back.

bE1WYfmUKWFHBFtMobiLxA.text: We took delivery. Kids ate it all. They are pretty vocal and they said it was excellent.  I didn't care for it so much. It was a good pizza, but not great.  Delivery took almost an hour, but the pizza arrived lukewarm and the crust lost it's crispiness and the cheese went a little soggy.  At $60 for a medium pizza and two smalls tax and delivery surcharge, I expected more.

XUC-wdRf5mq5YjsiMI8Mbg.text: Love this place!! We come at least once a week for the lunch special you get any 2 Large slices and a Huge Drink for around $6. Can not beat the quality or service. A very clean venue!! The Owner is a very handsome attentive bald headed man (by choice) in his prime and he is by far the most humble caring down to earth man you could ever ask for to serve you. If you want quality 5 star experience without the 5 star price, this is your place ...   I always get a slice of white and a slice of supreme, its AMAZING!!! Not that I need to even order, because Biaggio remembers all of his regulars, regulars     :)

QXdQlfmfXEv7DMNtvfZNGQ.text: Biaggio's Pizzeria makes good pizza, something that seems to be an art (although I don't know why).   They are not the best pizza in town and they are definitely not the best value.  Biaggio's is the kind of place where people, who have more money than sense, make a big deal about their za. It tastes good yes, but do I really need to pay $25 for a two topping pizza?  I'll probably eat there again, but it will need to be one of those "I feeling rich enough to toss a fiver at Steve Wynn and thank him for his hotel" kind of moments.

L-53uyApvIU_tmGIC6PCvw.text: Biaggio's is delicious!! This our 2nd visit and we love it! We ordered the supreme Stromboli and a large pepperoni and sausage pizza. My kids ate it all up and loved it! Mr. Biaggio takes such great care of his customers, he is so friendly and always goes above and beyond. He gave all 4 of my kids ice cream and one of my boys wanted meat lovers pizza so he made 2 of the slices on the pizza meat lovers just for him! We will be back over and over again!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Stromboli we added salami and meatballs to it.

L3cFz5AXmiHPKl8T8PrgWA.text: Awesome food and super friendly service.  Garlic knots are smothered in butter.  Marinara is chunky and rich.  Fast service.  Great food.

WzJPaUBQ-Oj2JAH-uh1aOw.text: Everything fresh! They use nothing frozen. Absolutely perfect crust. Very friendly staff.

WiYfqs2XrvxgGFneWA-cvw.text: This place was amazing! Super phenomenal customer service, nice atmosphere, and good food!  First, I'll talk about the pizza. They were able to split the two we wanted into one pie! Yay! We got buffalo chicken and meat lovers. Both were delish and they were not timid with toppings. The buffalo chicken pizza had a great buffalo sauce on it. The meat lovers has pastrami on it!   The wings were super crispy, but not overly greasy. They gave the medium sauce on the side, so that you could pour it yourself or use it as a dip. This is the 1st place I have been to that does that.  The garlic knots were good also. Lots of oil or butter at the bottom, but whatever makes it taste yummy, right?! Ha! I think these could have had more garlic on them, but we still ate them all.   I haven't tried the other stuff, so I'll be back!  I definitely recommend this place! I appreciate the hard work and pride people take in their restaurant and this spot shines!

0OBhv13UJP_djD0cwZiK5Q.text: Biaggios is the absolute best pizza on the west side of town. He has the best doughs, sides and the value you can't beat. The owner is one of the nicest people ever. He definitely tries to take care of you. Definitely recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

4T2mp2NpcOtZxHRd0nA9pQ.text: This place was awesome!!! My boyfriend and I came here on date night, before heading out to a movie. We were in the mood for pizza, tired of little caesars (ugh) and wanting to try something new. We searched for pizza on yelp by rating and poof! This place popped right up.   When we arrived it was a packed house, the only tables available were outside and with it being a chilly vegas night, there wasn't a chance we were sitting out there. So we waited. Soon after we decided on and placed our order, a table opened up and the staff cleaned it and seated us promptly. They even brought over this cute little pot of flowers to put on our table that wasn't there before! Nice touch!  Since we had already ordered our food we didn't have to wait long before it came out to us. We got a medium sized meat lovers, 10 mild wings, and 2 garlic knots because we just wanted to try them. The wings were my favorite of the food we got. They were lightly breaded and baked so they slightly crunchy and yet so flavorful with the mild sauce. They also served them with ranch and extra mild sauce on the side which we used for more dipping. The pizza was delicious, with that fancy east coast sausage, though I was expecting something...different?...it was more... short, fat and fluffy then I expected I guess hahaha. The garlic knots were good, very fresh (aka very hot) but I thought they were missing a tiny bit of something I couldn't quite figure out.   The best thing I would say about this place which is the biggest part of what will definitely keep us coming back was the service. The staff was so incredibly friendly, it felt like a great place to come down with friends or family because that is how they would treat you! Plus, I've got to get me some more wings... oh and try that raved about meatball sub!

abIxtrGBelMFoPh5ILP7Ew.text: The pepperoni had good flavor. It didn't fulfill my pizza fix though. I got pizza from another place the very next day. The pizza was thin with a thicker crust, light on the sauce and cheese. Nothing to rave about in my opinion.

KqLbtVfKP5CyoSH8D-aX2A.text: I come into this place often when i'm on lunch break from work. the owner is extremely generous and makes my experience much more enjoyable. I definitely would recommend this amazing restaurant to anyone looking for good pizza!

3iSC0QhUcsYfFIemu-A9QA.text: I recently moved back to this side of town and the quality is just as good as it was 5 years ago.  The owner takes customer service seriously and they have the best calzones in town!

GB2cLpp3eyT_Jidvm7Vaqw.text: I don't have anything bad that I can say about this place. The owner is super friendly, and they deliver all over the valley.  Things I've tried: Garlic knots, meatball stromboli, chicken nuggets, and cheese pizza. All excellent. Garlic knots are very buttery and garlicky, just as they should be, the stromboli is massive and well made. I don't normally like meatball stromboli's, but the meat they use here is great, so I usually end up getting it. The pizza is your classic thinner crust, cheesy, kinda greasy east coast pizza.  Atmosphere of the restaurant is pretty casual. They've got a few booths and a flatscreen tv to watch the game on, I guess. Delivery is pretty swift, I think. I live about 20 minutes away, and my order always shows up in 45 minutes to an hour. Pretty fast for a place so far away.  Food holds up pretty well in delivery, since they use those thermal pizza bags.  Update: I actually have to tell myself, no Heather, you can't order a meatball stromboli today, it's that good. I get cravings for it! I've converted everyone in my house to Biaggios; when that stromboli arrives it's like a throwing bread at a flock of ducks. It's gone within minutes. Everybody likes the pizza too, but the stromboli's so damn good that we almost always end up getting that instead.

gYNZQePErieLchYmKiFefA.text: Worst pizza I have had in years with pre made frozen crusts - service was slow.  Plenty of alternatives close by

-crxl7tEmQum0D0rxYmZ3Q.text: I attended a Christmas party that had catered from here. Amazing food! The lasagna was amazing and we loved the garlic knots and the salad... everything was delicious!! Thank You! I'll have come and visit in person! Yumm!

oTTouO2uk3j9f3PWOflhqg.text: I have to agree with everyone else here and say this place is awesome. There were and still are so many things I want to try. There was 4 of us and they all felt the same way so we kinda ordered a variety of things and split it. Meatball Sub, Chicken Parm Sub, Meat Pizza, and White Pizza. I have to say without a shadow of a doubt that the meatball sub was the best I have ever had to date, the chicken parm was delish and the pizza was just above average but not the best I have had.   I want to try their Italian Sub. Per the pics it look delish.

DZE77XIA9Cu4GKteMULbjA.text: The pizza was marginal at best. I just got a large supreme pizza for $23.78.  The topping are sparse, there were 12 small pieces of sausage on the entire pizza. Also there was a 3 inch hole in the crust in the middle of the pizza.  The people are very nice and friendly but I would not recommend this place nor will I go back.

2OIQLrCAWZeMmQ6bpgsJhA.text: I absolutely love their pizza!! And I love that they are gluten free, only downside is that they are a little pricey and when my boyfriend ordered from them the guy on the phone was rude and overcharged is for our pizza! Other than that I've had great experiences.

uv6JNPaDaVOyn7kDC-DgrA.text: Delicious, delicious, delicious!!! Best pizza and wings I've had in a very long time. Glad I discovered this spot, will be ordering many, many more times from here. Marinara sauce with their garlic rolls are very tasty.

HRT_LInN0ivWQD1ABC5Evg.text: Biaggio's is easily my favorite pizza place in town. Biaggio, himself, is a big perk - he's too funny. Being that it's down the street from my gym (LVAC), the drive home is excruciatingly tempting. Alas, a sporadic treat every so often is a must. Anyways:  1. Pizza is flavorful, with a great crispy crust and a splendid balance of cheese and grease. Very east coast style.  2. The giant meatball is amazeballs. Yes, ONE meatball is what I ordered. According to Biaggio, they use a secret recipe with different meats and spices. Well, let me tell you... it's glorious.  3. Chicken wings are the best I've had in town. Somehow, they're juicy but not oily. They came out on a platter lined with paper, and the paper had no grease on it.   The first time I went there, they said they delivered anywhere in town, but I'm not sure they do that anymore - I'd never expect them to. As nice as the idea is, it's too much to ask of anyone.  So yeah, a huge lunch. Well worth the added caloric intake! Again, Biaggio is a funny man and he's got really great grub. Prices are comparable to other pizza joints.

EP4VoOQBvkeQdVmqftg6Eg.text: Oh my gosh, this pizza was great. I ordered Hawaiian, and it was amazing! I recommend this to everyone! The Philly Cheesesteak was one of the best I've had. :9

3_0JElVRLTFhBIEfqd2rtQ.text: came to this cute place during new years. i definitely loved it, the owner was there to greet us and talk to us, the heat wasn't on but that didn't ruin my time there, the pizza was the best, it didn't have a ton of cheese and enough sauce which is my favorite!! and my fav was the salad, the antipasto i the artichoke (mmmmmmm :D) and the chicken wings  , it was amazing and the garlic knots were hot and delicious...everything was good we couldn't finish it...but it was delicious.

x1j5oGcgZDvoH0nD1V7mPQ.text: This place has really amazing pizza and wings. The service can't be beat either. Mr. Biaggio works very hard to make sure that you have the best experience when you eat there. Love the homemade blue cheese and ranch too!

cY8p1rUUhjmjePOqNZThgQ.text: Awesome food!! Personable service...and the garlic knots???? TOP NOTCH!!! Will definitely be back!!! And Biaggio himself is always there and he is awesome too!!!

CIbfnveBBG7Yb-Gj9c18mA.text: This was undeniably the best dining experience I have had in over 5 years. You need to stop reading this, get in your car, and get down to Biaggio's right now. The best italian food experience money can buy, and Biaggio is passionate about providing his customers the best authentic italian food you will ever have. I am not from Vegas, but you can bet I will be here every time I am in town, and if I lived here, there would be nothing that could stop me from making Biaggio's a weekly habit! So good, I had to write about my experience.http://bit.ly/gHlYLC

mPzJxH0dP7ZtSdNsjQw6WA.text: Awesome pizza and wings!  And to top it off, Biaggio is the nicest guy you'll ever meet.

ezvl5T6UJQwz_bvGvdOW_g.text: Went for the first time today. I got the supreme and it was amazing. I will be coming here for my pizza now. Sausage, crust veggies and sauce were all awesome.

yXuCFbs3gZzwa_i-i3A7Sw.text: I would find it difficult to for me to believe that there is a better NY-style pizza in Las Vegas.  Of course, an excellent pizza starts with a wood-burning oven, and they have it.  My wife had a pepperoni & ricotta pizza & I had a white pizza.  We will definitely re-order.  They were very, very good!

UCsORsbxYdjkFwzWvVl8Dw.text: their pizza is pretty good. i liked the crust and there was just enough oil to give it that extra flavor a lot of places forget to put in. when i got there i was the only one in the restaurant and the owner and two other people were conducting business or doing something. i felt like i was interrupting their meeting because it felt like they kept looking over at me. while i was eating. he did ask me once how i was doing while he was still sitting down in his meeting and i said good. the waiter asked me if i needed water and how everything was throughout my meal, but i still felt like i was interrupting their meeting. it was like that scene from a gangster movie (i cant remember which one, goodfellas?) when the gangsters killed a guy in the bar and then a cop walks by. they drag the body into the back and the cop comes in to the bar.

3oHqxC3oShdATKfMb1h5_g.text: Had an amazing time here, it's a small place but it gives you the feeling that the owner invited you over to eat at his house. From what i've had I'm so excited about it. I'm not usually one for pizza but i'll definitely keep going back to try everything they have.

jVRDq33YN-1jU0sxjCxZ2w.text: Biaggio's is amazing!  The pizza, bread, and desserts are incredible.  It is really the only authentic NY Italian food in town.

cNT0ojDq33c5hJzaeVepdA.text: I have eaten at Biaggio's several times from chicken fingers to Philly steak. I have yet to have a bad experience there! and as Biaggio would say the Canolli's are to die for! He is not lying!! My fave dessert is canolli's and it was perfect!! Great food, great service! Love going there for my weekend treat!

Xek9StkYFS5cIjqSEwHdwg.text: The pizza here was so good. I had the BBQ Chicken, and it was amazing how there was no visible BBQ sauce but yet you could taste it. Whatever they are doing with their pizza, they are doing it right. The pizza dough is crispy, and fuses really well with the cheese and the ingredients. We were celebrating our friend's birthday, and the owner gave my friend a treat. Very very warm service from the staff. Reasonable price. I will definitely pay a visit here when I visit Vegas again.

eXEbKTxs7u6ESrzwT2pMzg.text: We loved Biaggio's!  We were in Las Vegas on vacay and found Biaggio's from Yelp. This garlic knots and pizza were superb. The zeppoli's with raspberry sauce was divine.  Thank you Mr. Biaggio!

BVj8VBhn6akC6GdY3ZEI2Q.text: Awesome pizza ! Phillycheese was also yummy ! Not only is food good but the owner and everyone there was super friendly ! Will definitely be returning !

_f0SBi4NmJYQAk2QRylzOg.text: Best pizza I've ever had in Vegas! Wings are also amazing and the owner Biaggio is one of a kind. Eat here!!!

NdUpXJnbvX1Q-svZEWV64Q.text: We yelped this when we were In Las Vegas. It was a little hard to find, but It was well worth it. It was the best Pizza and Garlic knot anywhere. We had the Sausage and Meatball, All HOMEMADE. Wonderful place. I just wished we had it here in Florida. We will be back when we are in town. Service was great and friendly

V46njTBeMitFY-QkqWJ1nA.text: We finally have New York pizza in Las Vegas!  We have hit just about all the local "New York style" pizza joints in the area and we FINALLY have New York pizza!  We ordered a large pie- half cheese, half pepperoni- and we felt like we were back home in New York.  We also ordered meatballs.  The meatballs and sauce were to die for.  The bread was fresh and one of a kind, and upon the owner's suggestion we tried some of the freshest Italian cookies served outside of Little Italy.    Just go there and stop wasting time going anywhere else- you will be glad you did.

Bg8nPUAU0LMfdzc9FukzmQ.text: This place is fantastic!!!  Best pizza I've had in a long time and the meatballs are to die for=)

a1xdX9BRAc06WsQ3cbOJqA.text: Very good. Had the meatball sub, chicken parm sandwich. The italian calzone is very good. The owner is also very friendly. Even giving us a couple of slices, so we would try the pizza.

XV6rQG15cVHZmwVEVTdqIw.text: Pretty darn good!  So happy we finally got to try it today.  Staffs were super friendly, we dine in around 2:30 PM on Monday.  There were a lot of take outs and only one to two other people eating in with us.  We were told they do by the slice during lunch time.  We were so hungry and ordered garlic knots, large Supreme pizza with half no onions, and medium Italian calzone for 3 people.  It's a lot of food for 3 people for lunch!  LOL, but so worth it, we all had some to take home for dinner.  It's been a while since we had some simple, tasty pizza.  Can't wait to come back!

7cxYyYkOCJ4khBS2Wa9b_Q.text: This is such a great local pizza spot! The customer service here is like nothing you receive anywhere else nowadays. Very welcoming and grateful to their customers! Will definitely keep coming here.

5o3XmAwhP8WaLtRgwxFQmQ.text: Best pizza in Las Vegas. Owner was so nice and helpful. Can't wait to come back for a Calzone. Bathroom was so nice and clean.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pizza was very good best we have had in Las Vegas .
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Pyp-3DIXYlqwREAfvjFEcg.text: It was my granddaughter's 1st birthday and decided on Pizza for 18 family members, last Sunday. called a couple places and they wanted to charge me extra for bringing in a birthday cake, so my third phone call was to Biaggio's Pizzeria. Gentleman on the phone was the owner, who welcomed us over the phone with open arms. to my big surprise, everything we ordered was over the top delicious. The garlic knots, were simply the best I've had and the meat lover's pizza was incredible. Their white sauce pizza is also my new favorite, and will be going back this week with more family members to share the new discovery. ed

tedcl0s3QUnver4X9sGjcw.text: This place is awesome! We live their pizza and garlic knots. We usually get one cheese for the kids and one specialty for us. The leftover reheat very well too! My husband loves going in because the people working there are very simple and very midwestern :) great customer service

gNu4g9t_v2MT-VB5B8F_wg.text: Great place! The food is good, good portions, good price. The place was clean and intimate. We had our two ( loud ) kids with us eating in, and the atmosphere was perfect. The people who served us was very friendly and always made sure we had everything we needed.   Simple, delicious and cozy.  Next time we are back in this area we will make sure to come again.

e9j-K0BW3QHvlLgFU1Zppw.text: Meh it was alright I've definitely had better for CHEAPER. I got an XL white pizza it was alright not out of this world or unique like most the reviews say. I was irritated by how uneven the slices were they cut it so lazy there were small and medium sized slices and two big ass slices double the size of all of them seriously cmon not cool when a family is eating it and now fighting over who gets the big pieces. Also I love ranch so of course I got their ranch which was a dollar and they give you the little standard size solo ketchup cup that wasn't even filled all the way on top of that the ranch was watered down and flavorless. I will say the staff was very friendly but at the end of the day dat I'm not paying for that I'm paying for the food probably won't be back

Y-Mdie_081uuwRDnLE9Vhw.text: OMG!   This pizza was bomb.   I had it door dashed to work and EVERYONE loved it!  So good.  A little pricy but amazing!   I'll 100% order again!   Seriously you gotta try this place!

OvhqmcRehc2ckHYaBD8zRQ.text: I read the reviews and saw this place had 4.5 stars so we decided to give it a try. The customer service was good and they were very attentive that's why I gave them three stars, otherwise this could've easily been two. The garlic knots were drenched in oil and the pizza was average at best.

zgufGCg-Wi-i8FaHXCOd8Q.text: This place is a real gem. It's a small place but packed with delicious flavor. The man there is very nice and welcoming also. We had the pizza half meat lovers half Hawaiian, the wings and the fried mushrooms and I have to say everything was so yummy and cooked to perfection. Worth the 20 min drive from the strip.

PXVmXej3yDvCfF5ET_Ze0Q.text: Had a craving and this place is near my house and the reviews are great.  Ordered the art of chicken. Picked up right as it was coming out of the oven. Ate a slice on my way home. Exactly how crust should be. Hot and perfectly crispy.  I don't think this particular pizza has sauce on it. Maybe olive oil? The lack of sauce made it very light. VERY LIGHT, almost bland. Got home, added some Parm and crushed red pepper and it was great! There wasn't much chicken on it which was a bummer considering the name. But it was really good and the customer service was great!!

fuTQHhal1IPFtiB2nn9CMg.text: We stopped in because my son wanted fettuccini Alfredo.  The person that greeted me let me know that they make a great fettuccini alfredo. I asked if he could add chicken and he did. Well, I should have taken a picture, but my son dove in and didn't come up for air.   My husband and I ordered after we ordered for our son. He had the Jumbo Cheese Raviolis and I had the Eggplant Parmesan. Both were great, but we both agreed that the Eggplant was the best. It was perfectly cooked. Yes...once again, I forgot to take pictures.   The Eggplant comes with spaghetti. I usually avoid the extra carbs by skipping the spaghetti at most places. Not here. The sauce is amazing!!! So my husband shared the spaghetti until we were full. It was well worth the carbs. Bottom line...this place is a gem. We are coming back and can't wait to try the pizza!

QOnNQt3Ix-5mYBhIW1TDag.text: Great pizza, friendly service, high quality ingredients.  Highly recommend!

gy2qqkNeOp4vNWKmt8y0Uw.text: This is a very good thin crust pizza!  We ordered an extra large combo for 4 adult men and we had enough. Everyone was very happy with delivery, quality and quantity!

7Lr5fI_coQXFDTpj9W8oCA.text: Not sure what was up with the sauce, it was watery and flavorless. Like diet sauce or something, idk.

hs_g1ugt6aiOPPjGs7szpA.text: Very  good  pizza,  my only  regret was  not ordering the  xtra  large  20, my large  was so tasty I made it disappear  too quickly

azxjTfcCYaSshEoZjXctYQ.text: My wife and I visited Biaggio's two years ago when we first moved to Spring Valley. It was superb. We have since ordered a lot of pizzas for delivery and have never been disappointed. We have even gotten to know the delivery drivers a bit, particularly Brannon and Ludin, who have always delivered fresh and hot pizzas. Typically, I order a pepperoni and black olive 'za and my wife's choice varies. This evening we ordered a Supreme to share and it was quite possibly the best pizza I've ever eaten! I highly recommend Biaggio's. I have told many people about their quality product and great customer service and hope that each and every one of them has given it a try.

x1wttWKVyNDeZh4CNHLASw.text: You know how they say the "Holes in the Wall" have the best food. That stands True to this restaurant. The decor inside is super cute and very clean. The only negative thing I can say about this place is that they don't have one closer to my side of town.   I got two pieces of pepperoni pizza and some garlic knots, all of which was delicious. The service was also great.

IXe6OAJH-Danzz3isuipMQ.text: This place is next to my esthetician and I asked her if this is a good pizza place and she said "it's a good everything place".   I came in and ordered the chicken Parmesan sub and at first was shocked no side order came with it however, this is the best chicken Parmesan sub I've had in the 7 years I've lived in Vegas. Tasteful, juicy, and so filling! I'll definitely be back !

fICJA4gkp4qg_u4kwbgFyg.text: The guy who helped me and my brother today was great, very energetic and outgoing. We didn't know what we wanted to eat so he helped us decide as well. The food didn't take to long to make and was fresh. Definitely will be coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

06sTv4PC9XBEF7FaLrEFtg.text: If you want the best pizza go to Biaggio's Pizzeria there pizza and wings is to die for love there chicken Caesars salad it's a must go there love there service make you feel special

91FG6xIMuxCco6at6z-BTw.text: Amazing pizza and even better customer service! This will become a regular on our rotation for sure. Kids loved it, parents loved it; a winner all around. The garlic knots were seasoned perfectly and the dough was perfectly soft. Can't wait to come back!!

RzxfjQEcVRZcAKN3WLSGNw.text: The food and service was awesome Thank you! I will definitely be back..this will be my new Pizza place for now! I truly appreciate the hospitality.

fpSAvdkQzj7N1x8a-ltVTQ.text: Come here and you are immediately family.  Biaggio is the man - kind, genuine, all loving.   And how about that food - supreme pizza, meat lovers, fried mozzarella sticks, fried mushrooms and veggie salad.  The pizza crust is so perfect, reminded me of being a child and having pizza for the first time.    Just go here and feel like family.

DxChlxHGrz-Esoxx0tn3Zw.text: This place is absolutely fantastic. The owner is almost always here and ensures customer service and satisfaction is consistently delivered. Aside from excellent service, Biaggios offers really delicious food options. The pizza is fantastic with chewy crust with fresh toppings and high quality cheese that stretches when you take a bite or cut a slice away (I think that means the cheese is a blend of mozzarella and Munster cheese). The salad and garlic knots are bomb too.  Additionally my job requires me to cater in lunches to my customers and Biaggios more than assists in getting my food delivered hot and on time and at a really reasonable price.  I can't say enough good things! Give them a try!

VmtSxeK-o8IeAi7-qMwbWw.text: Great hand tossed pizza, reasonably priced, ordered the artichoke n chicken pizza. It also came with black olives, sun-dried tomatoes n white garlic sauce. Very flavorful food n extra polite owner. Very comfortable seating with a quiet ambiance, good to bring a date.

VhA3NIAUQ9wt_zsY99uz9Q.text: Best homemade meatballs and love the fried zucchinis.  Excellent family-friendly customer service.  I always enjoy my time here.

wrsVsPwhzYoE_BNZUXAyug.text: Best place for gluten free food.  Everything is good here.  I've had it all.  Fresh bread is hard to find and this place has it.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free pizza with bacon.  Yum!

pCZAv--kwGRw2g-KQeS0KQ.text: Best pizza I've had in Vegas. Each pizza is better than the last and worth every single penny. I couldn't ask for better customer service. I drive all the way from Henderson just to get food at this place. I would 100% recommend this place to anyone, I'm always happy with th food, service and prices! Love you guys keep doing what your doing!

1iqKrWmrPqtB0o-VdeRtMQ.text: First of all..... you feel like familythe minute you walk in the door with their warm welcome! There are too many places in town like that! Between the pizza , wings Ahhh-mazzing chicken Caesar salad and scrumptious desserts....you just CAN'T LOSE!! Biaggios is a must try! You won't be disappointed!!

PptjfiECOpKcDVytqKJ2eQ.text: Best pizza I've had in Vegas. Worth the drive off the strip. Pizza is delicious from the first bite to the crust. As a pizza lover, you can tell this place uses top quality ingredients that doesn't brake the bank. Will definitely be coming back on our next Vegas trip.

ceDrUHh3KB9bgvrAhMT4qA.text: The owner is so friendly - he really makes the places what it is. The food of course was excellent -  but he just makes people feel like old friends when you come in to eat. We had a great experience.

2ke9b9Gwu11L1wpi6HJXnA.text: Great tasting pizza!!! I'm from Chicago and tried another place and wasn't pleased. I found this place here on yelp and had to try it. I loved it!! Prompt service and aweseme pizza! I will definitely be back for more!!!

kaHdx9PrbmIb4XIRnZ4iKQ.text: Biaggio's Pizza is delicious!!! We are from Chicago and we really enjoyed both the food and the service. The owner is very personable. They go out of their way to please their customers! Also, the menu is expansive!!!

r015cXrDVa2fu0kL_pf7mQ.text: What a neat little hole in the wall pizzeria!  I had a hankering for a slice of pizza one evening and saw that this shop is near where I live.  So the fiance and I headed over and ended up ordering some garlic knots and a medium supreme pizza.  The knots were soft with just the right amount of flavor.  The pizza... so good!  The toppings tend to slide around on the pizza, so you really have to get a hold of it to get a good bite with all of the fixings.  I usually like to dip my pizza in ranch, but this did not even require any!  Biaggio himself came over and greeted us, which I thought was a nice touch.    I will return soon to try some more of this delicious pizza and maybe one of the tasty sounding desserts on the menu!

_11B67T_VkNfVoQyT6g56w.text: My first and last time. I couldn't even pick up a slice. It broke apart because it was so soggy. I used to make pizzas for Caesars, so I could tell that the dough was frozen then popped in the over. Crispy on outside and soggy on inside? Any cook can tell you that indicates frozen food. And the mushrooms were chewy. Fresh mushrooms are NOT chewy! I know that their veggies are not fresh and from a can. Nothing about this place is fresh at all and I will never come again

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Water soaked box and chewy mushrooms. Slightly uncooked , definitely not fresh

AfWNu01ZgHOJ8WzTqsBw_g.text: Visiting from California, seriously the best pizza I've ever had. The white pizza is superb, so I definitely recommend that. The restaraunt is very neat & clean which is always a great thing. The price as well wasn't bad compared to some of the places I looked at on yelp.   Service was great! The owner was so sweet, came over and talked to us and treated us like friends instead of another person buying some food and shared some info about how he has home made sauce and other such things which makes for great quality pizza.   Check it out!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White pizza! Greatest ever!

boEnFkL_iv4kUeRpxZMTUw.text: It hurts to write this update.  Biaggio and his staff are super friendly and will bend over backwards to get things right.  Maybe this just wasn't their night last week.  But it still shows how far they'll go for customer satisfaction.     7:45pm: We feel like a pizza.  Just moved closer to Biaggio and the last 2 experiences we had there were good so what the heck.  I order a large supreme with extra cheese.  The lady over the phone tells me it'll be ready in 20 minutes.    8:10pm: I arrive and the cook informs the cashier he hasn't even started my order yet.  She seems shocked.  There was some grumbling back there with Biaggio and the staff.  Biaggio come up to me and apologizes profusely for the mishap, gives me my $23 back and said he would take care of me the next time as well.  I didn't think it was that big a deal and did not make a stink over it at all.  I said it would not be necessary to take care of me on the next trip and tipped $3 to the staff.  The pizza comes out unusually fast and I go home.  8:27 and 24 seconds:  Arrive home and bring the pizza to the dining table and my wife takes the first bite.  The green peppers are COLD.  The pizza is not even warm and the consistency of the cheese is weird.  It was as if the cook took a cheese pizza that had been sitting out for a while and attempted to reheat it with the toppings he just added.  I thought I could just ignore all this and eat it but after half a slice, I called the restaurant and explained the situation.  The cashier offers to deliver a hot one to my house at no additional cost.  Fine!  Why would the cook think he could get away with giving me that first pizza?  Did he just think we wouldn't notice?  It was kind of offensive.  I've never returned a pizza ever before!  I couldn't believe it.   9:03: New hot pizza arrives and it's definitely oozing with cheese.  It doesn't have as much pepperoni or sausage but still way better than the first one.  The thing was that this new pizza was NOT five stars.  Not even close.  I could rattle off 5 other places off the top of my head that were better than this.           But the service, effort and attempt to do right is what saves it from giving them 2 stars.  I honestly believe this could've been just a bad night but I hadn't eaten there in over a year and won't give it five stars if it doesn't deserve it and tonight it certainly did not.  I am coming back for wings and pastrami but on the border for pizza.

5s6NaT3uU9nXvuV66yToWQ.text: Love love love this place!! Having lunch with my buddy Barb enjoying some heat outside....relaxing eating great pizza my choice is the pepperoni or meatball with jalapenos! The owner is friendly and funny!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My lunch date Barb!

HRnqM95oARF74KqpgmAR9g.text: Molto Bene!  First my disclaimer.  Lost my good phone about 8 months ago and not able to upgrade for too long.  My non-contract phone was a POS and thus terminating my mobile social media habit.  So, I have not been doing my due-deligence as a proud Yelper.  Did the Pumpkinman triathlon a few weeks back and it wooped on my pretty bad.  I got home beat tired (I live off of Rochelle and Ft. Apache).  I was really craving spagethi of all things.  I rarely  venture east of Ft. Apache and I just could not think of a place to eat but was starved.    DUH.  Yelp it.  I was using PASTA as the keyword and Biaggio's does not come up in the top three I think because his specialty is pizza.  I saw some things down on Rainbow but I really did not want to drive that far.  I saw this Ft. Apache address and I was mystified by the map.  How in the hell could this be across the street from me (walking distance if I wasn't so tired)?  As I was pulling into the parking lot, I noticed some people leaving with bikes on their racks and it was easy to surmise they had probably just finished Pumpkinman which was a good sign.  I walked in and the way the place is laid out you are not quite sure if you are supposed to be seated or go up to the counter.  (both options are acceptable)  I walked up to the counter to minimize the meet and greet steps and ordered some spaghetti.  Biaggio was like, "ok, how about some meatballs?"  I was like ok, whatever but I really just wanted the pasta.  Biaggio then says " I am going to just give you a piece of pizza...what kind do you want?"  Pepperoni and sausage would be great.  I sat down in a booth and looked at the great images of his pizzas and realized he is all about his pizzas.  I was served quick enough considering this is not microwave chow, and the presentation was beautiful.  (see my pix).  The one slice was almost enough but then the spaghetti came and I was golden.  But, hold on....Yes, the meatballs were incredible.  By the time I gorged myself, did a yelp and Facebook checkin, sent my photos to all my friends, had a nice little chat with Biaggio.  He is one cool kat.  Can hardly wait to return to the scene of my crime (by not eating here in the last 4 years I have lived across the street from the restaurant).  I would high recommend and also chat it up with everyone there.  Friendly peeps.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yQBczFyYwFaDbbRt8Sdc0g.text: I had the pepperoni pizza, which was great.  The others that were with me went with the Meatball sub, which was their third time that week having the same lunch!  Biaggio is a great guy who is serving up a lot of high quality food.

1SySm-N1vMHLNW8SeRHTfg.text: Biaggios came highly recommended by my co-worker so I had to try it... The 5 stars speaks for itself. Zucchini sticks and garlic knots are a must. Meatballs were even better. Pizza was 2nd to none. The crust is something I've been craving since I got home from my first visit. Biaggios also has the one magic ingredient that few others can match and that is unparalleled customer service. Biaggio himself served up everything and through his description of each dish, you can't help but be impressed by his passion for good food. So here it is Biaggio, your five star review!

L6tg3pwzzvcqB1nnCBiF_g.text: We visited for lunch after finding this place on yelp... thank you, yelpers!  Great wings, fantastic garlic knots, and excellent pizza.  We were served by Biaggio himself, and nothing was short of excellent.  We will lunch here at least once every visit from Phoenix.  Value was solid too.  Thin crust pizza with great toppings, and stays chewy-crisp long enough to enjoy it thoroughly.

Tb4l6c8eN8VPOfPnWl6Wag.text: I have been here twice and I've been treated well by the owner. The first time my husband and I came in, I had mentioned that I wanted to try the pasta and he gave us two free meatballs with sauce and baguette with our slices of pizza. This made me come back for a second time because the meat balls were quite delicious (and I am usually not a big meat ball fan) so we tried the meat ball sub with ziti. The food tasted fresh and was not at all too salty which is a huge bonus! The only negative thing I would have to say was that the fries were a bit small for 3.50.

QmgFUbKHy0fMC0sz2v1rGg.text: My husband and I were looking for a place to grab a bite after playing volleyball at Gardens Park and found Biaggio's on Yelp.  Having moved here from NYC, we've had all kinds of great pizza and are pretty picky with what we find in Vegas.  We started out with some fantastic garlic knots.  They were perfectly seasoned on a pool of olive oil and also came with some tasty marinara sauce.  Take your pick on which to dip them in!  I did both!  We had a medium-sized (6 slices) "Art of Chicken," which had chicken, artichokes, roasted tomatoes, garlic, and black olives.  Delicious!  The pizza dough tasted great.  I love artichokes and roasted tomatoes and these were as fresh as you can get.  It's great having a slice of pizza with quality ingredients.  We got to speak to the owner while we dined at one of the outside tables and you are immediately aware of the passion he has about his food.  I love to cook so can appreciate that.  Service was really generous and nice, too.  We'll be back next time we're in the neighborhood to explore the other specialty pizzas on the menu.  This place doesn't take pizza for granted.  5 stars for quality ingredients and quality service.

nwMDBuPcjI0Utcogpg7UPQ.text: Biaggios pizza,  I have been craving NY style pizza for the longest time and my craving have been solely met by dining at Biaggios. So much care and attention to detail has been put into their food. This is a must eat at establishment. The owner has so much pride in his food and the staff is super friendly and go completely out their way to provide top notch customer service.  Also I come to learn they deliver throughout the valley of las Vegas.  A a few notables are the chicken wings and meatballs. They are to die for.  Anyhow this is a must eat at establishment, trust me as I am a NY native.

MjR0bP4pFSClU6bwR-5aGA.text: Biaggios is awesome. Beyond how amazing the food is, Biaggio himself is very personal and his customer service is amazing. I will definitely be coming back every time I pass through Vegas.

e_MmGctKgFB1DDh-0l6odg.text: The pizza is wonderful and greasy just the way I like it.Everything tastes fresh and the meatball sub combo is a great.

wIvoFM5dMugoPmLrsI3KWA.text: the food is so good! i love the garlic knots,and the pizza.its all good you cant go wrong with anything on the menu.

nJwNo7PNrGGne4q_P2RgCg.text: had to try out Biaggio's since I saw it was the tops on yelp and very close by,like others have noted Biaggio greeted and introduced himself when I came in also..had to try the garlic knots since everyone raves about them and they were really tasty,had a good pie also..will add into my pizza rotation,I was a Detroit pizza guy but I will go back when the need for thin crust style hits me or the need for knots,whatever comes first!

VoBuI9j2SetTznOm2F2QIQ.text: glad i don't live in LV because i would be eating these pizzas A LOT and probably gain some weight. but honestly, good pizza. we were staying on the strip and didn't want to travel all the way to spring valley but a short jaunt on the 15 to the 215 west got is there in a few minutes and it was worth the drive because it's hard to find good pizza. the people there are very friendly. the waitress was very cute. the setting was kind of strip mallish but whatever atmosphere was missing was made up by a near perfect pizza.

tBh8TXsh2877B40YAEkILg.text: Came to this restaurant on a Saturday around lunch time because my fiance was getting a tattoo next door. The restaurant was very clean & friendly. I was greeted & helped as soon as I walked in the door. I ordered a slice of pizza & antipasto salad. The lady taking my order offered me their 2 slice of pizza special that came with a drink. My food was ready fast & it was delicious! Would recommend for a nice little lunch. Or even dinner!

QDeYYk5jJFbEKpk2FoXAjg.text: They put way too much oregano in their sauce tried more than one item it was so overpowering it had no balance of flavors. All you can do is taste oregano. Owner was very very nice, sorry buddy.

GKtHETumVXSLneqNw1-SzQ.text: I was visiting Las Vegas and ended up visiting this restaurant twice in 2 days.   All of their ingredients are fresh and they don't skimp on ingredients.  The Greek salad was loaded with feta cheese and kalamata olives.  The pizza was delicious, loaded with toppings and the crust was great.  This is the best pizza I've had since I visited Long Island.   I don't review very often but wanted to made a point of encouraging others to visit their quaint location.

5TsOCcVRRJDlqVnUQPPXbg.text: As my boyfriend said, "I have never been more happier to eat a crispy...flakey crust." The ingredients are top notch from the oil they use to the tomatoes in the sauce. The breading on the wings and zucchini sticks came out perfectly crisp and not too salty as other places. What made my dining experience the most enjoyable was the service. Our server and the owner were very friendly. They took time out of their day to speak to us and to make sure we were satisfied with everything. Will definitely come back!

UdnY4EO_AOL39KiX2G2UCA.text: Oh my goodness. I ordered a Philly Cheesesteak my brother in law ordered a calzone and we got an order of garlic knots we had it delivered and when it came the lady was very nice and the food was hot. And it's HUGE!!! So good worth it. Will definitely come back!!!

H0jrYsmAi5FsCjQWJ1kmDA.text: This place was just ok.   I was feeling lazy and wanted to get some delivery. Browsing through reviews on Yelp, I was happy to come across this place that delivered and had fantastic reviews.   We ordered a medium Hawaiian, chicken wings and some onion rings. The onion rings were soggy and gross. I kinda figured they would be from that long drive to my place, so I blame myself for that choice. The pizza was very underwhelming. I was so disappointed after reading all the rave reviews. The crust was blah, the toppings were blah, the only saving grace was the flavorful tomato sauce. The highlight of the meal were the chicken wings. They were really good. Great texture and flavor. The bleu cheese dressing that came with them wasn't great, but we just ended up dipping them in the hot sauce instead and yum.   Overall, not the greatest place, but it'll do in a pinch.

NVveK2-WCINvHi0oH_tUAQ.text: We had the Chicken parmesan with pasta and red gravy and Shrimp fettuccine Alfredo. Both were really delicious, it was my first time trying this place. It has a 41/2 star rating with hundreds of great reviews here on Yelp and I see why, this place is good. I make my Sauce from a  generations old family recipe and it takes me 41/2 - 5 hours so I'm picky but this was good I recommend you try this place and taste for yourself, and I too will return to try other items on their menu.
