EXljfc1KnfTWSUn-JZvZCw.text: Excellent pizza!  Such a great way to finish a long Saturday! We ordered a mushroom & green pepper pizza which was excellent.  They used fresh mushrooms and long green slivers of green pepper.  We look forward to our next visit!

bxeEk79OEZvt-yTQN6o1sw.text: This place is definitely the best pizza and wings we've had , service was great! Highly recommend. We had the meat lovers pizza, chicken parmigiana,  garlic knotts and wings.

zrcDeiWkQkDU5xNEjvgPXw.text: Brandon is awesome. Super personable and very professional. Wings are great. Pizza honestly is pretty great for being in a random area. Everything tasted fresh and the place is very clean.   If I'm in town, I'll definitely be back. :)

Toy34YPpH38R6Azzbp5MYA.text: Great new establishment in Henderson. Clean, big tables, great service and the Owner is a STUD! Great personality, loves to mingle and will design and create dishes to your specific needs. FOOD was hot, made fresh, tasty and on point! Comfy home like atmosphere, we spent 2.5 hours there, eating, laughing and planning our next visit. Highly recommend. Come see for yourself! Thank you Biaggio! Much love

zho1gibCdI5WKbLo2qlUcg.text: Excellent garlic knots and best sauce that I've had in Vegas! The Stromboli is absolutely delicious. Light, crisp with excellent ingredients. Clean restaurant. I will definitely go back again and again!

7MaMJ5pFX5k61rjektffVQ.text: Best pizza ever!!! The customer service was wonderful, will definitely come back here again. He offered me a free water bottle while I was waiting for my pizza! Also the pizza was so delicious and hot and it came out fast too

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

x189lO7wE5Dcb86teUejxg.text: AWESOME place to eat! Excellent pizza and great sandwiches. The service mirrored the food. I would definitely recommend this place!

pxSpnP2wEesMXFhCckDupQ.text: You can taste the quality ingredients that they use in their Pizza absolutely awesome Definitely one of the best here in the Southwest

FF9UOnfaLiX_V3zbCyWHFA.text: I really wish I loved this place as much as everyone else does because it is ridiculously close to where I live. Unfortunately, it fell short of the hype.  I ordered delivery from Biaggio's and everything went fine, nice person over the phone, delivery was on time (you'd hope so since I could literally walk there). My gripe was with the pizza itself, along with the side orders I had.  I've had pizza in NYC, this is not NYC style. The crust is much thicker, the sauce was thick and the cheese made a hard layer over the top. You know that kind of cheese, that would all just come off in one piece? It was like that. The crust itself had small bumps on the bottom which means it was probably baked in a pizza tray, and not just tossed and slid into the oven. All of this is perfectly acceptable if this is your taste, but it's not for me.  I ordered a side salad with Italian dressing, and the salad came topped with olives, cheese, tomatoes and cucumber. The tomatoes were mealy and tasteless because they had been in the fridge for too long. The dressing wasn't as sharp as I'd like and I ended up adding some red wine vinegar at home.  I ordered the zucchini sticks specifically because it said "sticks." I hate zucchini rounds, because when they're cut like that, they get overcooked and loose their texture. It also means a lot more breading, and rounds are always breadcrumbs. I like zucchini sticks that are beer battered, and was hoping these would be like that, but knew not to expect the beer batter. I was disappointed, since I was expecting sticks at least.  All of these things I think mostly come down to a preference, but I didn't see the same quality everyone else did. I might end up giving this place another try, but with Those Guys also in the vicinity, it'll be tough for me to break away after my first experience.

fFBiquMAogR_yTg99JEGWA.text: The place was cute and service was great. The pizza was ok at best and calzone was a bit better than the pizza. They don't give you cheese or peppers with your to go order and the sauce tasted watered down.   Usually on pizza night the food goes quick. We still have half the pizza and 2/3 of the calzone left. Also , we ordered both pizza and calzone medium, we got home and opened the larger box expecting the pizza, but it was the calzone. Pizza was small for a medium.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

52fMvl6-WjP83aNsXkU7qw.text: Been here before, had a great experience than, and this time was just as good.  We started  with an Italian sub for an appetizer, it's loaded with meat, red peppers, good bread.    We also got a meatball, sausage, mushroom and ricotta cheese pizza, it was soooo... good!  We wanted to eat more, but didn't want to look like pigs, so we asked for a box to take home, but it didn't last long!    Still a hidden diamond in my neighborhood, definitely recommend it.

qNrREIFgRqvbC5PONuc6qg.text: Didn't try the pizza but my pasta was delicious. Sauce was light and tasty.  Fried zucchini was tasteful as well. Wasn't greasy and had just the right texture. I recommend this hidden secret.

J4le5FkYqQEjf2TWGqVwDA.text: given latest move, I spend more time at the LVAC gym at Flamingo/215 than the Eastern location.  I have a new rule - when megabucks or Powerball lotto jackpots exceed $100 million, I drive to the NV/Cali border to buy tickets.  well, they are both currently over $100 million so on Wednesday, post work out, I start the drive, but, it is lunch time and since Biaggio's is nearby, how about a few slices to go ?  I opt for the two slice soda special costing $6.  While waiting, talked to owner about how long it's been since my last visit.  The owner is a hoot - an old school guy !  the slices took a little longer than it should given they were not busy - who knows, maybe it was a fresh pie being cooked.  Anyways, the pizza was above average.  First of all, I was appreciated of having bite sized pieces of sausage on top - seems simple enough but last several pizza experiences involved "sausage strips"  not to my liking.  I really liked the crust - thin but not paper thin, had a crunch to it yet also some softness, too. could have used a tad bit more sauce but not a major issue.  Overall, worth a return if i'm hankering for pizza post-work out or in the area for other escapades.  pic included

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 2 slices of sausage

nEm6DoadzA9R-UIXHZ0wTA.text: I wish I would have read the reviews and seen the pics before I decided to order dinner. We ordered wings, fingers, fries and a cheese pizza. The pizza was good and I wish I would have just ordered that. Everything was overpriced for what you get, also not so good. The chicken tastes like Tyson frozen chicken. You get 3 tiny fingers with no fries for 7.99. The wings (which are totally overbreaded) are sold $1 each. Again, no fries. Neither came with a meal option so I ordered an order of fries at 3.99 figuring we could share, wow the order was small! The fries have that slight breading FYI. Glad we ordered a large pizza as I ended up not finishing my wings.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Very small portion of fries for 3.99. The gap on right is from the ketchup they give you.

UCBzezvHx1y_rjixPcwKmQ.text: Where can I start..... We were in town from Salt Lake for a paintball tournemnt and wanted something other then fast food or chain restaurants. We found Biaggie's on here (Yelp) and decided to give it a try. Not just the best pizza in town...BEST PIZZA I HAVE EVER HAD!! From the garlic knots, to the amazing supreme pizza, ending with the out-of-this-world New York cheesecake with raspberry drizzle that tasted homemade!!!! I couldn't eat anymore but had to get some knots to go!!! Thank you for the amazing customer service and amazing food!!! Next time we are in town we will for sure be stopping by Biaggie's!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Just left and can&#39;t wait to come back!!!! Thank you guys for the amazing hospitality!!!
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I accidentally ordered my 5 year old two of these bad boys... Amazing pizza!!!!!

qm9494YpXXrNdJc-FHiD-A.text: Great pizza! Plus they deliver fast! Great people that work there and the east coast calzone is on !!

d7BoFO2wOf9TcwEKlzF-zA.text: The pizza was good and I see why others like it. I myself did no tlike the flavor. The cheese they used seem to have almost a smokey flavor ? I can't quite put my finger on it but I won't be ordering from here again even though I'm sure others love it. Best of luck

fgNo3qPx-q_5u-dTPh4N4g.text: Great tasting Pizza but not "New York Style" even though the crust tastes great it is thicker like a bread stick so I recommend getting a side of marinara sauce to dip it in. They use good quality cheese which really helps and happy to find this place.

oA_7hEPE7T_f6lTfQP_G6Q.text: We stopped in one night when we first moved to the neighborhood and chose this place based off of Yelp reviews. The owner was our server and absolutely just sweet as can be. We got a pizza and it was absolutely delicious. Being from the east coast, we are VERY particular with our pizza- but we were VERY pleased. Service was great, food was delicious. We will absolutely be back and we look forward to trying more delicious items off the menu! Thanks again for great service and for feeding a very hungry family.

tAQzRh8NroFRIAbaJ9I-Og.text: I found Biaggio's off of yelp and had lunch here after taking my moms dog to the vet the other day. The reviews and ratings just do not do proper justice for this place. First, the food was great, and the lunch special was cheap too! Definitely get the garlic knots, but above the food I want to mention the service. I saw more compassion in my twenty minuet lunch than I did the better part of this year. The gentlemen that worked there was so friendly and a great server, but more so just a kind person. A man came in who was having trouble with his motor functions, the man who worked there helped him walk over to his table, returned the change to this patrons pocket when he couldn't and just went so far beyond what was required of his job. That made my day more so than the food. If you don't give this place a shot, you're the one missing out in more ways than one.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lunch special pizza with double pepperoni, extra cheese and ricotta cheese and the garlic knots! Yummy!

iGjxEl-lfTObTkX3f0SHag.text: This was my first pizza place in Vegas; And I won't go anywhere else! It's away from the strip and somewhat pricey but it's worth it! Non-greasy, fresh toppings, and perfect charred crust! Simply the best.

VcoxrLYLwHfT_yw2TeBnxg.text: Seriously THE BEST pizza!!!  Two big slices and large drink $6.99!!!  My whole family loves this place.  Ft. Apache and Flamingo, by Home Depot.

82zxYd1ujEgCaIigr4oGcw.text: This place has really good food! And the staff there is all so nice and friendly! I walked in and was immediately greeted with warm smiles. It felt like I was home in a place I had never even walked foot in before. The waitress (I believe her name was Bela) did nothing but further that feeling as she gave me as good as service as a person could get. It was overall a fantastic time, and would definitely recommend to anyone! You couldn't get better food from Italy itself! I will 100% be back soon.

6frdImeDPW-k7lTV6Wbfyw.text: Pizza and wings were awesome! Some of the best pizza I have ever had! Great service too!

1ZvriOGjzKabmZ7xXUchxA.text: Very inexpensive and also very tasty pizza. This is always my goto place for cheap quality

JqPbuq8AZT9_YUu8ER0mUw.text: I have decided to give this place another try since my bf liked it the first time and this place is close to where we live. Needless to say we are both disappointed so it's not just me anymore. We have both crossed this off our list of go to pizza place. First of all, they fucked up our order which was supposed to be half white pizza and half sausage with marinara sauce. Instead we ended up with white pizza all over and half with sausage. Wtf? My bf is so nice that he didn't want the hassle to go back and complain. Apparently he didn't check the order when he picked it up. But now they also burned the crust like 50 percent of the crust is burned. So gross! We are never going back to this place again. You had your chance Biaggio!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burned pizza crust staring at your face! No bueno.

3hX5U9K9ViyEFZHSzT1YdQ.text: Such authentic, home-made marinara sauce that you'll wanna kiss your Italian mamma even if you're not Italian!!  Pizza crust is perfecto - no salt or sugar added.  Beautiful presentation in the front glass...like art you can eat - arranged to make ya hungry!  Like I said, "love on a plate"!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6MWWVgIWlZ9CS5O9OnqZ2g.text: So yummy and the people that work here are so nice.  Also very fast!  Or maybe just the time I came in.  I've only been here twice so I haven't had any bad experiences yet.  A small place with some seating outside.  The deli counter is just an example of what they have, but you can order and make any pizza you want even if it's just by the slice.  Their lunch special is two slices of pizza and a drink  for $6 and change.  I came here on a pizza mission, I live two minutes away I can't wait to get home!

U-L0w5W79r3s0wSqw0LdoQ.text: Found this place on Yelp by searching by highest rating. The service by Biaggio himself was great. He was friendly, and made it known that he wanted his customers to enjoy excellent tasting, high quality food. He delivered on this.   I got 2 good sized slices of pizza, which were delicious, garden salad with grilled chicken, which was decent, and a large fountain drink, all for $10 & some change. Great pizza at a great price. I'd return and recommend to a friend for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WtCwzZ34wvRPnRLd6IN-vA.text: Disclaimer: my rating is SOLELY for the pizza.  First the positives. As many here have said the owner is a really nice guy, very friendly and clearly proud of his restaurant. The garlic knots are insanely tasty - had I just eaten them, my rating would have two extra stars.  Now onto the pizza. It's disgusting. The crust tastes like cardboard...with less flavor. I've eaten bad pizza before, but I've at least been able to get an entire piece down. It was all I could do to get 2/3 of one slice down.  Another thing that irked me - and this could've been only because I was so dissatisfied with the pizza - was that the waitress was TOO on top of things. She was at my table every 3 bites of food asking how it was, if she could bring us anything etc. While trying to eat a meal and have a nice post work, Friday evening conversation, I felt like I had an unwanted guest at my table. Again, this was likely due to me being upset with the pizza quality, but none the less, it was enough for me to notice it being annoying.

gekC0HaI_eETS-Q8WG0bTw.text: We ordered pizza, antipasto and zucchini fries. Everything we had was absolutely delicious. We'll definitely come back and try everything on the menu but I'll be sure that I try the garlic knots because they look big and soft and sooo good!

kEqw6S6Iniw1KQw2mJD6wQ.text: I was very excited to try this place based on the reviews; however, this was the worst service I have had in a long time. They said my pizza would be ready in 25 mins. I got there 30 mins after ordering and it wasn't ready. They asked me 5 different times what my order was and never followed up to let me know what the status was. They guy next to me was waiting longer than me and just ended up leaving. That should have been my sign. After an additional 25 mins of waiting, I finally got my order... Or so I thought.  Got back home to eat my pepperoni, mushroom, olive pizza with a greek salad; and they gave me a green pepper, mushroom, olive pizza with an Italian salad. Needless to say, I was boiling! Why people like this place is beyond me. I tried to eat what I had but it wasn't even good. The dough was flavorless and nothing special. I won't be back and wouldn't recommend this place to anyone.

tsQP54BOis-LbQQJhCUc6Q.text: This place is incredible! I walked in to order a large pepperoni pizza with sausage and they told me it will be about 20 minutes(which is relatively quick for the quality of the zzas) As I waited I noticed they had wifi but I neglected to ask for the password. I forgot to mention that the employees were so friendly and kind to everyone in the restaurant. The pizza came on time and I took the pizza home and the pizza was delicious! The sausage had a lot of spices and tasted very exquisite, the crust was toasty and soft at the same time. Overall delicious and amazing employees will buy again.

DLdGtWmN4nUsC9X4W7Dx6g.text: Our order got messed up and Biaggio made it right. Pizza and salad and garlic knots were delicious. We will order from him again!  Thank you

uXRNDHp3UTnSINo5rNBM8Q.text: First I've got to point out the great service. We ate in the restaurant. All the ingredients in the pizza tastes very fresh. Sauce cheese ratio was on point.

qnBcSodvChxZy-CvB4ELrg.text: A freind told me about this place. Biaggios was a great experience the food was amazing I eat out a lot and this is truly great food and the owner was wonderful explained the menu and the food he sources top quality product and you can tell when you taste each item.  I can't wait to go back and enjoy more of the menu choices and great company there. The zeppoles deserts is to dye for.

40ilXPkiJZDRawqWfbvzWg.text: We love their Hawaiian Pizza. Its nothing like any other pizza place. Their delivery time is somewhat lengthy but that is my only complaint.

qV1AWCuo7yEN1-EHUeeIlA.text: I'll start off first with a simple PRO and CONS list for those of you that don't want to read my rambling review. :)  PROS:  *I got the Italian sub and it was delicious!  *The wait staff was extremely friendly. * Very reasonable prices. *It's local and very family oriented, you feel good giving your money to support  local  business. *The interior was very clean and cozy, a great place to bring a casual date.  CONS: * The display case were you order your food is very off putting. I don't think it's even real food but meant as a display. Its a bad idea, when I first saw it I got a lump in my throat the the food was going to suck. Bad first impression. *Even though I appreciated the friendliness of everyone some people might not enjoy the enthusiasm. I could see that someone who is shy or not much for talk feeling a little uncomfortable.  I visited Biaggio's on Friday 5/25 due to the good reviews on Yelp. When I walked in, there were a group of people sitting at the booth tables to my left; one of the men at the table waved to me like an old friend and at the same time the people behind the register also greeted me. I got a little disoriented by all the greetings but it was nice to feel welcome.   I took a look at the menu and decided to so for the Italian sub. The man that initially waved from the booth then got up and came behind the front counter and asked me if I wanted it made a certain way, and additions or subtractions to the original sandwich. Which was nice that he was thorough, I just told him to make it how he thinks is best. :) I'm not sure if that was the owner or not but he had that air about him, so probably.   I order my sandwich to go, so I sat down at one of the booths to wait. While I was waiting the girl I ordered from came over and asked if I wanted anything to drink while I waited, which I thought was really nice since I hadn't paid for a drink. I just said a water would be great, but still the thought was nice. I know some people said that the wait staff were almost TOO friendly to the point of being an annoyance. The girl that brought me a water, I had a feeling that she wanted to come over again and ask me if I needed anything else, which would have been silly because I was waiting for a to-go order. So she seemed to refrain herself. :) I wonder if they'd read the reviews! lol None the less I thought she was sweet.  I only waited about 8 minutes, which I thought was a reasonable amount of time. Got up to leave and everyone waved a warm adieu. I got home to eat my sandwich and it was fabulous! It had a variety of peppers, onions and I think an olive tapenade with oil and was seasoned wonderfully. The meat and cheeses were of high quality, the bread seemed fresh, crusty enough on the outside and soft on the inside.   Overall it was a great experience and I would definitely go back. :)

ONjJCWwrhGOy06lt3GjNkw.text: I am going to have to agree with some of the other reviews on this page....over priced. We ordered a veggie (medium) and meat lovers (large). Total: $44.00 That is pretty outrageous to me because I did not feel the pizza was anything special. The ingredients on the veggie pizza were good but it was soggy.

5NE5b5YEYgRveBwOYEMopQ.text: Yes truly a hidden gem!! We are returning customers over the years for a reason!! Each pizza is a specialty when it comes to this pizzeria! Love the fresh ingredients and wonderful crust! And let me tell you the salads are amazing too...especially the veggie salad with their special Italian dressing! We always feel extra special when greeted by the owner because you can tell he cares about his menu and his customer service!!  Thank you Mr. Biaggio for offering us great service and really good food!!

iUJtCqRI8zBfLYCzarbGKw.text: We were in town from Denver for my daughter's gymnastics meet. We all wanted pizza, but I'm gluten free so that can be hard to find. We checked yelp and found this hidden gem of a place. Ironically, they had a delivery issue with their GF crust, but the owner was very apologetic and accommodating. He replaced the pizza with ravioli for me - It was AMAZING!! And he gave us my daughter's pizza on the house. Between the fantastic customer service and the great tasting food I can enthusiastically give this place 5 stars. If you're in the Vegas area be sure to check it out!!

nUocVUsYcCyDhyPD65ESpQ.text: Great local owned pizza place. Staff messed up the order and gave us an extra pizza. Definitely coming again and again. Can't go wrong and great gluten free options as well. A+ all around.

_8bLZO5ZKJAxXvmzgVNKYg.text: Decided to give this place a try because it was nearby and had good reviews. The place was clean and the service was great. It wasn't very busy so the food came out quickly. We ordered chicken wings and a small pizza. Im not normally a pizza person but I would definitely order the pizza again. The wings were good too. I especially like that they let me order all flats.

LKhXDLxhyTdKP1n0TEgXeA.text: If you are searching for a great atmosphere and great food look no further!! I'm pretty obsessed with ranch on pizza, but let me tell you that you won't need it for this pizza! By far one of the best in Vegas!! I would recommend the meat lovers. The owner makes the meatballs and sausage in-house!

i1TzcJuk6zIAbOUTQ1xvBA.text: Went here for the first time on 9-5-14, the meatball parm hero is every bit as good as others have stated. Their pizza is excellent as well. Highly recommend,  will be back

Z0wTnrcgLt9FXYOpDJ17YA.text: These guys are awesome!! They delivered pizza to me at a bar for my wedding reception!.  So nice, so good and the owner was phenomenal. Thank you biaggio for making my reception so freaking awesome!

5ilot2hp9zSbRrEjqHJP9Q.text: Great pizza and amazing wings coupled with friendly and personal service.  Highly recommended!

DYuP2I6Z6F7TdVJdsdzrRw.text: Good calzone, good pizza and great service.  The only bad thing I have to say is their online ordering menu portal is not quite up to date with their available inventory (they no longer do the Chicken Bacon Ranch specialty pizza and the beverages are not all available in 2 liters) and it glitched on me for the first time today after 10 previous online orders.  When the order did not come in 1.5 hours, I called and Mr. Biaggio got right on the phone to apologize and make it up to me, which he did so in hospitable fashion.  It's rare that the owner of a business addressess the day to day issues so directly and the value of that touch is certainly not lost on me.  I have a feeling Mr. Biaggio will be contacting his website developer to knock out the only complaint I can think of...

y0MTh9v8VMBedt75Kayq4w.text: I went into Biaggio's last week and was beyond pleased with my experience.    I used Yelp to find a place near where i was; and found Biaggio's got stellar reviews.   I entered the establishment and was immediately greeted by Biaggio.  He was extremely friendly and couldn't wait to give me some Biaggio history, as well as some recommendations.    I eventually settled on a Philly (which he made himself); and it turned out to be one of the best philly cheesesteaks i've ever had!  As I waited, Biaggio insisted I try to pizza so he gave me a slice of a very well done meatball pizza.    The staff was pleasant and i HIGHLY recommend everybody eats here.  He will deliver anywhere in the valley; and i look forward to my next visit!

H-za3BFm8MoJ3X5wcHSCsw.text: I've been meaning to try this place for months and I'm glad I finally did.  Pizza is the best I've had in Vegas and Biaggio is very friendly.  He came over to the table numerous times to make sure everything was great.  At $6 for 2 slices and a drink its a great value for lunch.    Cant wait to go back and try the sandwiches and other pizzas!

-mhQPiO5Mp05VBzT7FaNsg.text: Biaggio's has been a family staple for pizza for over 12 years. The best breaded chicken wings in town and pizza that is completely homemade from the dough to shredding his own cheese and special hand picked sausage. Also to add Biaggio is the best and once you meet him he will be a friend for life!!!  You have to try this place :)

Ixh-CCJaehM9QYW3RB0egQ.text: These people are awesome. We called at 840, almost feeling guilty due to them closing at 9....just because we wanted garlic knots delivered to our house. 1 small order of 6 garlic knots...and guess who didn't deny us? Biaggios!!! Freakin rad. We haven't even gotten them yet. But I'm super excited:D and I know they are gonna be amazazing.

y3yR0BoabEuVkjlgvUDBHQ.text: I've never had anything I didn't like! It's the best pizza we've come across in Vegas. The calzones are ginormous and the salads are just as big.

MMl0ulOns6SkzDbrLotiOQ.text: I had the privilege to eat at this fine place during my cousin's wedding (yes, it is a bit unorthodox for a wedding reception), and the food served during dinner (salad, stromboli, lasagna, and cannoli)  was simply EXCELLENT with a lot of distinct flavors in each food served. The place looks small from the outside, but it can sit around 40 people comfortably.   We (including my cousin) all came  WA, CA, TX, FL, and NJ, and none of us live in Las Vegas. The owner and the servers were really courteous and very accommodating all of us. I don't think I have eaten at a place where the owner personally makes everything from scratch and puts his heart into everything he makes/serves.  I highly recommend this place to anybody living in and visiting Vegas.

20vTri5nBBt9luQzNs8hpQ.text: All the 5 star reviews are dead-on accurate. This place is great, the owner is always there, customer service is off the charts and most importantly the pizza and calzones are always cooked to perfection.  Really great dough and high quality ingredients easily make this the best pizza joint in town.  Jason

wXagUpE3BJsar0BtdIXrAg.text: Unfortunately, our experience didn't live up to the reviews we read. We were the only customers in the restaurant when we walked in. During our entire experience, the owner was sitting across from us and didn't acknowledge the poor service we had. We ordered the pizza and meatball sub since we read all about it on this website. Pizza came out and it was ok. Nothing special. I grew up in NY and it's definitely not close to what you get there. So our next hope was the meatball sub except it never came! Once they brought the pizza out, no one ever came back over to refill drinks, etc. When we finished eating, the waitress finally came over and my husband said "so I guess we aren't getting our meatball sub?" She goes oh and walks away, says something to the owner and he says to her "you took the order". We ask for our bill and walk out. There was no apology for the oversight from the waitress or the owner. Needless to say, with subpar food and poor service we won't be back. An experience we were looking forward to definitely ended up to be pretty disappointing.

rtegeTqJ5VqHHuEYiyKU6g.text: Best pizza that I've had since moving to Las Vegas. The Buffalo chicken pizza is awesome!

jWEM4LCFuG7zugtRdkbnag.text: The owner is incredibly NICE! Awesome service! It's a mom/pop type pizza joint with great food. They do deliver anywhere in vegas. I HIGHLY recommend the garlic butter knots.   This place is by far my favorite pizza place in vegas and one of my favorite restaurants. If the drive wasn't so far from me in NW vega I probably would eat here quite often.

MdZ1lJo2hZObJE4ffycetA.text: Solid Meatballs and the garlic knots are to die for.   I have eaten at Biaggio's 2 times now and I've had the 2 slice special each time and my girlfriend normally gets the meatball for us to split it all. The pizza is good for the price but I think there sandwiches especially the meatball sandwich is amazing. I think I heard it's an old grandma recipe for the meatball and they are great. Meadium sized but just right with soft bread.   When we go we always get an order of garlic knots with the marinarra because they are a must have with any meal because they are delicious.   Finish it all of with fried dough and your out the door for under a $20 eating for two.   The Vegas Villains

SETYIA_2SMpIEp240xgIBg.text: If I could sum up the food at Biaggio's in one word it would be "Wow".  We were in town for an ice hockey tournament and found Biaggio's on Yelp.  This place absolutely lived up to the high ratings and high reviews left by other fellow "yelpers".  One of my teammates got the Calzone and it was epic!  Massive calzone and great flavor.  We all tried some and agreed it was the best we have had.  This was by far the largest calzone I have ever seen..... hands down.  Myself and another teammate ordered the meatball sub.  It makes my mouth water just thinking about how good this sub was.  Not only was the sub amazing, Mr. Biaggio (the owner) came by and was very friendly, letting us know the history of the recipe as well as the level of care and attention to detail put into making the sandwich. This is a level of services that I haven't seen in a long time from any restaurant.    Overall great experience from the excellent food and superb customer services.  Highly recommended that if you local to Las Vegas or just visiting to check this place out.

ytGxglIkLwSoDItyBigu6A.text: The crust always makes or breaks a pizza, and this was great! The slices were huge and very reasonably priced! I defiantly recommend this place to anyone looking a few slices for lunch!

MDQMds8yFuamGBiMS2rklA.text: I had a few guests over last night and we decided to order out.  We picked Stromboli from Biaggio's.  There was 6 of us, one man, a couple of delicate flower eaters, and a few more enthusiatic ones.  I never want to commit the party foul of not enough food, so I ordered two meat lover's strombolis and 12 garlic knots.  It was a lot of food because we had also made a large salad to accompany our take-out.  Well, the stromboli was so juicy and deeeeeeeeeelicious, that even our little delicate flowers were taking thirds!!  Yikes!  We almost ran out.  I have had pizza from here before and it too was fabulous.  You can eat in.  The place is small but cute.  The proprietor is very friendly and accomodating.  You must give it a try!

dM0S_ZUpjot7A9itjCw05Q.text: Food just okay. Service to the point of annoyance.  They solicit Yelp 5 stars so keep this in mind when you read the reviews.

vFFEWEXU8E_rsvBYutQpVg.text: Biaggio's is a great local pizza joint with a very friendly owner.  The pizza is New York style thin crust and is very good.  I've also had the calzone and Italian sandwich, both of which were great.  We always order the garlic knots to start and end our meal with the zeppoli for dessert.  Mr. Biaggio is a super nice guy and always makes sure everything is to our liking.  Highly recommended.

rgFXNiYH2gWb66JvWT1-Tg.text: Amazing Italian food - everything is awesome which makes it so hard to choose what to eat.   The owner is incredible and welcoming too.   We will be regulars for sure!!

h9mym_TsJBL13dTsMlmZ7Q.text: "TO DIE FOR"  Biaggio made our trip to Vegas extra memorable!  Thank you for such  great service... we will be back!  SOON!  Your friends from Norwalk

1aj-PVWqGvc3UvTuOqoC_w.text: I placed an order online, got a confirmation and was prompted that it would take an hour at most. Well it has been 2 hours! No delivery and no one is picking up the phone. Safe to say I am starving. Thanks a lot biaggios. Totally bummed.

nTWIJY-eDychiiS9AqdA-Q.text: Absolutely the best garlic knots I've had so far!!! Great thin crust pizza. I didn't have their strombolis however I did watch it go by my table and those things are huge! I love their sauce very fresh tasting very balanced sweet, tangy and garlicky! My sister had their Italian sub very tasty, fresh bread and meats and veggies. Small restaurant but great people running it very friendly and informative! They also have awesome specials! Definitely recommend! Need to go back to get my garlic knot craving fix! Lol ; )

2Y3I_Ssl3tmAcgLBEr6qvQ.text: Food was fantastic, service was even better. We came to Biaggio's for a team dinner after a soccer tournament.  Mr. Biaggio had reserved the place for us and had nice hot food ready when we got there. The boys ate and ate and ate! I was a little hesitant to go because I have to eat a gluten free diet. Mr. Biaggio catered to my every need. He made me the best gluten free pizza, chicken Caesar's salad and cheesecake.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

jywPB6rWOuuPukELVDMXyA.text: I stopped by to get a couple of slices and a drink... I'm happy I did!  This is simply the best tasting pizza you will find anytime soon. The crust had a crispy almost crunchy texture, the sauce was homemade with no added sugar and the entire pizza was cooked perfect.  We went again today and tried the meatballs and also the Philly. The bread on the Philly was fresh and toasted, the meat was not oily or dry and the whole sandwich was very good.   The meatballs... Don't tell my wife, (she is Italian and loves to cook) but they were better than homemade. They were moist and you could actually taste the Parmesan and the garlic...delicious!   UPDATE: 3/20/2011  We returned here because we were craving a great pizza and it appears there have been some changes at Biaggio's. Here's the skinny:   1. It appears they are acquiring their crust from a new source. Usually, the crust is rolled thin and cooks crispy and has a good flavor. This pizza had a crust that appeared to have been rolled, and waited too long rising to be made into a crust. It contained excess amounts of flower which made it taste burnt even though it was undercooked. I also ordered a calzone just to sample how it was prepared. It turned out to be simply another over flowered too thick pizza crust that was folded and pinched on the ends. Again, it tasted burnt and appeared burnt, even though it was under cooked as the cheese was not entirely melted inside.   I am only downgrading my rating from a 5 to a 3 instead of a 2 because the staff is very friendly, and the dining area and bathroom was clean. I know Mr. Biaggio can do better. It was great the first time we were there.

6CXeikjHEHYFtIWJlAWLUA.text: My first time eating their food and everything was great. Since it was my first time I was offered 20% off my order. I ordered their white pizza with sausage and pepperoni and their wings. Everything tasted very good. Only thing I have to complain about is that for $1 a wing, the wings were rather small in my opinion. That's definitely not a deal breaker. They've secured my business.

YpmWB4Yqx3Frg1D96oqKMQ.text: Came here for the Pizza Train Yelp event and I didn't want to leave!  The food here was incredible, oddly enough though the felt the pizza wasn't the best item on the menu.  Don't get me wrong, the pizza here is pretty darn good.  The crust in not too thick and doughy, nor is it thin and crispy.  It is just the right combination of thickness and texture.  Personally, I felt there were two outstanding items on the menu: the buffalo wings and the pastrami stromboli.  I felt these two items were better than the pizza, the homemade family recipe meatballs, and the super-garlicky garlic knots.   First, the buffalo wings.  They were moist, tender, flavorful on the inside and crispy on the outside.  The skin was seasoned just right, not too salty and it wasn't oily or flaking off the wings.  I normally don't like buffalo wings, but I could barely get enough of these.  Also, the sauce for the wings comes on the side, so you can customize the flavor you want or just eat them plain!  Second, the pastrami stomboli.  At first I though what a strange filling for stromboli, but when Biaggio, himself, suggested adding mustard and pickles to it, WOW, it was great!  The mustard and pickles really complemented and brought out the flavors of the pastrami.  There wasn't too much bread or cheese, just enough to add a bit of chewiness and texture to the stromboli.  Lastly, the pastrami stromboli is not on the take out menu, but definitely ask for it!  If savory dishes are not your cup of tea, they also have a limited selection of desserts: italian cookies, canolli, and biscotti.  If you are an early bird, they also have breakfast.  Breakfast at a pizza place is something I have never heard of.  Bagels and doughnuts, along with breakfast pizza.  Or if you are recovery from a late night bender, they will make you a regular pizza for breakfast.  Pretty cool.  Lastly, the customer service of the restaurant put it over the top and earned it five stars.  This place really does put the customer first.  It is pretty much a family run store and everyone was super friendly and welcoming.  Everyone tried to make the dining experience perfect.  Definitely returning for more wings and stromboli and pizza if there is still room.

ydFWnvmW4YOD1-mauMkDDg.text: Pizza for breakfast?  You betcha!    To be honest, the thought of "breakfast pizza" was pretty whacked out when I first heard it, but it worked!  In fact, it was really good!  I brought some in to my work and the reception was incredible!  Noone wanted to try it at first. but as soon as one person had some, everyone wanted it and they all loved it!    I even found out that breakfast pizza isn't as weird as I thought it was.  Several of my staff from the midwest indicated that they'd been looking for it!  So... how does it work?  It's not made with pizza sauce or cheese!  Well... there might be cheese, but I'm actually not too sure!  Instead of cheese, it was actually a pizza crust with a thin layer of EGG!  Then the breakfast toppings such as bacon or sausage came into play.  When you first order it, the crust is nice and crisp, just what I expect from Biaggio's.  The texture is great, the flavors are fantastic, and it's a pleasant change of pace.

Gea2yKngMHKTT6ARkY3hZw.text: Family owned business, clean, friendly, just plain great. The kicker is, the food is amazing too. Where can you find that anymore?

pT64ulSGJTnxqWnhxu6GlQ.text: When I go out to eat, I'm not just looking for good food, I'm looking for an amazing experience.  Biaggio at Biaggio's Pizzeria has set out to ensure that all of his customers get just that.    We are getting married in Vegas this February and I contacted Biaggio after reading all of the awesome Yelp reviews.  Biaggio's enthusiasm was so infectious on the call that I couldn't help but decide to have the reception with this pizzeria without even consulting my other half.    Biaggio kept using these seductive words like "stromboli", "lasagna", and "cannoli" to name a few.  We decided to have a second phone discussion after I actually told my fiance about the reception so that we could finalize the menu.  Unfortunately....I forgot to call!  No worries, I called the restaurant and the next morning when he got the message, Biaggio called me right away.  Then he gave me his cell phone number so that I would never miss him again.  It turns out he is only ever out of the pizzeria on Tuesday nights from 6:30pm on, so I could probably catch him there...nonetheless, he wanted me to be able to get hold of him at all times.  That's what I call commitment to customers!    After this discussion, we finalized our menu.  We are starting with three kinds of stromboli --pastrami, chicken & artichoke, and meatball & garlic as well as a salad that will include roasted tomatoes, artichokes, olives, and three kinds of cheese (amongst other tasties).  The main course will include lasagna, garlic knots, and sausage & peppers.  I'm not sure we will still have space for dessert, but just in case, we ordered cannoli, donuts, and he is throwing in 4 lbs of cookies that his friend who makes the cannoli's makes for free.    On top of the menu, there will be two people to assist with all prep and mealtime issues; the chef will be on hand, and Biaggio himself will be there to help.  He's even shutting the restaurant down from 6pm to 9pm on a Sunday for us.  Talk about service!!!  Biaggio has requested that when we get down to Vegas we stop by to try all of the items that he will be serving, to ensure they are just what we want.  If they aren't, he assures me he will switch them out with something we do like.    This man and this pizzeria have impressed me beyond measure--and I haven't even tried the food yet!  Anyone with this level of commitment to his business and who speaks of his food in such glowing terms is someone I want to do business with.    After the reception I will do an additional review on the food.  If it's even half as impressive as Biaggio himself, I'm 100% sure it will be a 5 star review.

OCOXD-bK5f1N-6nVIun9mw.text: Biaggio's should be the model of what a restaurant should be: high quality food and amazing customer service.  The pizza and everything else is simply amazing.  My friends and I went to Biaggio's because I was amazed at how good their ratings were.  When we arrived we were the only ones there so the owner came out from the kitchen to talk with us. The owner, Biaggio, just emanates with pride in knowing that he uses the freshest and finest ingredients whenever possible.  My friends and I order two vegetarian pizzas, one with mushrooms spinach and ricotta and another with eggplant and garlic, garlic knots, and french fries.  The garlic knots arrived first and they were amazingly moist and garlicky.  When the pizza arrived we were in for a real treat.  The first pizza we received was the mushroom spinach and ricotta.  The first bite was simply delicious.  In my previous experience both mushrooms and spinach have the tendency to make the crust of any pizza turn into a watery mess within a matter of minutes; but Biaggio's crust is quite nearly perfect.  The crust had the right balance of crunch and chewy, yet it held up to all the toppings without going limp, unlike the certain times when I eat at Grimaldi's.  The next pizza arrived, the eggplant is battered and fried before its topped on the pizza, which was a very nice surprise.     Both the quality of the ingredients and the friendliness of Biaggio will have me going back there many times.

4dssTHHVe0albLzk2a4HAQ.text: This is real east coast pizza with fresh real ingredients. The sausage is made from scratch and the dough on the pizza is out of this world. We live in Henderson and this pizza is so good worth the trip. He does delivery to Henderson as well but we love going in. The owner is always happy to see us and it is such a great feeling knowing how he really cares about what he serves and the service. This place is wonderful. I would give it 100 stars if I could.

FkqhLvU7s0ZTGR6Fq3Mn_Q.text: 1st time order: pineapple white pizza delicious over an hour for delivery but was told 40-45 minutes, so when pizza was delivereed it was cold. No biggie, didn't call and complain, just ate it and enjoyed it.  2nd order: Told the guy that last time since they went to the other side of the complex where I lived, to call me first so I could explain directions. He PROMISED he'd call. Dude shows up, without calling, and delivered a HORRIBLE pie. Sure, it tasted good, but it looked like the pizza was on a roller coaster. The cheese "slid" to one side, the pie was completely soggy, so you couldn't enjoy the crust.   Not going to bother giving them my business again. It's a shame though too because the pie itself was good. But the service and delivery are awful. AW freakin FUL!

XvtseJEc02hKkEKppt2wdQ.text: A real pizza at last !! I've been searching for a real good italian pizza for a long time and here's the pizza I've been looking for .... Good food, good service !!!! I'll be back !!!

JqQYccksK_p7Bojuo4iy0w.text: First time reviewer for Yelp... just had to repeat what all the other reviews have said--Biaggio's is the best pizza and sandwiches around!!  Biaggio's rates number 1 in Nevada on Yelp and for good reason... Biaggio really does have the best New York style pizza and sandwiches in all of Las Vegas!  Not that I've tried ever other restaurant, but have tried almost all of the "top 10"  in LV and Biaggio was my favorite.  My brother and I tried the white pizza, the Philly Cheesesteak and the garlic knots with Biaggio's signature marinara sauce.  All were terrific, as other reviewers can attest.  I'm a huge fan of marinara sauce, and you won't find a better sauce elsewhere!  My brother and I got a chance to talk to the owner for awhile about his restaurant and felt at home, we've never been treated friendlier.  Definitely worth checking out if you are in the area, you won't be disappointed!

_6CSR03F6PLA3-1m9o75Pw.text: I absolutely LOVED this place!!! Went there on April 11th with my sisters, sister-in-laws and nieces.   First, the servcie was impeccable, I fell in love with the owner.  This alone will make me go back because you don't get that alot anymore. Second, the food was OFF THE CHAIN!!!! It was absolutly delicious, from the garlic bread knots, to the crispy chicken wings, to the antipasta salad to the all meat pizza.  And OMG lets not forget about the desserts, TO DIE FOR!!!!! Mr. Biaggio you got a customer for life.   See you next time when I'm in Vegas.

bWi8IrlyIJ0h_C-E9qhGvw.text: It's tough to give a five star rating to a small pizzeria in the Home Depot shopping center- BUT it certainly was FIVE-STAR****. The Philly Cheesesteak was  authentic ( I'm from  Northeast Philly) although they use real cheese- not Cheese Wiz-  We sampled the delicious New York style Pizza and a variety of desserts which were extraordinary.  I asked Biaggio where he grew up in New York and he said " Lived in California all my life"  Go figure!

E7fRMQDMPGuLaViLCWWJ_A.text: First time here won't b my last . Thanks to the yelp community , I found this place .      The best part is it's in my hood. I don't think I would have tried it on my own.       We had a large pizza with meatballs, mushrooms and ricotta cheese . All the ingredients tasted fresh, the crust was very good , thin crisp and had a nice chew.  We also had the chix wings , I don't usually order chix wings at a pizza place , but all the positve reviews on these wings i had to try them . The wings are very good and don't need no sauce .       I also ordered the italian sub , all I can say is wow lots of meat( salami , capicola.)  The owner is very friendly and proud of his food as he should be.

Muw6HG1zS73AkPCsPZWsmw.text: Hands down, this place is amazing! Service is great as well as the food. I'm in love with the chicken artichoke pizza. The flavors are amazing and the pizza seems so light. The crust is also something to be happy about. I'm generally not a fan of pizza crust, but Biaggio's has the bet texture.  I must also add that speaking to Biaggio is always entertaining. He is one of the nicest people I have met and he's always happy to make delicious suggestions!

zdPZ9JDV3qxc03Q7eu5WwA.text: I eat here every day for lunch. The owner Biaggio treats us wonderfully and the environment is very pleasant. The food is delicious, he goes out of his way to recommend variety that I may like since I do eat there everyday. I recently tried the breakfast pizza, it is fantastic very unique and very, very good. I would and do recommend that anyone eat here, definitely five stars.

6xMUBdENDihEOGNppYYX9A.text: After looking all over for a cheese steak (pregnant craving) we decided on Biaggio's.  Not at all sorry we did.  First, is the customer service, fanfreakingtastic! We were immediately greeted by Biaggio and he was so nice.  Our waitress, his daughter, was equally fantastic.  She was quick and friendly. While waiting for our order, Biaggio chatted us up about his pizza.  We didn't order pizza but he insisted we try it so he gave us a couple slices.  OMG it was good.  I've been so disappointed with pizza lately that I've pretty much given it up.  My pizza strike is now over.  First we had the garlic knots, so good.  Then Biaggio brings out a few wings for the hubby to try, he enjoyed them very much.  The ranch and the blue cheese dressings are both homemade. Very tasty.  I ordered the cheese steak, it was delicious.  Cheesy and full of onions and the meat was tender and flavorful. Hubby had the baked ziti and loved it. Biaggio brought him out a meat ball that was also delicious.  Our three year old, who is extremely picky said it was the best place ever.  For dessert, we had zeppole. wow, I'd never had it before but it was doughy, sugary little bites of heaven and the raspberry dipping sauce was amazing.  The value for the price is great. The portions are huge and the service is great. We will certainly be back soon and often

z4l8tjlnrhOixZPJdqatDw.text: This is by far the best Pizzeria I've ever been to. As soon as I walked in, Mr. Biaggio welcomed me with a big smile. He treated me like a regular even though it was my first time in there. I'd give it 5 stars just for the excellent customer service (seriously, I don't think you can find any better customer service than at this place)! I arrived a bit early (for pickup) and before I could even sit down, Mr. Biaggio came over and gave me a bottle of water. Even before I left with the pizza, Mr. Biaggio came running over and said, "Let me check to see if it's perfect." Can you name another pizza place that does that?   Now on to the food. It's seriously the closest thing to New York style pizza you can find here in Vegas. The crust is perfect..not too thin..not too thick. I ordered the pepperoni pizza, and boy, do they pile the pepperoni on! I also had the buffalo wings and just like Mr. Biaggio said himself, "They are to die for!". They were perfectly cooked with the perfect amount of crunch to them. And the buffalo sauce was delicious! I also tried the garlic knots and yum...they had a bit of a crunch to them but were soft enough to melt in your mouth. My brother, who is a very picky eater, said that if he could rate it from 1-10, he would rate it a 12. I'll definitely be back! And I'll be sure to tell everyone I know about this wonderful place (in fact, I already started that, hahah). Mr. Biaggio, if you're reading this, thank you for everything tonight! Thank you for making me feel welcomed and treating me like an old friend. I can tell that you really truly care about the quality of your food and the customers. I can assure you this won't be the last time you see me! :D

Suzvgjtqjx4RGrzfjEJ47g.text: Finally! I'm home! I moved here from New York City and it took me two years to find a great pizza restaurant. I ordered two cheese slices to test it out and I had to order two more since it was made exactly how it should be. No other pizza place comes close, and I've been to them all in Vegas. Great job by everyone here.

K2DCupSR95hP81jSvXJ8rg.text: Fantastic & friendly neighborhood Italian restaurant with delicious pizza, pasta, sandwiches and salads. We had lunch a few days in a row here during a hockey event at the nearby rink, tried much of the menu, and were treated like valued regulars from the first moment.  It's a rare treat these days to find a place where the owner is as caring and charismatic as this one - trust us you won't go wrong here.

lIaIyIOy7E18X2F6-rJOzA.text: Went there for lunch today and the wings were out of this world.  I have eaten a LOT of wings and these are hands down some of the best I have ever had.  The gentlemen working behind the counter was very outgoing and friendly, top notch service.

WqrhQYlS9IGpmT1L2v7V6g.text: Love this pizza!!! My favorite place! Garlic knots are amazing! Owner is super friendly and lots of options for vegetarians.

qB5iV0sYBmRZF_uuYY8QgQ.text: Believe the reviews. Wings were plump and crispy, garlic knots buttery and garlicky, sandwiches loaded, and they treat you like you come in there all the time. Will try the pizza next.

cr71aHEROH_O_NRuDo5DCA.text: We were leaving Vegas and looking for a good pizzeria off The Strip for the whole family and Yelp pointed us to Biaggios and we couldn't have been happier.  The pizza was excellent, they were more than tolerant of our loud kids and the owners couldn't be nicer. It's several miles east of the strip, but if you are looking for a reasonably priced meal away from the hullabaloo, this is a great choice. We'll definitely check in the next time we come back.

-sOL6_Pl60F3GP6FhSA6IQ.text: The best pizza in Las Vegas. The people working there are nice and polite. Love the place. Very clean place too.

FlYZohIGvozxf7kn3ROwKQ.text: Being from NY I find it hard to get great pizza out here. There's nothing in Las Vegas that comes close to the excellent service and food that Biaggios provides! The owner is friendly and even gave me 20% off 2 large pies for being a repeat customer! Thank you for a taste of home!

2yAf7fmk0P7ZE8UEId815w.text: The best pizza I've ever eaten!!  Service is personal and outstanding. Highly recommend!!!  Wide variety of choices including specialty pizzas. Veggie pizza is made with fresh vegetables! Have subs, calzones and strombolis, salads, and lots more.  When I need a place to just get away, this is my hide-away.  Shhh... don't give away my secret.

jOXNoWO63N77Rs6RaQ4e5Q.text: I've lived in Las Vegas for over 20 years and this is the best pizza in town! What's equally as impressive is that the owner is so hands on and takes pride in his amazing restaurant. Biaggio knows how to treat his customers. Thank you for the recommendation on the Caesar salad! Now I can eat more of your amazing cannolis!

nan_xxSb-seprlZ-KFrQww.text: The meatball parmesan sub is the BEST!   We had read several reviews and had to try for ourselves and were not disappointed.  Fresh bread, good sauce, oozy cheese and delicious meatball - I can still taste it.  We split a sandwich for lunch, along with an order or wings and didn't eat the balance of the day.  Only change I would make is remove the TVs.   Why do all restaurants feel they have to entertain us with TV when we're dining?  We enjoy the experience of being together and enjoying a meal, but TV noise is quite annoying.

NCLlmmt654W12AqD8-Tqpg.text: Great pizza place! Owner is super nice and friendly.  Come support the small business guy!

Jc5cKHMv_tfVIQKy80BTKA.text: The great reviews on Yelp led my brother and I here. We were warmly welcomed by the Biaggio family. We started with garlic knots. They were tasty - warm, fresh and chewy, but those at the bottom were in a pool of butter. It was not appetizing to me, but my brother loved those drenched in all that garlicky butter. We went with a classic large pepperoni. I thought the crust was really great, crisp and chewy. And it held up well, a feat for NY Style. It was the greasiness that I didn't love. Cheese and pepperoni, should be greasy, but this was more than my arteries could handle. I'd return for veggie pizza or maybe a stromboli or calzone. I heard a waiter talking up the zeppoles for dessert. If I was ever able to save room I'd give those a whirl too.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AKELtYVtXq1eEUh5gbmyPA.text: I love this place! Every item I've had on the menu has always been fresh and so delicious! Not to mention, the owner Biaggio is incredibly welcoming and is always seeking to please his customers. The environment is clean and cozy. I highly recommend you stop by and try out this place, you will not be disappointed!

GZji-9jV8CHpqPAihtsi5A.text: We decided to give this place another try. We ordered a pizza and it turned out pretty good! The dough/bread tasted fresh and it didn't have an old aroma/texture to it this time. Thanks!

zxu1_NQ1WzuK3B3AkfBSCg.text: Food was exceptional and service was even better! The ingedients were fresh as can be. We had the greek salad, hot wings, and an Art of Chicken pizza. Though we stuffed ourselves, we didn't end up with that heavy junk food feeling. We left charged up and ready for our hike at Red Rock.  Thanks so much. Wish we had a place this good in Sacramento!

obTGkyzkx02j3E7FYC5EvA.text: Excellent service & awesome pizza!  We had the breakfast pizza this time & it was delicious.   The strombolis are to die for.  We usually get the meat lovers.  They never dissapoint with anything we've ordered!  Also best zeppoles in town!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast pizza was amazing!

ZIXq4R1qPcs33RGpCp8pXg.text: Very good first experience. Had garlic knots, Greek salad and the a large pie.  Portions are huge. Ranch dressing is very tasty.  Service is fantastic.  Resturant is clean.  I recommend this place for very good pizza. Will be back soon.

7iG2eiIJjGgoA-t7lR-qiA.text: We ordered delivery tonight of two large pizzas and a large Stromboli.  The driver accidentally gave us the wrong order and one of the pizzas wasn't what we ordered.  My wife called and explained what happened.  Biaggio apologized and told us to please eat the wrong pizza, and the correct pizza was on it's way.  Everything tasted great, and the correct pizza arrived in about 30 minutes.  On top of correcting the mistake, Biaggio also included a $30 gift certificate.  That is the epitome of customer service.  Biaggio has always been a class act at all of his establishments and we will gladly continue to order from him!

fsh8ZxynQbZNWL6HHP7wlA.text: I tried Biaggio's for the first time last night. I ordered a large two topping pizza & a small order of garlic knots. The person on the phone quoted me 45 minutes & my order arrived within minutes of the quoted time. The garlic knots were in a brown paper bag on top of the pizza box. The bottom half of the bag was dark & wet from spilled butter. I opened the pizza box & there was a puddle of grease on top of it. My food tasted ok but was barely warm. It cost me $30 for my order. Next time I think I'll just have frozen pizza instead.

_EBMkIcTzgaqwPfOTQ7ixA.text: The pizza is always very well prepared when I come here, I get the pepperoni mushroom usually, the owner is very friendly and I've come here many times before and I can say it is hands down the best pizza in Vegas. Also the garlic knots are delicious they are smothered in butter and Parmesan and usually that doesn't sound very good but they are to die for.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great friendly owner been coming here every time I&#39;m in town since 2012. The pizza is amazing and the garlic knots are to die for!!

RTOABsafAw8W0Fs5Esigaw.text: Amazing. This is hands down THE best pizza I've had since I've moved to Vegas (wings too!) This was delivered to the office over the weekend, along with Caesar salad and garlic knots and the staff couldn't get enough. You know a restaurant is good when you want to rave about every item you had not just one thing in particular.   Surprisingly, living in the area I've never even heard of the place but now I'm addicted, I'll be back with my husband this week.   (So much for losing that post-baby weight, it's worth it!)

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken artichoke pizza and wings

wzioO-eGr4RYeyLo3bG3YQ.text: Hands down! This is the BEST pizzeria you will find in this area and maybe as my bf said anywhere near to NYC. The staff is phenomenal, very hands on & personal. This tiny place tucked back in the strip mall needs large signage to bring the crowds towards its location. My bf wanted great pizza, and this place satisfied him to the core. We will be back and the white sauce is unbelievable, the thin crust was rolled out when our order was placed. It was amazing, I love the edges, bf eats my leftovers from the 2nd piece!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Track this place down and bookmark it, you will NOT be disappointed
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garden salad with ALL the fixins!!
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This half salad is the bomb with olives &amp; cheese chunks

5T1wZRpOHjSyl0athPRC8Q.text: Ditto what Suzanne T below. Biaggio  family personally took care of us & the service was impeccable. Serving our entire grp of 19 is always a challenge & we didn't have to wait much at all. To top it off, the food was DEEEE-Lish!!! We will definitely be back! I highly recommend this wonderful, family style Italian eatery!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OoHjwDX0ktVzWBcG6P8qKg.text: I was excited based on the pictures. We ordered a white pizza with toppings and got a red sauced pizza (super disappointing!) and the bottom of the pizza was so wet and soggy you couldn't pick it up. I also ordered the fried dough and it was the same thing.. incredibly soggy and wet. I wouldn't order from here again and I did spend $50 with delivery, tip, and the food. Waste of money.

aEw607S2mppxUXUOgctUSA.text: I ordered 4 pizzas and a catering size salad for my daughters birthday. I've never ordered from here before so I went based on reviews. It was amazing! Everyone kept talking about how great the pizza was! We got 2 cheese, 1 veggie, and 1 meat lovers. There were no leftovers which I take as a great sign!! The staff was so friendly and helpful to us. Great little hidden gem we found! It's our new go to delivery pizza!!

WNsrwvw-5iQG8Exf-TJXlw.text: This place is it! Food is on point meatball sandwich is bomb.the garlic knots are really GOOD! Great service & the owner came out & welcomed us.  I'm going back again and again!!!

Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

anXoA4UNnecCJ2qHGO3RAA.text: I decided to try this place because it's close to my apartment.  The pizza is okay, it didn't have much sauce or flavor compared to Pizza Rock and Grimaldi's.  We ordered a 12" with pepperoni, ricotta, and basil for $21.  Seems slightly over priced for the size and quality.

z5mzjHRKOdTKjqeYSoXLpw.text: So, I found the customer service to be TOP NOTCH and the pies to be the TOTAL OPPOSITE!  My order consisted of 5 pies, two house/garden salads and wings. The salad was the biggest hit and the wings were decent. The pizza was... Utterly forgettable, and pizza is my FAVORITE FOOD - from gestation to this very day! There is literally too much competition in this arena for me to ever consider Biaggio's for PIZZA again!  I was stuck betwixt Niko's and Biaggio's, and though my gut was screaming "Niko's!" I chose Biaggio's due to the volume of reviews and resulting high average... Which is why I was compelled to write this review!  * Sauce lacked flavor, big time * Cheese was seriously not great * Crust/dough was a solid foundation darn good actually (This is where the greatness ended)  Thank you for your attention

m5AGIGyhf7WsR0TUDy3PAQ.text: I was in the area visiting a family member and we decided that pizza sounded good. She mentioned the typical chain restaurants, but I'm more of the hole-in-the-wall, mom and pop place kind of guy. That being said, I turned to Yelp for help. Biaggio's one of the top rated places in the area and she had never even heard of it! Needless to say, an extra large pepperoni pizza later we were both sold on it and are pretty sure it's one of the best pizza's we have ever had.  Can't wait to be back again! I might even take a trip from Henderson to have it anyway! Side note, I did have an order of wings. You can get them individually, so you aren't forced to get 12 or 8. At .99 cents each, I felt that was too expensive for wings. They also are not tossed in sauce, it is on the side. Kind of weird. But you go to a pizza place for PIZZA, not wings.

EvgeB9ttrD5_UucYquZgTQ.text: Can I give it 100 Stars???  This place is out of this world amazing! We were looking for a pizza place to take our daughter to for her 2nd birthday and got lucky enough to find Biaggio's. The garlic knots and pizza are excellent, and made with the freshest ingredients.  But what truly makes this place stand out is the loving service we got.   I believe it was the owner that made our daughter an order of zeppole and put a candle in it.  He brought it to our table, and sang Happy Birthday to Gia.  (Thank you Mr. Biaggio!) We will make sure to visit this place every time we are in Vegas!  If you are lucky enough to live in the area, this should be your go to pizza place if it isn't already. This place is everything you could hope for.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gia&#39;s 2nd Birthday!

a2cIxTQQ321eQf0HC_6pAg.text: Best pizza I found thus far. If you from the East Coast, you will love this pizza. Sauce reminds me  Brooklyn!

p0CDlDNf5gT8n5r6oeWUQg.text: I ordered gluten free pizza.  Good crust, good taste.  I paid for extra cheese.  You could still see through the cheese on my pizza.  It didn't even seem to have REGULAR cheese.  By the time I paid for my one gluten free pizza, it was over $30.  Meh.

4sOUbBpeCYZVzfw8jdaJNQ.text: I purchased three cannolis to go that totaled a little more than $15.  The cannolis were good, but they were only half filled, there was a two inch gap in the cannoli tube with no filling.  I guess they figure that you won't be in the store when you eat them to complain, so fill them half way.    Needless to say I won't be back!

HvI6oFWF3KTgvUus1hV5EQ.text: Great pizza for the price. You can tell owners take great pride in their business.   They had gluten free options however no dairy free cheese options and that is what we came looking for based on a Google search. However they offered to cook us a pizza if we brought the cheese; that was a first and makes us want to come back!

8UgUc8AI9IygdQjWfUYz8g.text: Once again it's time for our business trip to Las Vegas and Biaggio's Pizza is a must have while we're here.  The Garlic Knots are to die for.  Soft with a lovely crust, mouthwatering garlic butter and the freshest marinara I've ever had.  We ordered a large Supreme Pizza, even though there's just the two of us.  Leftovers are heaven!  Hot, cheesy, the toppings were as fresh as they get.  This place is wonderful and we can always count on a delicious experience whenever we're here.  Thanks Biaggio's!

kLK7w1WB9oO8fP9P6BIpmA.text: Over priced and not that good. The 3 piece chicken fingers for $8.99 is a joke. They are the size of fingers and they taste like something I could buy in the frozen section at the grocery store. If it came with fries I could understand the price a little more. Chicken Parmesan Sub was just ok. Not much flavor and over priced. Large meatball pizza is not the worst but is far, far from good. The crust was doughy. The sauce had little flavor. The cheese and meatball was ok. Zeppole was the best thing there. I wish they were cooked a little longer but other than that I did enjoy them. My family and I will not be coming back. I don't understand how this place is getting so many good reviews.  *I just go a call from the restaurant. They read my review and because we were not happy with the meal they are not going to charge us for it. Because of this very surprising and honest business practice I'm am giving them one more star to make it 3. I may go back in for the zeppole.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $8.99 for this. I put a business card in picture for size reference.

wUkRth8a2kcMq02bL_7oHg.text: This place is excellent. This is not your typical strip mall prop up pizza joint. The pizza quality is excellent. I've been here 4 times and it is perfect every time.

YbX9PDA5A3O8VcukOC9nLQ.text: Wonderful gluten free pizza! Very crispy and wonderful ingredients. I got the "Art of Chicken" (with light garlic recommended).   Service was Kind and caring.   Partner got regular supreme and wings and also loved it. A tiny bit greasy but I'd only go to 4.5 stars.   We loved supporting this small business!

IyEawhEta3Fql96dsVC0IQ.text: Best pizza in Las Vegas, the wings are also amazing!!!  Service is top notch and their staff is very friendly 5 Star!!!

wi2Z9p1MIneWxYzyXg5DYQ.text: Was really craving some "New York style" pizza after a couple hours of letting the kids play at LOL kids.. craving satisfied!!! We ordered a large, and holy moly was it really large! 20"! We also ordered the garlic knots, zucchini fries, veggie salad, and hit wings. Everything was GREAT but my husband said the wings were alright-he's had MANY different wings but loved everything else! The only disappointment is that they aren't closer to our house!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ek0hPliVGO-ikZyPPsasYw.text: $62 for 2 pizza and 20 wings?! OUCH. Over priced so I expected to get my money's worth but all I got was Albertsons quality wings (ew) and the pizzas were ok nothing special because for that price I could've went somewhere else. Only tried this place out because it was near by. Major disappointment please take your money elsewhere for a better price and taste.

HCXGzWqgf_wkyydlxexy_A.text: The service was excellent. We chatted for awhile and while I didn't get his name I believe he was probably the owner/ manager? Pepperoni Pizza: Very good. Thin crust just as I like it. The largest pizza was 10 slices and worked out perfect for 4 of us.  Ceasar Salad: Very good. We asked and were told it would probably serve 4 of us but we ended up needing to order another one and finished that off too.   Zeppoli: Amazing - these were delicious. Hot, airy little fried pillows of dough with a delicious Raspberry Sauce to dip them in.   Next time I'm in Las Vegas and craving pizza I'll be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AuwKXTBdrKl7juhOVKCoGQ.text: Came here while on vacation visiting my boyfriend's cousin and her kids. The pizza was great but what made the place memorable was the service. It looked like it was one man running the show in the dining room but he did not make it feel like that! Super nice, best service we received probably our whole trip!

DneDSJcagnCKfkHMsjCz3w.text: Biaggio's was a comfortable little pizza shop. We dined in for family dinner tonight and it was great.  The gentleman who greeted & waited on us was very nice (I'm sad that I didn't catch his name). He was very attentive and showed a lot of appreciation. I would assume he owns the joint(?). Regardless, the customer service was great.  We ordered a TON of food:  Garlic Knots - these were huge! I was expecting bite size garlic knots; these were more fist-sized. The soft doughy center was easily complimented by the perfectly baked exterior that featured a slight crunch. I do, however, wish there was a ton more garlic on these. I absolutely love garlic & that flavor was lacking, in my opinion.  Fried Mushrooms - YUM! It is rare to find fried mushrooms that aren't completely hidden behind breading.  These were the perfect ratio.  Chicken Wings - another customer stated, "they have the best chicken wings in town" while he saw me flipping through the menu. These were definitely delicious. The wings were moist & tender - served with buffalo sauce & ranch.  Pizza - half Meat Lover's (sub salami for mushrooms) & half White Pizza. The pizza was good - I wouldn't say it's the greatest I've ever had; but it was certainly delicious. The Meat Lover's side had a very generous amount of pepperoni, italian sausage, meatballs & mushrooms. The White Pizza side was tasty as well - I love ricotta cheese!  Thumbs up for overall experience!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic Knots (could use more garlic).
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried Mushrooms - yum!
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Wings w/ hot sauce &amp; ranch

G5EBQH5y7Ka3nwYko7OL8g.text: Best Pizza in town, we tried several pizzas from the NY guys and Biaggios knocks them out of the park.  If you haven't tried it, you should

qHHsb62YZ5idAhHFZqkT0A.text: I take a different approach than most. I love supporting local businesses. I am an owner myself and know the importance of supporting the community.   I really enjoy Biaggio's ... not only because the food is amazing. It's that I can see where my money goes.   When you support some big chain who treats your community members poorly, their kids who work for these establishments are bodies to fill a space and not respected or trained properly.   I urge you whenever you want pizza, fried chicken... pull out your phone and find a local restaurant you can support while also getting your needs met.   Thank you for providing an awesome locally owned and operated choice for me!!!!

kZSJsSbPiNJurDfc8kA4TQ.text: We were looking for a pizza place to replace Enzo and we found it very good pizza and amazing service!!! Highly recommend!

jHQM6MqdVpByDxeg5vMqCQ.text: Pizza is great the owners are friendly and every time I've ordered anything it's always tasted very fresh

lomotmHrMWXUcAX8rx5W2w.text: I was visiting my best friend while she was in town and a group of us were in need of some food quick.   Yelp to the rescue and here is where we find Biaggio's Pizzeria.   Pizza and wings always sound like a good idea for late night cravings.  We ordered a XL supreme pizza and wings. The wings were delicious !  Super crispy, perfect amount of crunch, and juicy warm meat.  Being a pizza joint, the pizza was ok.  Nothing too special or nothing to rave about.  I would've liked it if the pizza crust was a little bit thicker to be able to hold a slice in my hand.  Overall, they accomplished their task of satisfying our late night cravings.  $45 for a XL pizza and 20 wings is a bit little pricey, but if I was in the neighborhood I would definitely come back for the wings.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Pizza

7Qyz2Ydy2mGE_Tn22Lxbvg.text: This is my favorite pizza place in the valley so far! I have gotten their margarita pizza a couple times now and I am never disappointed! The owner is also very friendly.

eonBEoNdTABRlIE6e-yD2w.text: We called multiple spots to ask for a reservation for 25+ people and no one wanted to set a reservation. We are here from California for the finals in a competition  and we found this amazing spot. They were more than willing to seat the whole party. Even better, they basically closed the shop down just for us. Not only did they go above and beyond, they exceeded our expectations. Even though the drive from the Las Vegas strip was 20 minutes, it was more than worth the drive. We appreciate everything you did for us Paul and will definitely recommend and return to this spot when we are back in Vegas. Thank you!!!

0UEk31yz7mn2dzc6SpeHsg.text: Salads are awesome I love this place! Food is great and Service is Amazing. I enjoyed eating there but they also deliver to my job! Great experiences every time!!

KUa6hOqPgGkbXU93gNLPlA.text: Walked into pizzeria for a quick bite to eat for lunch since I had an appointment next door! I was greeted very kindly by a Man at the register. Inside was very clean! And I was so happy the pizza was amazing!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

m-vLPEBAqFzDn_97z3m93Q.text: As an, 'Up-and-Coming Regular,' I appreciate that Brandon and Paul BOTH -recognize regulars here BY NAME!!

VkJ0hBFMHhldrJkOJZgvqQ.text: This place has the absolute best food! Today we had mozzarella sticks, pepperoni pizza and Philly cheese steak! Everything was hot and delicious... the marinara sauce was on point!!!  The owner is so kind and polite! The place is super clean and welcoming!  The service was great- couldn't ask for a better late lunch!!!!  We will be back for sure- I want to try all the specialty pizzas!

dv1DgFAqyDLnpJc5Ve-6QA.text: I normally go here after Goodwill. I go With Jacob D, Caleb, Austin, Cheyenne, Jesse, Colin, and Drake. I normally get the chicken fingers and fries. But today I got to Philly cheesesteak sub with fries. They have menu items on the walls. They have the art of chicken pizza, pepperoni pizza, Italian sub, cheesecake, veggie salad, cheese pizza, two slices and drink, Spaghetti and meatballs, chicken wings, Zeppole, sunshine pizza, and garlic knots. The place is on Fort Apache and flamingo. And it's beyond habaneros. There are other places around here like subway, sweet tomatoes, and five guys. And to Goodwill is close by.
