Also, I wasnt the biggest fan of the decor, i dont think that the oversized pictures of food fit this place very well.  Biaggios is pizza without equal in west las vegas, give it a shot you wont be dissapointed.

lqAm100llqeqJcI8CT1H5g.text: I really liked it. They use fresh stuff and the guy is so friendly. I like italian pizza so i was so happy with that.

uOkTVomXD0Z8FS4qIUTo5Q.text: Thought we were just going to a little pizza joint with great reviews and we left with our new pizza joint.  Never again will we dial the number for on of the chain pizza places when we have such an amazing place nearby.    Service was amazing!!!!  Alycia is our new favorite waitress.  She was super friendly, made suggestions and made us feel very at home.  Biaggio was just as great and made us feel like family.    Everything we ordered was amazing; garlic knots, wings, buffalo pizza, art of chicken pizza, and topped it off with zeppoles.  I swear we had to roll out of the restaurant when we left.    Ignore the less than flattering reviews and come try it for yourself, you won't be dissapointed!

M700QQbTJH7v9SSTpH3vPQ.text: Amazing gluten free options!!! The pizza is so delicious, the best we've found in Vegas:-) We've had both GF and regular crust, both are great. Desserts are wonderful, cheesecake and cannoli The owner is so thoughtful, the kind of personality that actually adds to the dinning experience. You really should try this place!!

ZWypGGeK3_92eExBvNGZoQ.text: Omg I think this is the best pizza in town!!! We had a large 1/2 meat lovers and 1/2 supreme. And yes it was perfect. The toppings are not the cheap kind. Perfect crust and sauce. Also tries the garlic knots. Yum!! And we met the owner. He was very friendly and even offered drinks while waiting for our pizza.

qadZE5B2OA2Bu6NOZMjT_g.text: Im from New Haven, Connecticut and moved to Vegas 3 years ago.  I can NOT find a good pie out here at all....until i walked into this place.  Biaggio is not only a great pie maker, but a great person.  When I walked in there, it was that "mom and pop" type shop that reminded me of home.  Between the wings, the pizza, the zeppolis .....you couldnt be happier being stuffed with good food.  5 stars EASILY.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rteeiZgAGNbvSS4rP0MX_w.text: At last, the vicious cycle of pizza belly has been ended by a gentleman by the name of Biaggio who is crankin' out "to die for" pies with fresh ingredients and quality cheese. Okay, so "to die for" are his words, but the za here is full of love and tastiness. Talk to Biaggio, and he explains that the ingredients in the pizza do not include sugar or salt, which may explain why my belly doesn't freak out after some slices here. Quite the opposite, my belly cries, "More, more, more!" Last night, we went with spinach, mushroom and garlic, and the ingredients were all fresh, distributed nicely, and somehow did not leak water all over the pizza. The crust was crisp all the way to the center.    As for the crust, it isn't sweet or salty, but the texture is the just right combination of chewy and crispy, and even more impressive, when you do the oven reheat the following day, the crust is just as spectacular.   On a previous occasion, I had a chance to sample several more treats thanks to the generosity of Biaggio. Of the specialty pies, the chicken artichoke stands out, but if you are an absolute meat lover, the homemade sausage here has quite the ingredient list. Did I hear him correctly, veal? Sausage isn't really my thing, but I found myself making an exception for the breakfast pizza. What? Did I say breakfast pizza? Yes, and I think it could go toe to toe with your favorite breakfast burrito.   One other item worth noting, which isn't on the menu, is pastrami stromboli. Pastrami is another thing I generally do not eat, but this creative creation called to me and said, "How can you not eat just one bite?" I did with some pickles and mustard, and then I had to eat another bite. The ease of cutting a scrumptious bite, stabbing a pickle and dipping in some mustard made it hard to not keep shoveling it down!  Oh, and I didn't even mention the blue cheese dressing. If blue cheese is your condiment vice, be careful here. I think I order salad just so I have an excuse to stuff Maytag chunks in my mouth.   Pizza, sausage, cheese combined with a passionate business owner: not sure if it gets much better!

VyCaTXGkQ8gCPJoOghhEaA.text: Just Awesome!    Went in here for the first time a couple of months ago.  Had the meatball sub.  I love the meatballs!!  Very tasty. While there the owner came by and asked if it was my first time here and I said yes, and then he gave me slice of pizza to try!  It was really good!  It is on the greasy side but that's what makes it taste so good.  I mean it wasn't overly or anything, just more taste than other pizza.  I don't know I loved it.  I also order out from time to time from this place.  The online ordering system is quite easy to use.  I don't beleive they give you a time of when they will deliver like some places but about 45 minutes sounds about right.  If they have any questions for you they will call you and ask.  I know one time I placed an order for meatball parm and I got the meatball sub and called it in and they made a return trip to give me the meatball parm :) that was very nice, I was more concerned that I received the wrong order!   Very nice...very good on service too.  I've had no problems with them that they didn't take care of me.  Also the prices are not bad, very affordable.  I love eatting their parm, it's like spagetti and meatball but with baked cheese on top that's nice and gooy yum!  Always fresh and hot when it gets delivered...If I feel like staying home and getting some pasta this is my go to place. :)

1La4i6u6uDNF3JnfekaZCg.text: Words can not describe this pizza. GO! We visit every time we are in Vegas. The owner is super nice. The food is amazing. Love Love LOVE this pizza.

6gWVSEeQAYc4W0reYtBqvA.text: Maybe we tried them on an off night. Ordered mild chicken wings, while they were cooked right they were more like plain. Ordered the pizza extra crispy, but it arrived soggy with undercooked toppings - I think it would have been tasty if it hadn't been so soggy. We had Spagetti with Sausage and I think my hubby had Chicken Parmesan. Red sauce wasn't anything to write home about, not nearly as good as our old Italian home delivery spot from La Famiglia on Durango.  The search for our weekend italian delivery joint continues.

ptLfc3slFvV_Md6DHkabXA.text: I came here with my friend after learning that our first choice for italian eatery closed down... I suggested going here after reading it's stellar reviews on yelp. You can tell it family owned & operated before you even walk in the door.  We even met the owner himself  The staff was extremely helpful, kind, accomodating. We started off with wings and buffalo sauce on the side since my friend is a pansy and he doesn't take too well to hot things. :D The wings were delicious by themselves. Nice and crispy yum. I was starting to get full... We also order two whole pizzas they came out. I forgot to tell you... THE PORTIONS ARE EFFING HUGE. I managed to get down two slices  Biaggio made sure to check up on us from time to time to see how we were doing.  We got a nice surprise and out came these little fried dough covered in sugar with fruit jelly and chocolate dipping sauce. They reminded me of beignets and were oh so utterly delicious.  I felt like I was going to fall into a food coma before the fried goodness came out but I couldn't stop putting them in my mouth. HAHAHAHHA  A+ in my book.

lCmPoin2DeZbYJ41xnavTQ.text: We got there around 7:30 PM. The shop was busy since there was a party of 10 and only 2 servers. I usually don't eat Fettuccine but Chicken Alfredo Fettuccine was very good. Mozzarella sticks were chewy and delicious. The Meatlover pizza was good but a bit expensive for its quality.  The only thing I can't bear was the spaghetti sauce. It had weird taste and I couldn't explain how. It wasn't sweet and tasty. I'm not sure if it was original Italian spaghetti sauce but it wasn't good to me.  I think this restaurant is a bit overpriced for the pizzas. We ended up paying $80 for 1 medium pizza, 2 dishes of spaghetti, 1 fettuccine and 1 mozzarella stick dish. I will come back for the Fettuccine.

PF_81N7hTVNVs3lXlJe4eA.text: Found this place on Yelp, in search of a new pizza spot. As soon as we (my BF and I) walked in we got greeted.   We ordered the garlic knots, and the meat lovers pizza with ricotta cheese, mushrooms, and green peppers added. We received our garlic knots first and they were absolutely delicious! I love that they leave the garlic sauce sauce at the bottom so you can dip it in there too or in the marinara  sauce!   We got our pizza and let me just say this is how pizza should be! They are definitely generous with their toppings, the sausage is delicious as well as everything else.   Definitely a place to come back to!   Service was amazing too kind server and the owner was there I think.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat lovers large pizza with ricotta cheese, mushrooms, and green peppers added. Really really good!

9jjqh9LtU5a4rmgchzHeww.text: We ordered the Garlic knots, the antipasto salad, and an order of onion rings. The garlic knots, no exaggeration were in a pool of garlic oil about 1/4-1/2 inch deep. The onion rings were completely soggy, and not even cooked really. This I expect was due to them not taking enough time to let the deep fryer hit the proper temp, or they just pulled them out too early.   The salad was not at all like in the picture, and overall wasn't flavorful. The whole order was a huge disappointment because I had to set the onion rings and knots onto paper towels to drain some of the grease, then heat up the oven, and actually cook them to the point they weren't sopping with grease. There wasn't much we could do to improve the salad so we just ate it. Overall it was a solid 1 star except the delivery was pretty quick. There is also a very subtle $4 delivery fee believe it or not, which I thought was ridiculous and if they had told me that or given me a total on the phone I would have just canceled the order right then and there. Between tip and delivery fee and tax I paid almost 100% extra! Wow, not going back, and back off of the garlic oil that is just insane.

xGKqyJmjWEdVQ7UQfA-LyQ.text: I went here specifically to try their breakfast pizza. I had contacted them ahead of time to let them know since I was going with a small group. So, when we got there it seemed odd that they weren't ready for us. Tables were dirty from the night before, tables and chairs for outdoor seating were stacked inside, etc. Odd, but no big deal.  We ordered garlic knots, drinks, and 2 breakfast pizzas (one veggie & one meat lovers). We were disappointed that "breakfast" doesn't include coffee, but whatever.  The breakfast pizzas were pretty delicious. The crust was thick and crispy with great flavor. The one with meat had generous amounts of ham, bacon, sausage, egg...it was fantastic. The veggie one had peppers, onions, spinach, tomato. Basically an amazing omelette pizza mash up.  The breakfast pizzas are only available on Fri & Sat 10-11a. You should definitely make an effort to check them out!!

KH5Lbav00kH2MYs97myyug.text: I moved here from NYC, so I am always on the hunt for good pizza out here. I ordered a custom pie of mushroom, sausage and meatball. I also got mild chicken wings and garlic knots.  PIZZA 4/5 Sauce: bland Toppings: pretty good Dough: Thin (the way I like it)  GARLIC KNOTS 0/5 Not a fan. The garlic knots didn't have any visible garlic on it. It didn't even have a garlic taste to it. I had to dip it in garlic powder. Also, texture is way too soft and pillow-y. You know garlic knots are amazing if you breathe on someone after you eat it, and it offends them  CHICKEN WINGS 5/5 I liked these a lot. Perfect crunchy texture, flavor was great. Nice touch that they included hot sauce with the wings (tastes like Frank's Red Hot, my favorite)  OTHER SAUCES 0/5 Marinara sauce for garlic knots: Bland and flavorless Bleu Cheese for Chicken wings: it looked watered down, and looked really weird.  SERVICE 5/5 I called for pick up, and the woman on the phone was friendly. When we went to pick it up, she gave me some oregano and garlic powder to go.  TOTAL ~ 3/5  I'm on the fence of whether or not I'd come here again. I need to try other pizza places first. I would def come back for the wings if nothing else.

MTNIDZcOvSxjyferyNSCDw.text: Pizza and the wings are delicious! The pizza crust is so good that you have to eat another slice. We ordered 12 wing and changed the order to a bucket just to get more. I will definitely come back

0NOTfJVQhtFIKzPCrRZBKw.text: My girlfriend and I ordered a pizza, garlic knots, a cannoli, and a 2 liter Pepsi. I am going to have to tell you, it is the best pizza I have ever had! The Art of Chicken was the name of it. Try it! I recommend it! The knots were nice and buttery, just the way I like them! I don't know about the cannoli yet because I'm taking a break right now as I am in a food coma! Thank you for making such awesome pizza! And the staff are super awesome as well! Well done!

GtbfN32sY3Ootb9pZK__Pw.text: What a hidden gem. I'm Gluten Free, and finding a delicious GF chicken Parm, and Ravioli is amazing enough, but the sauce is also sugar free and salt free (although your taste buds would never know). The owner himself (The smiling guy with the shaved top) is also GF, and takes great pride in creating safe, healthy, delicious cuisine for his clientele. I will be back, and I'll be bringing my friends (GF or not) with me again and again.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten Free Chicken Parm, and GF Vegi Ravioli in a homemade sugar free sauce. DELICIOUS!!!
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VF3H01RtHXZIo1GujxDzSA.text: Love this place! Great pizza & wings + outstanding customer service! I really love this place - EVERYTHING is delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mushroom pizza &amp; wings

1-qfCnaOyfmUkCpNcWqdng.text: This restaurant is such a find!!! Everything is freshly made, even the salad dressing! The veggie salad was tangy and delicious. The garlic knots come out in a pool of luscious, warm garlic butter. The pizza is to die for (we had the meat lovers and the sunshine).  The greatest surprise of the day was the warm, fresh zeppole. We will be back again and again. Fantastic!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EuDfp_EYto5WaUIQsykV5A.text: After reading some of the previous review, I thought I'd give this place a try. It was amazing! Hands down the best pizza I've ever had!   The owner/operator, Mr. Biaggio, really knows his stuff! His family is from Sicily and he makes all the meatballs and italian sausages himself! I ordered the meat-lover's pizza and was not dissapointed in the least. All of the ingredients, at least according to Mr. Biaggio, are top quality and it definitely showed in the pizza. Definitely worth every penny.   On top of that, his customer service is impeccable and he is really friendly and personable. 10/10 would go again! I'm definitely gonna tell my friends in Vegas about this one!

-EoSiG7Nm0AcfcNiVAQNfQ.text: BEST PIZZA, Mr Biaggio and his son are always very friendly, make sure everyone that dines in or take out is well taken care of...they makes you feel like your part of their family.   I would recommend the The Works, All Meat or the Art of Chicken Pizza but don't stop in just for Pizza try their Chicken Wings....THE BEST WINGS, love all their salads and you can't go wrong ordering any of their Pasta dishes too. The Meatballs and Sausage are made in house soo goood.   If your not stuffed after all that try the Fried Dough or Zeppole! :)

3W1b2avoC5hLofV85wnv_A.text: You guys rock! Once again our pizza, salad and zeppole were great! We order all the time. Some times it's delivery and some we pick up but the food is always great! Love that we can order through Yelp and it saves our orders since we don't really change much we can just re-order. The only thing we don't like is when we have to wait an hour for our pizza...but tonight it was here in less than 45 minutes so we will take it! The delivery guy was very cool and had great manners and engagement with us. We don't order in food very often (in fact hardly ever) but when we do this is the first place we think of. Even if we are at a friends house this is where we order from.  Thanks guys!

aBYm0KoNn2vSMuv62I1m-w.text: A little expensive but amazing pizza and worth every penny!  The place is very clean and Biaggio is a great host

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

od8tMKJBTaSCieiWZZetbQ.text: This place was great!! We had a large Hawaiian, Sausage, & Cheese pizza and it was fantastic!! The service and food was more than satisfactory. My mom and I both give the food and service 5 STARS!! The owner Mr.Biaggio was very open to speaking and made sure we were taken care of.  I will definitely be back to try more than pizza. Looking forward to the wings,meatballs, calzones, etc...

xJWeuBaUr8kHDjYP44Em2w.text: Pizzas with amazing natural homemade taste, all ingredients taste fresh, definitely you have to try them. They have gluten free pizzas.

xI-C9XnH_5oDM4A_HVfDkQ.text: Ok, I'm over this place without a doubt. The wings tasted old with bad fryer oil. The pizza meat was nasty, and the zeppoles, which used to be little pillows tasted like fishy dough balls. We have ordered here for years upon years. This was always an old faithful go-to; even though we knew we would pay more for the product . As nice as our delivery guy was, he broke my credit card when he went to swipe my card. He said the owner would be in touch with me, but I haven't heard a peep.

EY89aucFPnFldP5ckUBAAw.text: Staff was patient on the phone placing order and more wonderful when I arrived to pick up the food. GREAT fresh light pizza,  the dough was fresh and all the food was cooked perfectly.

FIQe-lQRN3fQ58nrTjCXbg.text: Two stars because I could have just saved 11$ by going down and picking up my food from them. They aren't even a whole mile away and there's a delivery charge? Never again even though the food was decent. Didn't even tell me on the phone there was going to be a delivery charge. Then the driver wouldn't let me keep   Changing it to one star now because I got a great comment from from the place about how "EVERY pizza place has a delivery charge and it goes to driver and I'm a cheap ass" No, no, every place does not have a delivery charge. Especially a 5$ charge for less than a mile. And the driver told me he does NOT get the charge for himself which is why I tipped him 6.58$ on top of the delivery charge. So if you say he is getting more than a 20% tip for not even restaurant sit down service, and acquired it through means of manipulation then o am correct in my assessment of not patronizing this place in the future. Who the hell wants to pay 45$ for a pizza and cheap sandwich?

wQXrpONGVHos26Pivzn1CA.text: Delicious pepperoni pizza, fresh crisp salad with a very nice house Italian dressing. Just hits the spot after a long day of tournament competition.   Comparable to our favorite pizza restaurants in the Seattle area - in other words - very good.

F5LThmVFBObvPxMY_ISmqQ.text: There are so many pizza joints in Las Vegas. However this place is by far the best! Thank you yelp for the great reviews. The portions were huge and the price is more than fair. What makes this such a great place to keep coming back to is the service! Thank you John!

o_crKCbXXR6BOfQ46QcLew.text: Best salads pastas and Stromboli in las Vegas! We had the greatest experience here not only because the food is excellent but the staff is so courteous and welcoming. The owner Biaggio is also very accommodating and kind which just adds so much more to our culinary experience. Best Italian food in Las Vegas!!

T-6P35-I0ZRDl6xKjB-gCw.text: I've been a customer of Biaggio's for a few years but sadly I will no longer be doing business with them. When I first found Biaggio's, they really had the best pizzas in the SW Vegas area. The pizzas were delicious and you could tell that they were made with good ingredients. They were also reasonably priced. What made this place even more convenient was that you could order online instead waiting on hold (this place would get busy during meal times). However, in the last year or so the quality has declined. The pizzas were still decent but almost every time I would order there would be mistakes. Regardless if the order was placed over the phone or online, some how some way the order would end up being incorrect and my wife and I would have to wait 30+ minutes for the correct order to be delivered (anyone who has been in this situation can attest to how frustrating this can be especially when you are hungry). At first they used to provide gift certificates and Mr. Biaggio himself would deliver the correct order with a sincere apology but this doesn't happen anymore. The drivers deliver the corrected order and hardly seem apologetic or sympathetic. This place has really declined over the last couple of years and it is saddening because I really used to enjoy their food. Hopefully they can turn things around before more people follow suit and bring their business elsewhere.

nU6g2E4sTBO5mADXvGFLgA.text: My husband and I decided to have dinner at Biaggio's Pizzeria on 2/16/11 while on vacay thanks to the helpful advice of other Yelpers. This place is AWESOME!!! Everything about this restaurant is 5+++++++ Stars! From the exceptional front line service of Mr Biaggio and his daughter all the way down to the ingredients that he uses, you can tell Mr Biaggio takes his restaurant seriously. We really enjoyed being able to meet and chat with Mr Biaggio himself! What a great guy to take the time to get to know and meet his customers! Between the two of us, we ordered the garlic knots, chicken parm sub, and a small supreme pizza. There are no words that can express how delicious the food is here. All I can say is that you must visit Biaggio's Pizzeria when you're in the area to understand exactly what I mean. You can most certainly feel and taste the love and pride that goes into all of the food made here. The ingredients that he uses are of fine dining quality and his recipes are authentic. I will now review the 3 items that we ate.   Garlic knots:   To die for!!! These garlic bread knots have the perfect crusty outside with a soft and chewy middle. The garlic knots are complemented with a marinara sauce that is perfect in consistency, texture, and flavor. We were shocked when Mr Biaggio told us that he does not use salt in his marinara sauce. The medley of spices and herbs that he uses in his sauce make up for the absence of salt. The garlic knots are buttery with the perfect amount of garlic used. He also uses real shredded Parmesan cheese to top the garlic knots and not the cheap, powdery stuff that comes out of a can.   Chicken parm sub:   The bread used for this sandwich is fabulous! Mr Biaggio told us that the bread he uses for his sandwiches are made by an older Italian gentleman who has been making bread for years! One bite into the bread and you can taste the years of experience that went into making the bread. The crust is perfectly crusty with a soft and chewy middle. The taste is perfect. You can tell that the bread maker is a master of his craft. The chicken inside the sub is plentiful and has a perfect balance of seasoning. Once thing that we noticed about his chicken parm sandwich that is different from others is that he cuts up the chicken into bite size pieces which makes eating this sandwich easy and quite pleasurable. And of course, as I mentioned above, the marinara sauce used in this sandwich was perfect and complemented the sandwich well.   Small supreme pizza:   Small!!? This pizza was quite large for a "small size". The toppings he used were plentiful and of superb quality. The amount of sauce and cheese used was perfect. The pizza's crust was quite tasty and enjoyable all the way to the crust. There is a perfect balance of the amount of toppings and sauce that he uses because the pizza was not a soggy mess like some other pizza's that flop and sag. Our pizza was quite enjoyable down to the last bite!   In summary, Mr Biaggio and his daughter go out of their way to make you feel at home. Their warm and friendly disposition make you feel as if you are eating in their families home. The food here is amazing and very plentiful. The prices here are low and very affordable. The quality of the food is of fine dining caliber without the high prices and the recipes used here are authentic and perfected. Our whole experience here was a 5++++++ Star one and we will definitely be back next year for more. Would I recommend eating here? Are you kidding me? YES! YES! YES! You will not be disappointed! The only bad thing about eating at Biaggio's for us is that now since we do not live in Vegas, we'll have to wait a whole year till we can have more! Eating Italian food anywhere else will not be the same for us now that we know how Italian food is supposed to taste like thanks to Mr Biaggio! Mahalo(Thank you in Hawaiian) Mr Biaggio for an outstanding dining experience!

2_7aFZuOxpqlF4aFvrt8Nw.text: Had the veggie pizza but held out on the olives...olives no good for me :(  Service was great, pizza was even better.  For sure fresh ingredients...

B7_bkszWY_qhLb6crceuNg.text: Again, I can't emphasize just how GREAT the customer service is here. I ordered a pizza 2 nights ago and was told it would about 45 min to arrive. 40 minutes later, I get a call asking if I had received my pizza yet. I had not. They apologized that the order was printed but was somehow overlooked by the cook. My rushed my pizza and it arrived less than 20 minutes later, and was FREE of charge. Basically, the pizza only took 15 minutes longer than I was originally expecting, but I didn't have to pay for it. Very few food establishments these days place such an emphasis on customer satisfaction. Good for you Biaggio and Jim.  I've ordered from here about dozen times, and they hardly ever screw up. When they do make a mistake, they DO make it right by the customer.

gmkAAuVgx6oYAJsVZgdtsg.text: I read the reviews on Yelp about Biaggio's and decided to try it. The owner waited on me. While I was waiting for my Stromboli to come up, he generously gave me a slice of cheese pizza and a coke.  I found this highly unexpected, and very kind. He had me with his generosity, but after trying the meatball Stromboli, he really had me. The Stomboli was incredible!!! I can hardly wait to try some of the other items that people are recommending here.

TV6tnLuSChUbhginrmbB1w.text: should have give them zero star  what a shittty pizza we have ever eat never order from these guys. dough was so rough and barely have enough cheese on pizza we even paid $20 tip to driver but actually pizza tastes sucks and not worth ordering it. u guyz messed it up our dinner....

wyznfif7qSeYjLbadztw8Q.text: Over priced mediocre food. Lousy service and terrible location. Just order Pizza Hut your stomach will thank you!!

nTszyzTW_q5uPp7Vyru8vQ.text: Love, love, love Biaggio's Pizzeria! For my son's birthday, he wanted to eat pizza, so after reading reviews on Yelp, I decided to check Biaggo's Pizzeria. The owner greeted my family & I as we walked in. He was super duper friendly & the place was so clean. I felt so comfortable being there. The owner & staff was so nice, I couldn't believe the how great the service was.  As soon as my son told him it was his birthday, he gave him a donut w/ a candle & also a donut for my other younger son. He brought out his staff to sing the Happy Birthday song to him. As we were waiting for our food to go, he let us try some delicious Italian cookies. Everything was so freak'n good! The pizza's, the meatballs, the chicken wings, the bread & the cookies. I love this place! For my opinion, I think they have the best chicken wings ever. Loved everything I ate here. Even though it's my first time being here, I thought that the owner gave us the best & friendliest pizzeria experience.

-0LlmkjzUUI2_B3dNRJosg.text: Though not on the menu, the Pastrami Stromboli served with mustard and pickles was fantastic. The quality of the meat was high and the dough was perfect. I plan to visit again and again until I work through the entire menu.

dzNobSEYfqcIuJGRl0mvng.text: This is a great gem and I'm glad I finally stopped in. So far the meatball sub is my favorite, the balls are so good and with the cheese its the best! The pizzas are really good too you can taste the quality in the ingredients. Mr. biaggio aims to please. If you're on this side of town you have to give them a try and I'll think you'll agree.

BMfQBzSDQ5YiBxdLP2XBtQ.text: We got here right before it closed and I was worried it would not be as good at the end of the day... BOY was I wrong!! The salad was so cold and fresh the garlic knots..Well let's just say bring me another round!!! and the Pizza was excellent.. We will only go here for pizza from now on!!

r6DHsJYH8RfDSXgdoEws3g.text: I'll admit that I'm a bit hard on pizzerias. This town is severely lacking and when one stands up above average I will acknowledge it. This place is above the average Las Vegas pizzeria. The pie had a good flavor, the sauce is definitely better than most. The crust is very good as well. I've now ordered three times from this location. It has a lot of potential. There are things I really liked and things I'm not crazy about.  First and most obvious problem is that they are closed on Sunday. Are you f*&cking kidding me?? It's a pizzeria, closed on a Sunday. That's blasphemy. Football, pizza, wings, and beer. That's the way it is meant to be. Ok so with that initial disappointment aside let's move on.  If you want legit reviews, ignore the 5 star ones. They are bought and paid for because the owner will do whatever to get 5 star reviews. I'm not saying he actually gives money for em, but he will give away food and gift cards like it's water if he knows you're a Yelper. That doesn't really sit well with me. I thought I was alone till I read the other real reviews here. The pizza was good one out of the thee times I ordered (only after my bad review), and definitely in no way is a 5 star product. Don't be whores Yelpers!!   The first time I ordered everything was pretty good. The pie was a little undercooked for my taste but everything was ok. The second time was just awful. My pizza was very undercooked and the cheese was running everywhere, the calzone was also undercooked as in nearly raw.  So the third time I ordered everything was near perfect. I ordered a Sicilian and Garlic Knots. The Garlic Knots were similar to New York. It brought me back home the whole time I was devouring them. The Sicilian was definitely one of the best I've had in town. It was tasty and thick (refrain from the That's what she said for a moment.) It was also soft and had the perfect chewiness to it. It's a rectangle cut into 8 squares. In New York you usually get a square pizza that takes up an entire 16" box but here it is common to find them in this 8 slice rectangle. Which is fine, but I absolutely love the giant square style because you get those awesome center pieces which has no crust and is just cheesy goodness on every side. Just be prepared that you will probably have a longer wait if you order a Sicilian. The first time I tried to order I was told the wait was at least two hours (WTF?) and I was starving, so I ordered a regular pie. The next time I prepared myself and ordered early, it was delivered in an hour and a half which was very bearable considering I was expecting two hours.  Now they are pricey, but if the food is as good as the last time I ordered it, then it isn't too bad. After a few bumps along the way I could see this place having potential. They just need to work on their consistency. It's holding me back from being a regular here.

iKyR3gaDohpXn-gAfBrniA.text: Slowly turning into my favorite pizza place. It's a little small and casual, but I'd rather have it cozy than big and restaurant-chain style. Try as much as you can, I did the knots, wings, and pizza with a friend and we finished everything. I only wish they were open on Sundays.

-IYG4o7y5mRKZrf63qQpAw.text: Great Pizza! Nice light dough, great tasting sauce, premium cheeses used. Very friendly owner. Just like New York!

nkbAB7aPJyr0r6DNYQXV1Q.text: Me and my partner had the wonderful privilege of having dinner here for a wedding party we were attending for his cousin.  All I can say is OMG!!! :-)  After growing up in NY in an Italian family then moving to California to be with the love of my life, I can never seem to find a small taste of home.  Well I found it here and all I can say is thank you very much..  Now I have to stop back in next time I am in Vegas.  Keep up the wonderful work and I will make sure all my friends know where you are..

Ac5_HB9zpEHaulzOWKyWdw.text: Wow!!  Took the advice of other yelpers and tried Biaggio's. The pizza was AMAZING!  The crust was crispy, chewy and exactly what I've been missing since I left NY. Wife had the spaghetti which was also great. Biaggio was in the house and when he found out we were brand new he started bringing out the food. Breakfast pizza was delicious, meatball sub was the best I've had ever. Not just best in Vegas, best ever. Completely stuffed, the man then brought out a plate if cookies which were also amazing. Try the rainbow cookies. It's really a pleasure to dine at a place where not only is the food amazing, but the owner clearly takes tremendous pride in his food. This is my new Italian joint.

3ptqAOl7G4bIaMj5gE-Pqg.text: visit:delivery 7/15/11 830pm reason:YELP REVIEWS  The hubby and I are about to embark on an exercise/diet plan. He said,"before we do, we should eat pizza" and proceeded to yelp nearby recommendations. Landed here. Lots of things from this place are sung upon, so we ordered them all!!! We got meat lover's pizza, garlic knots, chicken wings, and zeppoli with raspberry sauce!!! My husband has proclaimed this as his new favorite pizza joint! lol I do love the quality...real sliced sausage, pieces of meatball, nothing looks skimpy. Garlic knots are crisp on the outside,soft and delicious inside. WIngs are great (though hubby says the best are still @3angry wives). I dont typically order dessert,but these zeppoli's are like little pillowy delicious donuts. I will highly recommend Biaggio's to anyone.plus they deliver ANYWHERE in vegas!!

2G4_6o7lcJquD6O7vSLTYQ.text: I love this place!  My friend and I decided to check this place out because of the great reviews.  When we got in we were approached by Mr.Biaggio what a delightful person to meet.  He provides excellent service.  My friend and I ordered a slice of pizza; pepperoni, sausage and mushroom. OMG FRESH MUSHROOM, crispy crust and the sausage was perfect! We also decided to split a meatball sub, chicken wings and cannoli..Hahah I know it was a lot of food.. My stomach was so stuffed but i couldn't stop eatting it was sooooooooooo good...  We finally found our pizza spot and thank God he delivers anywhere in Vegas...

YVID-8hjBroQdTDwkqO1Vw.text: 1st time visiting and immediately greeted.  Place is nice , very clean, and welcoming.  Ordered a large pepperoni sausage mushroom pizza and can say hands down, the best pizza in the neighborhood.  Ingredients taste fresh and prices are reasonable.  I will definitely be enjoying this pizza again very soon

gUjll5n0qFei1vVLbu8bpw.text: Finally checked out Biaggio's Pizzeria when Sno Ono had their last day event.  They were so awesome in partnering with them and giving out free slices as a result!    What makes them really special is that the Little Guy normally does not eat pizza.  Trust me, we've been trying and pushing and he usually just eats the olives off the pizza.  But for some reason, he saw us eating their cheesy slice and wanted some.  We obliged and he asked for more!  Unheard of!  What's even more amusing is that the Husband had pizza twice earlier that week and was pizza-ed out!  He rolled his eyes when he heard free pizza.  But then again, he had a slice of their pepperoni and went back for a few more!  I take that as a pretty good sign he was loving their version.  The staff are great - friendly and were constantly cleaning!  They wiped down the tables and swept after each guest!  When do you ever see that happen at any restaurant these days?

5ijH6m3SR76SGX3Vxl807Q.text: This place is amazing!! The food is mouth watering and the service is wonderful!!! We order something different every time and it's always tasty!! We keep going back because this place never fails to delight!

InMzH-QmwTNOegTbjt-GKA.text: Updated my original review from 2 stars to 3 stars.  The reason being is that I probably dried out the pizza by putting it in my oven for an additional 5 minutes to make the crust crispier.  So that's probably my fault the pizza turned out dry.  I had the white pizza and added chicken.  There wasn't much sauce so the pizza dried out and skimpy on the chicken.  I've ordered here more than once and the toppings on other pizzas weren't very generous compared to the price of the pizza.  Crust is also too soft and flimsy for me.  Sorry, but this is just my honest opinion.

DcnHeI7d7fSMgc9zgko9-A.text: The food is delicious. A bit pricey ,but each bite was worth it. The garlic knots were so yummy and pizza great. My husband and I are from California and looking for a new pizza joint out of strip. this was the best decision we made trying this place

99J-nuSqUs6t4CMd035W5A.text: Just ordered pizza and baked ziti. The pizza was average, very greasy. The baked ziti was delivered cold and seemed to be flavorless, the pizza was luke warm at best. The delivery arrived quickly after ordering, so I have to assume the ziti was packed up cold and sent out that way. It would seem the food was not made to order but rather was sitting around under a heat lamp hoping to be ordered. Definitely will not eat here again, there are better pizza options out there for the price.

ayyZrXlpn16YKYWaPERLow.text: I've lived in Vegas for years and have never found a good Italian pizzeria. Six months ago when I started my new job, they introduced me to Biaggio's and I have been thoroughly impressed. Their garlic knots are to die for. All the drivers and employees are great. And getting meatballs as a topping on your pizza is delicious. I definitely recommend Biaggio's. They are a little more on the "expensive" side but it is absolutely 100% worth every single penny.

khJYJQLFXL0eCz6msKZXdA.text: EXCELLENT FOOD! We ordered online for dinner for 6. Italian Sub, GF Chicken Parm (with no cheese), 12" cheese pizza and a side salad. There were no descriptions on the online order form so I went with what I know; and how I make Gf items. I figured the gluten free chicken parm would be breaded in gluten free bread crumbs. I asked for no cheese. I also thought a gf spaghetti or other pasta would be served. I was surprised to open and find that this was a grilled chicken breast, still covered in cheese, and served with cheese ravioli. Disappointed and concerned that my 3 year old would be unable to eat. My friend called and Biaggo said he would make us new food.  I was really impressed with the level of service we received. They replaced the parm with a gf pizza, free of charge, offered to deliver (we declined but appreciated the offer), and they gave my husband 2 slices of cheese cake to go. Every single thing we ate was delicious. I honestly cannot say when the last time I ate gluten free pizza that didn't taste like cardboard was. This was amazing. The sauce is delicious. The Italian dressing on the side salad was better than anything we've ever had. Every bite was eaten without a crumb left. You've gained customers for life. We are amazed by your service and love your food.  Thank you!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Medium cheese free, gluten free supreme pizza.

r8dcySdDxJsHwpnwzLhG1A.text: This is our 4th time ordering pizza at Biaggio's. The first 2 times were quite good and I would've definitely recommended them to our friends & family. The owner was friendly and was very welcoming on both occasions. The 3rd and now our 4th time ordering and I'd be hard pressed to go back or recommend them to anyone.  This time we ordered a pizza with mushrooms & ricotta cheese. When I arrived to pick it up I looked at the pizza and voiced my concern that the lack of mushrooms was disappointing and the same thing had happened previously on our 3rd order. The guy at the counter said "I'll write it down" as if that was going to take care of anything with the immediate situation. I was rather puzzled by his response but didn't feel like arguing with him about what good customer service was and how he should've handled the situation.  After arriving home from a quick 5 minute drive we found our pizza to be an undercooked cheesy swamp and as noted before a distinct lack of mushrooms. The pizza was impossible to eat in any normal sense of the word and wouldn't even stand up to the folded NY style of eating a slice. I've attached 2 pictures, bad iPhone shots, showing our pizza and what it looked like prior to and after trying to remove a slice after using a knife to re-cut it.  We were very disappointed as we really liked the flavor of their sauce and the ingredients. Even though it's priced quite high for pizza we would've been regular customers but if you can't get the order right, or cooked properly, I'll spend my money elsewhere.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pizza? NO! Soup sandwich is more like it.
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Where are the shrooms?

u0eLpiFtpEBkV8pWnBgzEA.text: Took my Son here for lunch last week.  It was his first experience at Biaggio's Pizza.  We ordered a Large Meatlover's Pizza (see pics).  We patiently waited for it to be prepared and sat in the dining area and chatted with Biaggio for a few minutes.  He's a really nice guy who enjoys his business.  Our Pizza came out after a short wait and we devoured it within minutes.  It is as good as I remembered!  My Son couldn't stop talking about it.  I wish we lived nearby so we could come more often.  Overall, it's one of the best Pizza joints in town.  Return Factor - 99%

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HeShVIrGHuAa1wqiLNh33g.text: My family enjoyed their pizza, baked ziti and most importantly zeppola and canoli's. Highly recommend this family owned business:)

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My sons enjoying dessert!!

ccaRLs5AyTNcN-AShNdZEg.text: My favorite pizza place in town. The pizza is delicious, they definitely know their stuff. Garlic knots are perfection.  Biaggio the owner is absolutely amazing, so kind.   The food+the great customer service= me telling everyone I know.

Lh9tLQzGSSPFIU0cNuaiEg.text: One of the best pizzas I've had in a very long time.  When I first arrived I was a little skeptical. It's in a strip mall with just a few tables. Boy was I wrong! You have to try the garlic knots - big juicy knots of love with home made marinara. The pizza was the highlight though. Perfect crust, the homemade sauce was perfect as well. You can taste the differences between their quality ingredients and other pizzas.  There's other thing that made the meal great was the owner. He was so friendly and talkative that outer felt like I knew him for a long time - Ives never been there before!  I'll be back next time I visit Vegas.

Jl7pdKjP511MDRdKndBPuw.text: Biaggio is a boss. Food was excellent. Father was visiting from overseas, and he kept mentioning how great the pizza was during the meal, so much so that he claims this is the best pizza he's EVER had!  Biaggio even extended the courtesy of upgrading the pizza from a small to a medium. Eat here. You won't be disappointed.   Thank you, Biaggio. Will be back when in LV!!

xSwPpB56F5lOF2yB3pgFGw.text: The stromboli and garlic knots were really good and the portions were huge! The owner was really nice, and I will be going back for sure!

qhDgoInMdkNdNnoXw4E5NA.text: One of best pizza lunch deals around! And awesome customer service! I order from them about once a month and have never ever been disappointed. The pizza has the best and freshest toppings, the wings are crunchy perfection, crispy and colorful salads (chock full of veggies), and delicious knots. LOVE THIS PLACE!

7SlpCYlb-fwfGp1lJO4qrQ.text: Wow, the garlic knots are to die for. Buttery, lots of garlic, dipped into marinara sauces topped with Parmesan...heavenly...Yum Yum Yum.  This is a solid 5 star appetizer.  I wouldn't mind making this my main entree. (5*)  But: Pizza w/the following toppings: pineapple, anchovy, bacon, ham, jalapeno-We feel like there wasn't enough cheese...it was ok.  um, maybe because of the combination that we chose...will try something else next time.  (3*)  Dozen of wings, extra well done, with sauces on the side-when this came out, it was battered fried, and we realized that we like them wings naked fried vs. battered fried.  I tried one wing and couldn't eat more. (2*)  Mr. Biaggio is a really friendly owner.  Roland really wanted to try the meatball, but didn't see that he can order it on the side.  He asked Mr. Biaggio, and Mr. Biaggio actually let us sample a big meatball w/slices of fresh baguette.  We enjoyed that meatball very much.  Service (5*)  Next time, we will get the best garlic knots we have ever tasted, and the meatball sandwich.  Overall #*s/4=3.75~4.0

_i3urgeF9VAU5dOEdH0wDg.text: This pizzeria is one of the best I've been to and the tastiest pizza I've had outside of San Francisco's north beach pizza. We ordered an all meat pizza and the owner Joe, whom by the way is very young handsome for his age and has a shaven head "wink" was very accommodating and extremely friendly. My kids ordered the kid platter which he thoroughly enjoyed. Anytime we head back to Vegas we will surely go back. When you go in ask for Joe he will make you feel right at home.

cF6irXHO8kJE7rafOPXhWQ.text: Great place for pizza, staff is super friendly can't go wrong here. try the chicken parm pizza yummy.

WGBJ-DcEaXwq-nyg_beURw.text: Yummy, yummy, yummy!  I've got calzone in my tummy.  And wings.  And garlic knots.  All very good.  My husband and I got delivery from Biaggio's and it was all I expected and more.  It was super fast and the food came hot and delicious.  They were great about accomodating my special requests, such as certain sauces on the side and extra sauces.  And they delivered even though they were about to close.  So happy that Yelp introduced me to Biaggio's!

V9CuF2pfBpHNfSU4WVcVtg.text: Four Dena girls on a weekend getaway and what a pleasant surprise!! The food, atmosphere and service were awesome and Biaggio himself was the icing on the cake!

n1NW13EJ0haLq04trWSKZQ.text: OMG.!!! The strombli was absolutely amazing.  Beautiful golden crust done to perfection, meatball, mozzerella and ricotta filling was absolutey devine.  I thought when I took my first bite I would have pulled a Meg Ryan like in When Harry Met Sally, except for the fact the 2 metro officers eating there probablly would have cuffed me and carried me off the the psych ward.  GUY FIETI, if you think your buddies at 4 kegs make good stromboli, you obviously haven't tasted great stromboli.  We also ordered a pizza and it was wonderful.  Owner was very sweet and came over and asked how everything was.  Of course I couldn't stop complimenting him and thats when he told us the sauce which is the best, was his aunts recepie and the olive oil EVOO imported, and the tomatoes from Italy, packed within 6 hours of being picked.  I also noticed that Mr. Biaggio was like the inspector general with every order that came out of that kitcken.  He personally inspected the food and gave each plate his seal of approval.  Very impressed with the pride that went into making each dish and quality of ingredients.

0fp5iItYnm3cvNeZbXGu2Q.text: Visiting Vegas from out of town for a few days.   Found out about Biaggio's on Yelp.  It is about a 15 minute drive from the strip - very easy to get to.  Would take longer during rush hour.    My wife and I went for a late lunch (3pm), so no crowds.  The owner was there, and was very friendly.  He wanted to make sure we were thoroughly satisfied.  We ordered 2 slices of artichoke/tomato pizza, and some garlic knots.    Let me just say that it was great.  In my opinion, what makes a good pizza is top quality ingredients.  The tomatoes and artichokes were the best I have had on a pizza.  The owner is passionate about his food, and it shows.  I would definitely recommend it!

xYRQIARDoQnNPD5xfE1hxg.text: Took my girlfriend to this place because we wanted to find the best pizza in town.  We were blown away with the reviews this place received and knew we had to come check it out.  First off- The owner walked right over to us and introduced himself as soon as we walked in the door.  This made us feel super comfortable, like we were in a friends home having dinner.  We ordered the large cheese pizza and Biaggio insisted we also try the meatballs, chicken wings, and knots with homemade marinara sauce.  Wow it was unbelievable!!!  Everything tasted very authentic and all with quality ingredients, no sugar or salt added to the dough.  (That was my gf fav!)  Customer service was outstanding and you won't find better!  The garlic knots, chicken wings, meatballs and the pizza were all super delicious and we are now customers/friends for life!  I would recommend this place to anyone and Biaggio will make you feel at home.  ~Blair and Mark

HEcSIzJos27rzOl9_1jNGQ.text: Biaggio's is awesome!  I found this place on Yelp and ordered delivery on a Friday night.  Pizza came hot and on time.  We ordered the Mozzarella sticks which are pretty pedestrian, however the Garlic Knots are heavenly!  This is great NY style pizza that in no way resembles the cardboard and grease that you see in the mall!  The staff is super friendly and you will most likely meet Biaggio if you eat in or pick up.  Definitely try it!

wXr5LGj8k5qcRBcYjUH-1Q.text: Tried this place this past weekend. This is now my go to place for wings, garlic knots and meatballs!!! Take it from an Italian when I say the meatballs are excellent!!  We got 10 wings, big mistake, should of ordered a lot more!!! The garlic knots are, well, lets just say they didn't even make it home without disappearing!!  I will definitely be back!!!!!  Do not go here without at least trying all of the above!!!

zfNqWBS1L--iVeMeY7ypbA.text: Service was A+ as soon as we walked in; greeted by the owner.  Food was good; ordered meat lovers pizza, a pep pizza and bbq.  Followed up with the garlic knots, antipasto salad and fried dough.  So we had a bit of it all.  The kids ate the garlic knots immediately, good thing I grabbed 2 to start with.  Kids didn't like the fried dough, thought it too sweet, but it was right up my alley, so more for the adults.  Well done guys and thanks for tossing in the kids mac and cheese (after learning my daughter just got braces and needed something soft to eat).

qDo3hI1I0fvq7DLd5v1SHg.text: I went in person for the first time after having delivery for weeks to my work. The customer service was great, the food was absoultely great. The meatballs were out ofo this world. The chicken and roasted pepper pizza was great. I have to admit luch is coming up and i'm getting the meatball parmesan sub. I recommend this place to anyone who likes great pizza and fabulous meatballs.

8zx0gzYwCqTN-3Fh5SUH1g.text: ive been here quite a few times now in a short period of time. the first time i just tried a couple slices, they were okay (reheated, standard ny pizza) the next couple times were amazing, really really good food, so much so that we (my husband and i) went back days in a row. sadly, the last time we went it was pretty bad... i mean i did read on here that the meatball pizza was inconsistent but c'mon... that was from like a 9.5 to a 1... def wouldnt order the meatball pie again.

95Eo_Ok6osplPYMxfhDS8g.text: I ordered out Pizza,wings and knots when I arrived they missplaced my ticket. The owner comped my entire meal for the inconvenience, due to the wait plus gave a gift certificate for the future.  To say this was way beyond in service is an understatement.   The food is very very good, I've eaten here a few times and will many more times in the future.  Wings are crispy, knots are huge with the right balnce of garlic and butter.  I've had the meat lover's pizza a couple of times and you can't go wrong.  Crust is good, plenty of meat and the cheese is very tasty.  As many have stated the owner is a really nice guy and class act.   He genuinely seems to care and wants to make the best food possible and please the customer.   Prices are very competitive, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

ZOl5c0YXiWYdClilELXVAw.text: Biaggio's Pizza was a party in my mouth!  It was a fusion of awesomeness, pizza sauce and pure joy!  If God makes a pizza I doubt it is nearly as good as the pizza at Biaggio's.  The BBQ Chicken Pizza was amazing.  The wings and garlic bread were both delicious!  Our drinks were promptly refilled and the staff was warm and welcoming.  I will be visiting Biaggio's again.. and again.. and again.  THANK YOU BIAGGIO!

LOdKB8quIZvUTOaYkFkUPA.text: Just ate there. We like to try places we can't get in Indy.  The owner was ver gracious and welcoming. Gave us some perks.  The food was great. Try the garlic knots. We had spaghetti, pizza and chicken Philly. All was great. You have to check this place out

cVrHBtkAD9Lp6PMnHyRxyQ.text: I have been going on yelp for the last couple of years and I thought it was time to write some of my own reviews. Biaggios is what every neighborhood needs. Mr Biaggio was so friendly and so kind. He welcomed us the second we walked in. The pizza was amazing the service was fantastic. Its a cozy little place in a strip mall, but it is good food. I didnt  do dessert, but I will next time. I had the garlic knots, pizza and brought home pasta for tomorrow. This place is worth the trip!!

1TvJ9GXcub_WZ00UqmmOtA.text: Mr. Biaggio has a wonderful restaurant. The food is great. I have ordered a meat lovers stromboli, a large 3 topping pizza, and a meatball sub. All of which were awesome. I usually don't like meat ball subs, but this was almost to die for. The ingredients are high quality and on the healthier side than other pizza places.   The hospitality and service is awesome as well. You're treated just like family. The pricing is cheap! Where else can you find food of this caliber for this deal. He even delivers all over town. Find another pizza place to do that for you. If you haven't been before, I'd highly recommend going.   A lot of Mr. Biaggio's foods are family recipes. They are great! Try them yourself. I don't think you can go wrong. Even if you do, he will take care of you.  Check it out :)

eqcJ6PstBhGRtnXXrS3OVw.text: I have never been treated so badly by a restaurant. I take back my previous statement that the owner is friendly. Biaggio contacted me after my review and asked for a chance to prove himself. Okay, I thought, why not give him another chance. So I called and placed the same order I did the first time and told him who I was. When I arrived to pick up my order, he asked that I not post on Yelp what he was doing to fix my previous visit should I happen to change my review. I said that I would not. Then he proceeded to tell me that he didn't open his business to be a 2- or 3-star business and that "wasn't the service" I got there. To me, that basically means he is calling me a liar, and I told him so. He denied this. I told him that I used to work at a pizza place and that isn't how you do business. He said that he had nothing to offer me besides the garlic knots. I told him that I ordered enough food that night for my family to eat dinner and that  we ended up hungry because he was busy and all he gave me that night was a shrug and said, "We're out." He again said that it didn't happen, and that's when I got even more mad. I told him I would never be back again.   You don't ask for a second chance to prove yourself to a customer and then when he comes in call him a liar and hint that you would like him to change his review and add more stars. That's not how you do business, especially if you think you are providing 5-star service. Whatever happened to "The customer is always right?" When did it become "The customer is a liar if he says he had bad service?"  All he had to do when I came in was say, "I'm sorry you had a bad experience. I hope this one was better," and I would have been a returning customer. As it is, I will never go back. Not with an owner that treats customers that way.

eBoyGxXXMwG5Fr_0jN348w.text: This place is now our family favorite!  When I asked my husband and daughter where we should go for our Valentine's celebration, they both immediately replied Biaggio's!  We went last night and as always, the place feels like home the moment you walk in the door!  You just don't find this level of comfort in a restaurant anymore...especially in Las Vegas!!!    The food was fantastic as always!  We started with a Greek Salad.  The dressing was delicious and the feta...ooohhh the feta!!!  It was just the right texture and taste!  I would be tempted to go back and order just a bowl of feta if everything else wasn't so divine!!  What a difference QUALITY ingredients make!  We ordered our other favs- garlic knots and cheese/ pepperoni pizza.  YUMMMMM as always!!!!  On a side note, the Parmesan sprinkled on the garlic knots is so delicious that I am always tempted to lick plate afterward.  Restraint is definitely needed!!  But one day if you are in there and you see a woman licking her plate...you will know why!!  We now come on a regular basis even though the restaurant isn't exactly right around the corner for us.  But the drive from North Las Vegas to here is always worth it.  We have never left disappointed or unsatisfied.    As if the service in the restaurant isn't impressive enough, my husband ordered several pizzas and wings for his workplace a few weekends ago.  They delivered clear across town and it arrived piping hot!!!!!  They were all impressed with the prompt service and, of course, their delicious feast!  If by chance my reviews didn't convey this, please know that I highly recommend this place!!!!!!!  We came upon it by chance and we keep going back because of the superior eats, the excellent service and the comfortable environment.  Without a doubt, this is the BEST pizza.  And as someone who grew up on the east coast and practically started eating pizza on my way out the womb, that is the highest compliment I can give.

pjc5t1NtE55yBJhsVe92wg.text: If I could rate this pizzeria 10 stars, I WOULD!  Yum Yum Yum.  Good food, good prices, good service and people.  The garlic knots were delicious.  The chicken wings were off the hook!!!  The pizza.....to die for.  The cookies and cannolis topped it all off.  All together it was a great experience for our family of 7.  The owner made us feel like family.  It's hard to find a restaurant like this!  Definitely coming back again, again, and again.

C2x4XZUz5LlX-LhJ5UjpfA.text: Now being a foodie, great food means a lot to me.  Pizza just happens to be one of my favorite food.  The only reason why I'm giving this a 4 star is because there are 2 other pizzas that I feel that are better than Biaggio's.  One is in the Philippines called Sam's Pizza, and the other is, believe it or not, is Numero Uno's "The Works."  But other than those 2, so far, Biaagio's is 3rd on my list.  So every time I do a Vegas trip with the fellas, we always take the time to stop by Biaggio's for some great pizza.  Biaggio's uses fresh ingredients and a homemade recipe.  My first time in Biaggio's was a great experience.  I ordered a small pepperoni, but the owner surprised me with a large and said, "don't worry about it, I'll charge you for a small, I just really want you guys to try our pizza."  I thought that was hella cool!  So the fellas and I shared my large pizza with a smile in our faces :)  Great service, and Mr. Biaggio himself is a really cool guy.

6niEXVVvZ3N58yig1x_aqw.text: Incredibly friendly service, Wi-Fi, and great food! Tried the Garlic Knots, Art of Chicken Pizza, Italian Sub and The Zeppole. Everything was great the Zeppole alone is enough of a reason to go back, which I plan to.

hAI7WeL-NL1utHNARdJVdA.text: Best Pizza and Service in the valley. It is a pleasure to go here and the Pizza and garlic knots are great! WARNING: after going here for pizza my kids never want to go anywhere else.

EXt7xP8XURGO9ah77PxBOw.text: Had another great meal here. Service is always spot on and friendly. The portions are huge, selections varied and the prices are fair.

Ypunfwr803mVrpa3ZIrBPQ.text: Fantastic pizza! Best we've had since moving to Vegas. The crust is just the right blend of crispy and chewy. The pizzas are made with fresh ingredients and no added salt or sugar in the crust or sauce. The owner is passionate about his food and the quality shows.  The entire staff makes you feel at home.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy.

DTu6LHjhmW-kX8Ty6jmaHQ.text: Today was my 2nd time ordering and the pizza was just okay. Slightly to sweet for my tastes. Today my pizza was greasy and just wet. All the toppings fell off my pizza when I tried to eat it. When I took my first bite I bit into something super hard. Yikes! Had to spit out that bite. Great flavor on the cheese and pepperoni though. To me the pizza needed to be baked longer and I did to give it a crisper crust but for myself I didn't want it. I also ordered wings and fried mushrooms. The wings were nice and crispy which was great and they came unsauced. I loved that I could sauce them myself so they never got soggy. The fried mushrooms had great flavor but for the price you don't get many. Overall 3/5 for me because of the pizza. I want more flavor in the crust and a more stable pizza. It was like a meh experience for me. The other things I ordered were great but I won't order the pizza again. But would try other food.

idD0sAg-XWAXexIT7upHvA.text: What a hidden gem this place is!  Delish meatball pizza...lunch special $5.99 for 2 slices and drink...we will be back!  And the best part was the young and handsome owner with the "shaved" head!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2I3ujqHLHj7tzWQOCOlQKg.text: Craving a cheesy pizza with lots of fresh toppings? You're looking in the right place!  We ordered to go: meat lover's + ricotta.  Sauce is nice, not too sweet or acidic, and not overly sauced. Lots of toppings, very fresh. Generous on ricotta. The only thing I wasn't a fan of is the crust. It's a little thick for my taste, but nice chew and not too doughy.    Had a little hiccup with our order, but the owner was very gracious and handled the situation beautifully. Will def be back and recommend to friends. After all, who doesn't love to support local businesses (instead of chains)?

BDWs_3G8-KFy2Jk4v_gylA.text: This pizza is tasty high quailty ingredients cheese is amazing! Absolutely FRESH veggies! Little Caesars form employee  sorry dont agree with your review. I'm a mushroom liver and there are fresh in fact they are mini portobellos! Anyhow family owned nice people with good pizza ,wings and decent pasta wasn't crazy about marinara but thats my personsl opion since sauce I make is little sweeter less acidic and less thick. Supoort local family pizzeria's $ this is a good one. Closed on Sundays

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast pizza with hot sauce added
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BreakfastPizza! Tastes like frittata pizza:eggs,bacon,Italian sausage,spinach,tomatoes and we added onions and bell peppers!

yE9cQxV3mTyhRThmLB-JLw.text: Last day in Vegas did not know if we wanted breakfast or lunch since it was 11:30 am. I started craving good pizza drove about 30 off the strip was a great decision best fresh made pizza. We tried one of the meatballs melted like butter in my mouth. Just like the saying goes, "was the juice worth the squeeze" definitely!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The taste exploded in my mouth
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic knots awesome

iFKF-C7UlTQqOHEKT8Fdqg.text: Pretty darn good pizza here!!! The have a special everyday I believe which is 2 slices of pizza and a drink for around 8 bucks! Soo good ! Also have calzones and is connected to an Italian restaurant next door called raggianos

VJjx4jLoSLXuO9QkreDKvA.text: Hello! My name is Drake Capital Ernest Hollingshead. To whomever may be reading this. I am a recent employee of this particular restaurant, and proud to be one. I feel honored to ever be a part of this restaurants Endeavors. Might I recommend their meat lovers Pizza? You can bet your bottom dollar that it will be baller. Might I add that it will make you want to holler? :-) that and much more. You've got my 5 stars, happy eating!

71WEAdFu9GitUnZIa7peYg.text: Best pepperoni pizza I've had in Las Vegas. When you think about what you want in a good pie, trust me you'll find it here. The toppings were phenomenal from the cheese to the pepperonis, and don't get me started on the crust. The best pizza crust I've ever had hands down. I even asked the owner what makes a good pie and he told me it's about the oils he puts in the dough. The wings we had for starters were very flavorful and bold, very delicious. Overall Biaggios pizzeria is the place to be if you're looking for awesome pizza pie!

FZKMa6wpfDDsuQ8C-caSgA.text: Amazing homestyle Italian food! I used to go to Montessanos but it closed. This place is the same or better in taste. Delicious pizza with fresh ingredients and fluffy crust and toasty enough but very soft. The calzones are also delicious , very fresh and amazing bread as well. The chicken parmesan was also very well cooked. The sauce was fresh and very flavorful. Also, costumer service was amazing and was very well taken care of. Highly recommend!

xz84d0WjJbPGxEVLVsnLew.text: We ordered delivery from this place and were told it would be 45 minutes to an hour wait. An hour and 5 minutes later I called to check the status of our delivery. I was informed that the lady who took my order passed it along and the guy who took it from her set it aside, and that they were wall to wall cleaning so not taking any orders. The man apologized and offered a store credit, but we are not from here and were leaving the next morning. Not impressed since they had my contact information and could have called immediately to say there had been a mistake and they could not take any orders that night.

tmZsp-JgXsP9eG7A2BfRkg.text: Biaggio's catering saved my party [DEFCON 22]. There's so much more to it.  I am still so very incredibly wiped from my visit to Las Vegas.  But. What I can say now, before I update this review is:   We had so many more guests than I'd anticipated.  Many were paleo, vegetarian, and gluten free in diet.  Biaggio's covered all of us.  He simply charged a flat rate for my group size, and said: Mal, leave your worries to us. We understand the diversity of diet, and we've got you covered.  I was skeptical, but -- O M G did Biaggio deliver above and beyond.... Yes, he did.    For a flat catering rate, we received a greek salad, buffalo chicken wings, fried mushrooms and zucchinis, delicious gluten free pizzas, and delicious knotted pastries filled with cheese, marinara and the works!  Next DEFCON -- Biaggio, We'll see you in August.  I really hit the jackpot finding you in this wild and dusty desert.

a7sXTY5RA4o9rG_oJEtLoQ.text: The flavor is good but not for the price they charge. Pizza a little skimpy on toppings for two dollars a pop. Pepperoni pizza came with like two pepperoni per slice. Mozzarella sticks pretty good as well. Prepare for a ridiculous delivery time as well. Took an hour and twenty minutes for pizza and mozzarella sticks to be delivered 8 mins away from their location. Food was room temperature by the time it arrived. 40 bucks for a room temperature large pizza and 6 cold mozzarella sticks. Not worth it. Let down and a big pass.

QW5cHytXf0ixiJ7nwIP2pg.text: once i tried this place i fell instantly in love. if you do decide to come to this pizza place i highly recommend to get the "white pizza" with sausage. its amazing! personally i hate really thin pizzas and love this place but its not too thin like other places that i tried. also their caesar salad is fresh and they put tons of cheese on top which is always a plus. because who doesn't love cheese?  you will not be disappointed!

SkFeN2HTBDATcNTKwWdd_w.text: Sometimes a mom just doesn't want to cook. This pizzeria is the best in Las Vegas, in every single way. The food is magnificent, the best quality ingredients and r wonderful collection of recipes. Everything you try is amazing, from the salads, which has a few different options and one is just as good as the next, to the zeppole. The pizza is made with the best ingredients possible and you can tell with the fist bite.My favorite is the veggie, I just love the way the garden vegetables melt together with the delicous cheese, a perfect pizza. My family love the meat lovers, which is really cool because my 8 years olds are picky. We have also had the wings and the garlic know, and I am ashamed to say our family fights for the last garlic knot and even more ashamed that I didn't win it.   This pizzeria is like going to someone's home. The owner makes you feel special and loved, just like if you were his family. He is a great man who is full of kindness and love. The service is perfection. I love that I can go there and trust that I will have no problem with my order, it will always be perfect. It is a place where my whole family loves, I mean seriously LOVES. IT is sometimes terribly hard to find a place we all agree on. Quality food us always important. Best quality of food I have ever had in the 13 years I have lived in Las Vegas.I cannot wait to fo back

1psVNq4GSRUHrJGiid2-nA.text: Recently my family  purchased pizzas  from Biaggios and I  must say the staff was very friendly. This was just complimentary to the food. The pizzas  were fresh and delicious. Definitely worth the price!!!Certainly  will pass this gem of a place to friends.

NDWcgBLhUDg7Y5LLJPjvAA.text: Ordered pizza for delivery.  Although expensive, it is very good and fresh.  Does not taste like card board!!  The crust was perfect, sweet, soft and crisp all at the same time.  The sauce was wonderful and plenty of cheese!

k2P8GuR0rUdJMt72fjWKVQ.text: Loved the sauce! Awesome service as well. We came from the NJ/NY area and were very pleased with the plain pie we ordered. Would go back.

gnWp1q8A7RpyZdtZQ_hYvA.text: Loved their food!!!! Everything was fresh, made to order!! Owner was friendly and welcoming, best of all is that they have Gluten Free pizza, dinners and dessert!!! Next visit I will bring the kids to taste such great pizza

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My brother very satisfied

RP59hMgegg0aeSECENC7Zg.text: I ordered a 12'' mushroom pie, breaded mushrooms, and mozzarella sticks. The pizza was very good. I did not enjoy the sides. The cheese in the mozzarella sticks seemed to have harden. I would only recommend pizza from here.

NxPfwLyB9KFIXlqx0HvoZw.text: I've lived in south Summerlin for 4 years now and I haven't been able to find a good pizza place.  I have tried at least a half dozen places, both cooked and bake at home. None of them were good...they were OK but not what I call good pizza.  Well, that changed a month ago when I found Biaggio's. They make an excellent pizza. The crust is perfect, not to thick and not to thin.  Great sauce and toppings.  And leftovers cook great in the Microwave.  Take it from Jeff...this place is a winner!

mNAuOYgaTBSvJCfddRRj7w.text: Really loved this pizza. It's fresh and I even had some for leftovers the next day  the extra large is the best deal! We order a medium I think it was about $16 and the extra large was $24 but the value was just so much more for the extra! The pizza is not greasy that's the #1 for me. A lot of flat dough pizzas the cheese gets too greasy and the pizza sort of falls apart but not Biaggio's! Plus the sauce makes it more special. Family owned business supports locals and I recommend dinning in because this pizza is so good fresh out of the oven is the way to go!

jxZQPDzbl6ypGk7nFNcu6Q.text: WoW. I have been ordering pizza in Vegas for 40 years.  Moved to a new hood, was on Yelp and gave it a try. It started with a nice human that answered the phone and took the order. Never asked for payment said pay with card or cash when it arrives, ok where am I. A wonderful professional clean cut delivery man shows up at my door, with the pizza asked do you need cheese or peppers talks about my dog. Again WOW where am I. Not only did I have great service but also a pizza I have not had in years. Great job. We are loosing the human touch in society, not you

46TdfEYlnW3zjaP_9mfTBA.text: pizza was great!  we got XL meat lovers and it did not disappoint. they were not shy on the toppings and I really enjoyed the thin crust. we called in and ordered for pick up n they stated 30 min...we came in exactly at 30, and it was ready.  they do have a few seats there if you'd like to dine in.  the service was great.  granted i only interracted during the order phone call and actual pick up, but the guy who helped was really nice.  i will be back...sooner than later for sure.

9eQhQ_1ap-NLLQPwUrnrqg.text: Not a lot of value for a $15 medium pie. Pizza wasn't even sliced properly. First slice fell apart, and was nearly cheeseless. Lots of good pizza in this town, get it together folks.

Q3KL3gYhkuMZIbeWiAy2Dw.text: Wow, don't be fooled by the design and decoration. It does look like a typical generic family owned pizza shop that all tasted the same. BUT this is the best damn pizza you will ever eat. The owner makes it fresh right on the spot. The meat and cheese used are fresh and makes the pizza taste wonderful. I dont mind paying a little more since they use high quality ingredients and it's a local small business which I like to support.

xCbFGI3PQKqsoaH7e2zdcQ.text: First time here and I can honestly say it was very good! I will no doubt come back friendly staff and GREAT Pizza!

Cpie23LgksuXEG_Hi-8ocg.text: 1st timer!!! And absolutely delicious. We were looking for a pizza place so we decided to YELP it and this gem popped up. The menu has so many options and very much worth it. See below the pictures of the Pizza and knots we ordered. We will be back! And can't wait to try out the other pizza types. Dont forget to ask about the lunch special!!! Very fulfilling

qxfaVpY4a9gqfYzFKV9vVw.text: They have fantastic pizza! Not many pizza places around here have it by the slice, but Biaggio's does and it's very reasonably priced. Not to mention the pizza is just perfect! They also have other menu items that look appetizing like pastas, calzones, garlic knots, and desserts. I highly recommend Biaggio's pizza and will be a regular customer. Very friendly customer service as well.

3X--WR3J-6F_3IBCaDf3lA.text: This was one of the few places that had gluten free crust, and it ended up being the best gluten free crust I have ever had. The sauce was also very flavorful. The topping options were fantastic, and the service was great. If I ever come back to Las Vegas, I will definitely come back here!

xnFRYGUYAfAASaYfXxmTbQ.text: just going to say I booked marked this spot months ago. never got around to trying it. my gf and I decided to go in for some wings and a pepperoni sausage olive pizza... the wings were good. the pizza... amazing. the best pizza I have had since old school Metro Pizza from Ellis island casino in 2011. My gf and I were like damn this pizza is bomb we didnt talk for a few minutes becuase we were too busy eatin. lol. the gentleman working there was super friendly and constantly checked up on us refilled our drinks. I'm not going to another pizza spot after this. I found my go to spot !

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ddP8ReRsioQ6WDKvl18Mww.text: Pizza is pizza, but Biaggios pizza is the real pizza! My kids are crazy for this place! We enjoy a great pizza here every now and then, and everytime everything only gets better!

jskusHQGj_w6OM8LJjvx5Q.text: This remark came in late but this pizza place is awesome for lots of reasons: first, the service is impeccable plus the people are warm and very friendly; second, the food is delicious and the price is reasonable; third, the place is clean. I would recommend Biaggio's anytime.

OfOqtbAEGrDyqsCR8Fkwcw.text: Very good pizza and the deposed were awesome!!  The guy helping us was very friendly and nice. I would and will come back again.

sJ148TfG6w3oMk2RK82-hA.text: We came in tonight, about 45 minutes before closing. Nobody seemed upset that we came in so close to closing. Paul took our order to go, only after asking if we wanted to dine in (right before close)  We got a large pepperoni pizza, with ten wings. Paul stood and talked with us while we waited on our pizza. He was a very genuine person, really knows his ingredients, and companies which ingredients come from. We were explaining to him how hard it has been to find good food here since moving from Sparks, Reno. Once we got our pizza it was absolutely as fresh as they come. We were starving so we hurried home. Hands down the best pepperoni pizza I have personally had. The cheese is the kind that pulls and snaps back at yah. The sauce is not to sweet, or acidic. It was perfect!!! Tons of cheese, and the perfect amount of sauce. (I did order extra sauce) Wings, were just as good, tons of meat and cooked perfect. You can tell they really care about the products they use. We will be back for sure!!

DxqxnzZeqfwYo7CJIFyAsg.text: Amazing pizza! Super awesome customer service! They treat you like family! I wish they delivered to my neighborhood, but I don't mind driving to get the pie myself! So delicious! Keep up the awesome work! :)

tZKhMmZ5m7zWo_PYrbTXVA.text: Delicious pizza, NY style and well priced. Great deal for two slices and a drink for $7.99. Garlic lots was tasty also and HUGE! Perfect place to carbload.

J0yFMWbieYgUouD6xNZfQA.text: Real pizza is all I can say!! Great customer service and any and all my questions were answered. Fair price for a good NY style pie!
