8wBsQ5ZR3wLeNBLVDAR2Qw.text: Great friendly environment. I must say the best wings I have ever had. They were delicious and super fresh. The meat lovers pizza was good. Fresh cut meat toppings. There are a few TVs on the wall to catch a game and dine in. They offer delivery. So if your looking for a good pizza and amazing wings stop in. Server says they are getting a liquor license soon and will serve beer too. Plenty of parking. Service was fast and my drink was never empty. Hey he even recommended a few good disc golf courses in town.

y-hGGO7adH065ayBDi4CAA.text: Worst place ever. rude servers. Even rude manager. They serve cold pizza free waiting for 55 minutes! Pizza is probably done waiting on counter for long time before it's served, due to very poor service.

9QCoGZdekrsCtXmvYafsFw.text: Fresh pizza and fresh ingredients. I really enjoyed it. The service was really good. Not a fan of the garlic knots though. They have no flavor. Kind of just tasted like baked pastry dough. Pizza was really delicious, everything just tasted like it was made from good quality ingredients. A little pricey for the size you get but I would come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage pizza
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic knots

EuNmrOvQjRbPGsEDSX5uGA.text: I like it these cheese pizza is good. They have slices all day. Just call and ask ahead of time if it's after 4pm

O9PHjQZbBSMXlKcbIQ3vSw.text: This is my go to spot anytime I need my italian fix! They make the best stromboli I have ever had.. reminds me of back home.

EuRwnTgwSyu5ypLnf3F8Sw.text: Tried based on yelp reviews only and let's just say I'm so, so, so glad decided to try.  Upon understanding I had a long drive after pick up, the person at the counter offered me a free soft drink.  Wow, if that's not a friendly awesome service, I don't know what is.  Large pizza with half mushrooms & sausages and half with ham & pineapples.  To my surprise, my picky other half loved it, as did I.  For those of you living close by this place, I envy you.  I'd DEFINITELY would make the long trip to eat/carry out again!

Gi23di2FZmqr-GRu96LWKQ.text: XL is truly a great size. Pizza was adequate, but not remarkable. Delivery was quick and friendly.

y6eqkejKONqEjo3CMDgxUw.text: found this spot on Yelp. wow. EVERYTHING super delicious. wings were crispy but so juicy with great flavor. pizza was amazing. 1/2 supreme 1/2 pepperoni. thin crispy and I savored every bite. finally the cheesecake. holy moly.  DEFINITELY coming back here.

t5bazYlZpn2xbt3zkzjb5Q.text: Best pizza place in town in my opinion. Best garlic knots I have ever had in any city. This place has been around for a long time. I haven't been in nearly 9 years and it was exactly the same. Delicious.

x4Y_KcZofR2_b9i_1_DF3Q.text: Oh man, so bomb!! I was sooooo hesitant coming here because the past few months - pizza everywhere we have been has turned me off. Ordered 1 half cheese, half meatball. The other Hawaiian pizza. They were all so different but all so delicious!! The chef/owner Paul came and chat with us even though he was super busy making all the take outs and pizza orders in restaurant. I really appreciate that! I would def recommend this family business to all my friends and family! The price is right, sauce was just enough, meatballs tasted like beef ravioli, Canadian bacon instead of deli ham, lots of Golden pineapples.  mmmm

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Two large pizza, 2 adults, 3 kids - almost all gone! So bomb!

AzfpPPJiK8WpWCLxaajluw.text: The owner makes special sandwiches and post them on Yelp as the real deal. I paid $12 for a sandwich and it barely had one piece of meat and one piece of cheese. The pictures on the Yelp are an absolute lie. I could have purchased two sandwiches for the price that I paid for this one sorry sandwich. I hate being deceived by business owners. I've added a photo of the real product they serve.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buyer beware. The owner charged me 12 bucks for this. It&#39;s nothing like the sandwiches they post in their fake reviews.
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The pictures they post are a lie. This is what I got for 12 bucks. What a scam.

VXszgkhszGo1exalJ8NA6Q.text: Yummy N.Y. style pizza! These guys care about what they're doing and what they are putting on your pie.

FXvhvhQ5_b-ox3yqtjRbxg.text: Pizza was OK. It was expensive and not my favorite but if you are in a bind and really want pizza, go for it. The bottom of the pizza was pretty burnt, that could have done it

J9lJ01Q7UcLjYudzpdMiyA.text: Phenomenal family owned business with quality food and excellent service.   I highly recommend trying the Meat Lover's Pizza. It has meatballs, pepperoni, salami, and mushrooms. Very yummy and great textures.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JxHJz36_t_mK0L1vgAfSVQ.text: A recent workplace discussion regarding favorite calzone places in Vegas culminated today in the Calzone Contest.  I brought the Meat Lover's calzone and also the East Coast (a ricotta and mozzarella with garlic) both from Biaggio's.  My friend brought a meat calzone from Grimaldi's and was certain that she would be victorious.  With six self-proclaimed aficionados acting as judges, everyone ate at least one piece from each calzone.  At the end of the day five of the six people determined that Biaggio's was the best calzone they had ever eaten.  Mostly discussed were compliments regarding the crust and the ricotta cheese used, as well as the pepperoni and sausage.  My friend (after quickly conceding defeat) has even decided that Biaggio's will now be her favorite spot and can't wait to try other items on the menu.  Biaggio's has amazing food and top-notch customer service.  That's why I eat there.  I'm thrilled that I was able to introduce four new customers to my favorite pizza place.    Grazie!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. East Coast.  Yummy white calzone.
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat Lover&#39;s packed with a generous serving of meats!

qjuMWan877BkHAwSMEwgDg.text: Great little pizza shop.  You can tell it is run with love and passion!  Nice pizza place atmosphere.  We had fried mushrooms and zucchini which were delicious!  Side salad was refreshing and Hawaiian pizza was great!  Crust is thin and crispy and sauce is tasty!  Would have loved to wash it down with a cold Peroni, but no beer is served.  Will definitely be back to try their desserts next time!

HJo73J8P7lMQmwZ3Xt6cDw.text: Still the best pizza in town!!!! We can never get enough.  We would rather drive 8 miles out of our way than settle for a cheap knockoff!!

t23R8WnoYWvxHiKSbL956A.text: I love this pizza place! Never disappointed with the food or the service!!! My favorite is the meat lovers pizza. The chicken fingers are also pretty tasty!

CJsVIRZMm1uFiwT3K79xuA.text: Came here last minute for dinner on Thursday.  The place was empty except for another customer. Which I personally enjoyed because it meant a peaceful environment.   The girl serving was extremely friendly, helpful, and sweet. She helped make the experience that much better. She showed energy and it made me feel happy to eat there.  The garlic knots were amazing! They were soft, buttery, and fluffy. People definitely need to try it if they at Biaggio's Pizzeria!! We ordered the White Pizza and added chicken. The medium size was more than enough for two people. The pizza was delicious and I will be back for more in the future~  I definitely recommend people check this pizzeria out! (^0^)

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. White Pizza – Mozzarella &amp; Ricotta Cheese, Olive Oil, Garlic Med 12″ $16.99 I added chicken to this pizza.

Txrpbh0B_AWYQXcAseUaug.text: Came with a larger family ordered their Fabulous wings, garlic knots, baked ziti and large pepperoni pizza- shared for a family of six! Have to say their pizza really is better than the New York pizza we had in New York!

xOZovc8RJ0NIZ9QASUzr0A.text: Family owned and you can tell. Customer service at its finest. The owner delivered everything with a smile and we came in almost to closing time. Food is just as good as the service. Fresh ingredients for the pizza and everything cooked when ordered.  Really a great experience. Highly recommend this place

01FE6thxIfv7L5lLV5IQew.text: Just found this place and we love it. It's our new favorite pizza place. Everything is fresh, the homemade ranch is awesome. Garlic knots were fresh and hot and they melt in your mouth. We had the white pizza- excellent! Super friendly, family owned feel.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy white pizza

jw-UHTbYpn51b67B9GQJ_g.text: So,  being new to Las Vegas,  and having a wife with a serious gluten allergy,  we have been seriously dismayed by so many restaurants without a gluten free menu,  or a super skimpy gluten free menu.   We called and were told they had many gluten free options.  Being skeptical based on our experiences so fast,  we decided to take a chance.   It is located in a strip mall,  small and pleasingly intimate with outdoor seating.  As soon as we entered,  there were smiles all around.  We immediately felt welcomed and comfortable.   The menu is awesome,  and they had examples of their menu in a display case.  It looked incredibly delicious,  and smelled amazing. The staff went to great lengths to explain the gluten free options,  and even shared their own story of celiac disease and how it impacted their menu.   We ordered 3 pizzas,  all different and special,  including a gluten free pizza.  The food was  AMAZING!  Great flavor,  perfectly done and obviously made with care.  Most importantly,  my wife's pizza was incredible,  and it was good to see her smile as she ate.    After driving a ways to get there,  we decided it was soooo worth it,  and we will be making them our go to spot for Italian food.  The stromboli looked awesome,  so that will be my next order.  And guess what...THEY DELIVER!!  Even way out to my house!   We are most definitely fans and loyal customers from here on out.

coHaW7higsPMWgKrK_TL4A.text: Went here for lunch today with my brother. Pizza is great and the owner is very friendly.

uuELQ9nDoenn82aEZ4pxgg.text: This place is not like anything I have ever been too!!! So delicious and makes you feel like your right at home! If you haven't been here yet... You need to go

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Alexis enjoying biaggio&#39;s garlic knots for the first time

7XT26wIs-r57P-gEPFo1xg.text: This is currently holds the best pizza place in my eyes. The pizza was perfectly made! I'm glad that this place is only minutes from my house. I highly recommend this place to anyone!

SIldyL8eM1xxDWXoOyrJfw.text: So I've been seeing plenty of check-ins and reviews from my fellow Yelpers (via Yelp App :) of this restaurant that I did not realize was just minutes away from my house. So one night we wanted to try something new and from the sounds of the reviews, this place was a "Must Try" and I have got to say, Yelpers could have never been so damn right!   Our Order:  1 SALAD, Dressings; Blue Cheese, Ranch, Italian. So I am not much of a Blue cheese fan but   1 SUPREME PIZZA. Ok so I'm a NY Style Pizza kinda gal as my husband is a Deep Dish kinda guy, hails from Chicago, but you would have never known that the night we came in! The sauce, as Biaggio says "Is to die for!" and it seriously is!   1 EGGPLANT PARMESAN   1 CANOLI. Never in Vegas have I found a place that does the Canoli RIGHT, til December 11, 2010. Creamy, yummy, make your eyes roll to the back your head--goodness!   I have been in Vegas close to 6 years now and I have not been able to find a quality pizza joint that I can speak so highly about. You can feel the love that Biaggio puts into his restaurant and food. You can taste the freshness, quality but above all, they really do know how to take care of you. You don't feel like a customer, ya start to feel that homely, family feeling that you rarely see these days.   Will we be back? DUH.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggplant Parmesan
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme Pizza, YUMMO!

61CCaF2aUfyTh1Bo0nDeuA.text: I have nothing but wonderful things to say about this place and the owner. I was so impressed by the personal, genuine service and attention my wife and I were given. The food was absolutely delicious and left me totally full and satisfied. We will absolutely be going back and we are so thankful we found this little gem!

u9ZfaHwhuyjfgVruLK9jBA.text: I cannot for the life of me see how this place got 4.5 stars. I have lived all over the US and this is by far the worst pizza place I have ever eaten in. I might as well get a piece of cardboard out of the trash bin and put some ketchup on it. The sauce was bland, noticeable lack of seasoning in general, cheese was not melted enough and the whole pizza fell apart when a slice was picked up. I have yet to find a go to pizza joint in Vegas! Grimaldi's I could give 3.5 stars but not one place could I even give a 4 star rating. If you know of a good pizza joint please message me. I am a pizza fanatic but suffering here in Vegas!

8XczyVxuJ9ntHIkeENblVQ.text: Excellent customer service! It's my first time to order pizza from them. I live in Cali and im here in vegas for the summer staying with my brother. My brother already told me they have the best pizza here in vegas. When i did my order imentioned that i wanted it to be delivered to the clubhouse since me and my other brother who is vacationing from the philippines will be at the pool. It was delivered very fast. Pizza was really really good. We ordered the white pizza with sausage. And one thing that really amazed me was that they also gave us paper plates coz i mentioned we'll be at the pool. I didnt request for it but they are thoughtful enough to give it. Excellent food. Excellent customer service! :)

sF-1lVnYWAwMFUyX5dGRCw.text: FINALLY a pizza place in Vegas that takes pride in what they create. I ordered a large supreme with meatballs spinach and pineapple. Lady on the phone was lovely. Delivery was Fast. Delivery guy was friendly. In fact, technically he delivered to me after they closed. Impressive. The ingredients were like straight from the farmers market. There is genuinely zero reason to order from some generic Pizza Hut, dominoes, papa johns with a place like this in your neighborhood. Outstanding!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Supreme pizza with pineapple and meatball

7vAziFLWDkcEc8hFkcLH5A.text: They are the best pizza place in the whole Las Vegas. This is my first time to post here since I only use Yelp to look for restaurants and just check a good place to go to. I'm a regular customer since I love their Pizza supreme. I've been going to them at least twice a month for the last 7 months. Everytime I order, the service is great and as usual the food is great too! Today, under some unusual circumstances, there was something wrong with my order. I somewhat got the wrong order and I was not able to check what I got before I left. When I got home, I got the wrong pizza.   I called them and was able to talk to John. He apologized and told me he'll deliver the food. But I hesitated and told him I will drive back. As soon as I got there, John gave me my order and apologized. And not just that, he said he voided the charge on my card earlier when I paid and also gave me a $25 dollar gift certificate. I told them they didn't have to. I was not even mad. I will always come back for their food! But they insisted. These guys are amazing! Not only they have the best food but they have the best interest on all their customers. When I went home, I couldn't believe how John (probably he's the owner) was really nice. No wonder all the great reviews here are consistent. By the way, order their chicken wings. It's the best too!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They gave me a gift certificate when it was my mistake that I didn&#39;t check my order. They&#39;re the best!!

5oEXVTQem7NXw6o8-DDOrQ.text: best Pizza ive tasted in 27 years in vegas.just happened to find it on yelp. Everything was great;crust sauce and cheese. Owner makes own sausage for pizza ;it was great.Finally found a great pizza joint.

zbGYZAEDsKUpdIqyeDl3Zw.text: They are very very kind here! And the food is AMAZING!!! The pizza and the salad was fresh and sooo good! Would absolutely recommend!

vaX9gZ2Tg_7lWAe2J5I8ng.text: Absolutely Love The Art of Chicken Pizza. And they let us split the pizza to accommodate our different tastes. Portions and topping are generous. Well worth the 26 mile drive. Wow!  The owner and his staff were some of the nicest people. The decor is comfortable and very clean. Could have used soft music instead of Television for entertainment. But that might just be me. Other than that, it was perfect. Thank you.  It was great meeting you. We will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Very friendly staff. Cozy interior. Television takes away from the charm.  Very clean.
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic knots. Yum!

DwQeR3KLx66mTJHVv-2rEQ.text: Awesome fresh food made to order, clean establishment, great service, great prices. I highly recommend this place, I will be ordering from here again. Had the white pizza with pepperoni and the cheese steak with all extras, can't wait to try everything else.

mopsTtNbK3plLwhPm-hCGg.text: To give credit where it's due I shall. The ordering process was easy online but when I selected option to pay driver upon delivery with my card, the driver arrived not knowing this was the option chosen. Disconnect somewhere.   The email confirmation was prompt, accurate, and even provided a time of arrival. Good info. Pizza arrived a few mins early.   However, I ordered a 16" gluten free pizza with tomato, pineapple, and jalepenos. It was bland, lacking any kind of flavor. Ingredients didn't taste fresh, yet, jalepenos were decent and the cheese was worse than the sauce. Overall not very good.   Sorry guys, I won't order from here again.

mHaq1Wed0W8jRIPrHujXqQ.text: The Best pizza in Las Vegas! Thank you for serving real pizza with love!

qHY6QT8pJfOfdC0zb4uT1A.text: I really wish I could get my money back. I'm an Italian from NJ and I'm not too much of a pizza snob, but I know good pizza. When I pay more than $26 for a 6-piece margherita pizza pie (delivered), I expect it to be at least pretty good. With the reviews this place got, I was incredibly disappointed and really regret my purchase. The mozzerella taste was decent, the sauce was fresh and homemade tasting, but completely lacked salt and garlic. There was so much sauce and so little mozzerella (and tomatoes) that the sauce overpowered the mozzerella and gave the pizza a bland smushed tomato taste. There were like 10 pieces of basil on the whole pizza and they were also completely flavorless (probably not fresh because I grow basil and would use it on homemade margherita pizzas and can always always taste it). The crust of the pizza was tough and did not taste good at all. The pizza was delivered rather quickly but the pizza was cold when I got it. I had to heat up a couple slices for 45 seconds. I definitely do not recommend this place - save your money. Huge regret.

IOMujz7RRds9II_w7Wfqmg.text: Service is excellent & very friendly. Establishment was clean.  Value is good... $5.99 for 2 large slices and a drink.  Pizza is average. We ordered the pineapple & ham slices, which were ok. I ordered the "Art of Chicken" which consisted of diced white meat chicken, artichokes, peppers, garlic and black olives. The picture shown in the restaurant was nothing close to what I got. The toppings were piled on after, on a sauceless cheese slice. I guess this is how they customize each plain slice. What bothered me the most was the smell of dirty dish rag that kept wafting from the pizza or was it the parmesan cheese shaker? It was hard to say. I didn't enjoy it at all, but luckily I did get a backup slice of cheese as my 2nd pick. The cheese slice was good, but swimming in a pool of grease. Be careful not to splash it on your clothing like I happened to do. I wish I enjoyed it more as the people in there were very nice and kept asking, "was it delicious?". I didn't have the heart to say "no...", so I just nodded. There is a certain smell of garlicky sauce, a hot pizza oven, etc. when you first walk into a really good pizza place that unfortunately Biaggio's lacked.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My Art of Chicken didn&#39;t look like this?
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 2 slice lunch special
Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States

wPgaX_A3XYL_mKKLVZIWHw.text: Probably 3.5 stars.  I love pizza.  And I'm no pizza snob.  I can enjoy a good slice of Domino's.  Heck, I'll even wolf down a piece of Little Caesar's if times are tight.  But if I have my choice, it would be high end gourmet pizza (think, Grimadi's, Due Forni).   Overall, I found Biaggio's to be a little greasy for my taste, but the sauce had a great flavor and it is definitely cheaper than the high end pizza places I like to frequent.  We had a pepperoni and mushroom pizza and I was a fan of the crust.  Not too thick, not too thin.  Got a salad too but was nothing to write home about.  My man seemed to enjoy the food, so if you aren't worried about grease, Biaggio's is a great choice!

K5s-kRVJGHblJjaBC4KReA.text: we have lived in Las Vegas for forty plus years and as of late have been somewhat disappointed in the world of pizza.  modern pizzas trying to be all things to all people are just not our "thing".  today (saturday) my wife was tired from a hectic week and work and i suggested that we try for a good pizza one more time.  turning to yelp for help in this matter we came upon Biaggio's.  IT WAS AS PROMISED A FIVE STAR PIZZA.  EXCELLENT IN ALL AREAS.  FROM A BEAUTIFUL CRUST TO PROPERLY SPREAD CHEESE (GRANDE). SAUCING WAS GREAT.  PIZZA WAS HOT.  STAFF WAS FRIENDLY WE LOVED IT!!!!!!!!  our new go to place for pizza.. give it a try....

_S2ilv6rlJq2hnRJ6MeWHg.text: This was the best pizza we have had-such a wonderful variety of things to eat and of the very best ingredients.  LOVE LOVE LOVE the little known "Irish-Italian" Stromboli that is savory and satifying.  The Vegi Salad with artichoke hearts and dried marinated tomatoes if perfect.  The Zepoli is so soft and tender and served perfectly warm with raspberry and white chocolate sauce that it should be eaten first!  If you are not in the mood for that, anything else served here is delish and "to die for" as well with the owner/master chef coming up with new recipes all the time.  Yum!

wk7m5Q70PL9OXvPCTOpYVw.text: Walking into this restaurant i knew it had to be good. After numerous trips to the nearby cosmoprof a few of us decided to finally check it out. we were greeted with nothing but smiles and treated like we were family. This being our first visit to Biaggio's he was more than ecstatic to give us samples of his outrageously delicious meatball sub and his incredible pizza. now normally i am not a fan of thinner pizza but this pizza was truly out of this world. it was cooked to perfection...a crunchy underside yet the cheese and toppings were just so juicy and they balanced out every nicely. if you plan on going here though i truly recommend the meatball sub! it is completely unlike anything you have ever tasted. the meatballs are made from beef, lamb, pork, parmesan and i think even a little love and magic. they were the most incredible things i have ever eaten. also their prices are very reasonable and  taking into consideration that they make EVERYTHING there from SCRATCH it was well worth the price. i definitely plan on going back for the fantastic food and also the wonderful and uplifting personality of mr.biaggio himself.

GzJKbA6gcrKH_wCeMHsU_g.text: maybe we came in on the wrong day and time, but since reviews were so nice and this place is rated 4.5 stars we had our high hopes coming in to pick up our order. first off it was not busy maybe one table and we walked in all excited and not one person said hello. we said hi kindly and excitedly and got a 'hey' from like a bunch of workers staring at us. my bf than says here to pick up  our order? the casher goes, YEAH HOLD ON IM PUTTING SOMETHING IN. dang, sorrrrrrrrry! so we stood there just waiting and minutes later he finally goes whats your name my bf answered steven than he turns to the other faces standing around and tells them to get our order. there was an older man behind us sitting down he looked nice and was prob the owner, he than says hi to us and thanks us for coming in which was cool. but at that point we already felt the extremely rude vibe from everyone working up front. thats the service part, food part i got the antipasto with grilled chicken salad. grilled chicken was extremely overcooked. i could barely bite it very dry. salad wasn't that great either i ended up giving more than half to my dogs (no lie)... pizza wise my bf got half supreme and half pepperoni. him and baby bros said it was pretty good. i had two bites and agree it was decent but at that point the salad already had me feeling effy inside. i ended up eating cereal afters to fulfill my hunger. would not be returning here, sorry!

o7CUsquf6CL5s2-qVCa5_w.text: Well well well....found Biaggio's over the holidays while walking in the cold cold weather in Vegas.. At first I was very skeptical since the pizzeria is off the main road.  Once entering I discovered it was small and had to really read the menu before deciding to order, while spending a good 5-10 minutes deciding I noticed a man standing in the corner waiting and waiting until he was approached by a man who just simply asked "can i help you" the man explained that he ordered a sandwich about 15 mins ago and it still wasn't out.  The  man said oh really went behind the counter and got onto his staff the man's name was the owner "Biaggio" he then returned to the man and stated that his order would be right out, when his order came out Biaggio went to the cash register and returned his money and gave him the order for free....Talk about service WOW!! I then decided to order a pastrami and cheese pizza...All I can say when the order came out was .....IT''S GOOD..Biaggio then came and sat with us while we eat and explained the foundation of this PIZZERA, which was great and even took time out of his busy routine to take a few photos with the folks from Arizona.  I can honestly say that when I return to vegas I'm gonna try the meatballs had a sample and ooooohhhhhh my God they are good..To all the people in Vegas you have a hidden gem that is worth every penny you better get over to Biaggio's Pizzeria and try it you wont be disappointed.

yOJFs38b0Tv5duQ5iw0bOw.text: AWESOME food, even the salad, and I don't normally like salads.  We had lasagna, stromboli, cannoli, garlic knots, it was all delicious.  The meatball stromboli was my favorite.  Very friendly staff.  If we lived in the area we'd definitely be back more for more!

--_UgxmM1jTzgswZLpmwDg.text: Thank you so much for making my husband's birthday party such a wonderful success.  We had the most delicious salad (greek was amazing) pizza (all fantastic) and stromboli (delicious and our 1st time having one)  The owner was so helpful and generous with us and we loved our meal so much.  We look forward to visiting Las Vegas again and having Biaggio's delivered to our hotel room!!!

AVQSLfCqH8eTcxxDG20vsA.text: THIS PLACE is the BOMB! After a year I remembered I owe this pizza place a review. Not only does Biaggios have incredible quality pizzas, they also have the best service of any restaurant I've been to.  About a year ago my friend and I came to pick up an order we had called in.  After arriving and about to pay, we both realized we didn't have enough money to pay for our meal.  I had left my wallet at a different location and immediately was bummed and told them the situation and that I was sorry that we had a pizza made for nothing.  The amazing Good Samaritan behind the counter let us take the pizzas for free!!. I owe this place big time. The pizza was delicious and while in Vegas, it was the only quality pizza I would have. Besides being the BEST pizza in Vegas, it also has the BEST staff I've ever encountered.  I hope my review convinced you to support this pizzeria and once you try it, you will taste what the fuss is all about.  EAT HERE! QUALITY

DtpS-3_CZ5N3rVxC3HfsTQ.text: You have to eat here!! The food is out of this world. The pizza is fantastic, the pasta dishes are outstanding. When they say that this is the best pizza in Las Vegas, believe them. It is THAT good. Biaggio is right there to make sure everything is okay with the food. He really cares about his guests. I tell everyone that when I pass away I want to be buried with a Biaggio's pizza in my casket.

mmc2lS1V1OlN7gYAaRvTgQ.text: If you think Biaggio's is all about pizza, think again!  Besides the side items like the incredible garlic knots (and I mean incredible...don't forget those when you place an order) and the chicken wings, they have amazing subs!  We ordered the Italian sub and loved it!  It has a nice kick to it and a great hint of balsamic that rounds out the flavor.  The sub was very fresh and tasty that there wasn't a spec of it left!  Keep doing what you are doing!!!

sYJeWfxI2raTZeRTjSjZKg.text: Good pizza, excellent service. This was a family-run place - the chicken artichoke and bbq pizza was awesome.

S2I2HgiTtnJy38btDjaQmQ.text: I was just passing through Vegas from Salt Lake with my family and we were in the mood for some pizza, and wow, did we go to the right place. Biaggio treated us like we were family. GREAT GREAT New York style pizza. The wings were great and I'm not even a wing fan. Desserts to die for.  I really recommend this great family pizzeria. Thanks Biaggio!!!!!!

qneQ9uWLFUYvFJWZXxRaKA.text: FABULOUS!! The Sunshine pizza is awesome, the garlic is the best part. =) Thank you Biaggio and Christina and the wonderful cooks!!

zGT8Bl3xesakXShKCUDT-g.text: My husband and I are from NY and have lived in Vegas for 4 years.  We have been on a mission to find the best pizza (closest to NY) possible.  We went to Biaggo's on a Sat afternoon and loved everything the owner gave us.  We order the pizza (which was inexpensive) half onion and half meatball.  The owner actually came and sat with us while we ate.  He brought over a couple meatballs with the best gravy i have had besides my mothers.  For desert he brought over the best zepploes with this raspberry sauce that actually tastes like a jelly donut.  We loved loved loved everything and would suggest this place to anyone.

65x_lmpj5HvhV6g3yMO-hQ.text: Biaggio is a liar! plain and simple, He brags about his family recipe for meatballs! Well they come frozen out of a box from the back of a Sysco food services truck!!! There is NO difference between the meatballs at biaggios and any other meatball delivered by Sysco to any other restaurant in the world. The ONLY difference is the lies that biaggio spreads about how they are a family recipe made by Analisa or whoever, it is all a lie! AND there are cockroaches in the place, if you dont believe that just go around the back of the place and outside the backdoor sitting on the ground are two large gray Ecolab roach baiting stations! Yes biaggio is pretty good at lying through his teeth and making people think he is something special but he is as fake as whatever that thing is that crawled up on his head and died! Yeah Its a cheapshot at a bad rug, but once you see how bad the rug is you can see how pathetic this liar is!!!

STtxaQ2eg3jSg_gorhlcWw.text: do not go here !  they must have their family writing reviews because the pizza I  ordered was cold and inedible.  do not know if they can get a delivery out in less than an hour cause mine was much longer.  this is NOT good new York style pizza, im from Brooklyn and no new Yorker would serve this crap

ILDV5Kni90gn6ZRYVITxuQ.text: Phenomenal pizza, unbelievable garlic knots, and a very friendly atmosphere. If you really like really good, no great pizza, this is the place for you. And chances are if you don't order something, they may give it to you anyway. Order a medium? Get a large instead. Can't guarantee that but that's what happened to us. Outstanding New York pizza!!!!

D1xAXOV-0y3Cth9kwWyZRA.text: it was really really good especially the chicken wings!!!! i'm serious! the meatball pizza was my favorite!! we order couple of different pizzas. and the fried pizza dough w raspberry dip YUMMY!!!! man i ate so much!!  the place was clean and the bathroom smell good!!! CLEAN!

6a8pR_IPneDNi3sZXiAWow.text: I had the distinct pleasure of stopping in at Biaggio's last night based upon the reviews here and I am happy to add my positive review to the list.  As soon as I walked through the door, I was warmly greeted by the owner (Biaggio) who made me feel right at home.  After ordering my cheeze pizza, I sat and chatted with Biaggio who insisted that I try a meatball.  Of course, I graciously accepted and proceeded to eat the most delicioso meatball I've ever had.  It was so good that I asked Biaggio if he wouldn't mind giving me one more to take home for my wife to try.  He did me one better than that and gave me a free meatball sandwich!!  BTW, my wife loved it!! Thank you so much!  The pizza was delicious as well.  Highly recommended!!  I will be trying the cheesesteak next time.

y_T5gMR0QTVcp3R1AdiaNg.text: Good pizza and fantastic service.  This little eatery is definitely worth checking out.

2BZLpBclj_gcsEPmNa1ZIg.text: My daughter really likes the pizza here. Overall they have all been great. Once we added mushrooms to a pizza and they were chopped and it was an overwhelming amount. Extremely too many, we ended up scraping it off. Lesson learned, they are generous with their toppings!   We've had the Philly cheesesteak with French fries and they were both good. Sandwich is extremely greasy, it soaks into the bottom loaf. I've had them less greasy but it expected.   Cheesecakes were pretty good as well.   Customer service is great. Everyone is friendly and delivery is usually sooner than quoted.

503dr7mfO1E3OdK0xPBmpQ.text: We had delivery from here, and it was our first time trying this place.  Food was good! Wings were still nice and crispy.  I had chicken parmesan which was so tender and had a lot of cheese.  Pasta was a little over cooked.  Portion was very large though that I didn't even finish all of it! We also had a cheesesteak sandwich which was good too.  Just wish it came with fries or a side of some kind.  Would definitely order from here again though.

VYiokGQHeLHYXSunt4ifUA.text: 1st timer... 2 slice Lunch special w drink.   Good deal.

7OO_tEvmRm0rnig_mR2iZQ.text: This place is the best. The owner knows my name I go so often. I have never had a problem. The food is amazing. All fresh ingredients.  The first time my friends and I walked in, everyone made us feel like family.   I hope this small business is able to make it!

b15xnaIcjF6Ua8d0ebyWrw.text: We found this hidden gem one night. We tried a variety of food...garlic knots, pizza, spaghetti, wings, and even a philly cheese steak sandwich. All were amazing!  We spent 4 years living in Europe and this restaurant is the real deal! But the best part was how we were treated. They immediately took care of us and talked to us like family. We will definitely be back!

r0THjMcpVED5d_ZDyCkwjQ.text: Went here today to pick up a pizza (my favorite food)  When I called to place the order the person that answered the phone just said: "Hello?" Instead of a proper greeting like most pizza places would offer.  It's not a big deal though because the pizza was really good.  The price was high though... $20 for a 2 topping med. I asked if there was any specials and they said: "No."  I personally like to feel like I'm getting a good deal but no deals on pizza here.  It's all full price.  The pizza was good and was ready on time without having to wait.  For that I'm thankful and may go back some day if I feel like splurging with family or friends that want really good tasting pizza without waiting for a long time.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pizza vs Plate

A35T6Oc7GVvzf73VO_nrTA.text: Second time ordering biaggios. Second review. First review got 4 stars. This pizza joint is kind of amazing. The wings are perfect! Crispy on the outside and tasty and the ranch is yummy too! THE ZEPOLES are ridiculous. Seriously biaggio, why you do me like that? They taste like the best sugary goodness jelly filled frosted covered donuts ever. Even the zepole w/o dipping sauce is really good. And the pizza is just good. We got half meat lover half chicken artichoke. Extra cheese please. Really good. Still think my fave is the supreme tho. Excellent service by the way. Best pizza on this side of twn.

EuVHd-d-pCfsH95jDBjpxA.text: I am not a huge fan of pizza but one bite of a Biaggio slice made me a fan. I picked my own toppings for the pizza and I order the small size and I still had left overs. Fast service. Incredible staff. If you are lucky, you will get to chat with the owner. He's absolutely adorable. Great guy.

CpypDSgCgMSHUxpHngCihA.text: Went to pick up a pizza for national pizza day and wasn't disappointed.  We had a medium which was more than enough for two. Had spinach, green bell peppers, meatballs and ricotta for the pizza toppings it was so good everything tasted fresh. Excited to try all the other yummy things I'm sure they have.

w9rBUOJ-Wo9gdPD_KpZLTA.text: It's pretty good pizza, but it's definitely overpriced, and not good enough to justify a drive longer than 10 minutes. It was a thin crust, and they managed to make it come out not to greasy, and they are fairly generous with the toppings. The crust was just ok. Overall, I liked my pizza, but i was expecting more from a 4.5 Yelp star restaurant.

4ZYwYc0L-v3ipJdccpFnZQ.text: Hands down favorite place in Vegas for many reasons.  The food is amazing!  The price os right  and everyone who works there is AMAZING!  You really can't go wrong!!!  Also having gluten free options is awesome!  My favorite thing is the garlic knots, or the ceaser salad....well really everything I have tried is so good I can't pick a favorite.  Try the meatball sub and the wings too!  I actually have never liked meatball subs until my husband had ne try his!  So so so good!

U2O0p1FPAamqA3oA1ozYxg.text: I feel like I really need to review them again. I don't know how anyone can make a pizza that's so good. The meat lovers pizza absolutely blows me away. They've spoiled me for any other pizzeria. Hands down, the best pizza in Vegas.

rPrKpUvm5IfJOOG8-4EvDw.text: Nastiest pizza I've ever had made me sick for a week couldn't get off the toilet on top of that I paid some crazy price $28.00 for a large pizza delivered never again would I go here or recommend this place to my worst enemy I'm astonished by this crappy place trying to sell garbage

DK7assMkZEuvjZhTkilwxg.text: My son and his basketball team were near Bishop Gorman HS, playing at the FAB 48 Tournament. After the game, we wanted to have a pizza party. I found this little gem on Yelp, just a few miles from the school. This small little pizza joint, hidden in a shopping center, was fabulous. We ordered salads, pizza, wings, and the garlic knots. Everything was made fresh and was delicious. The owner and his workers served us with friendly faces and made sure everything was fine. We were also treated to dessert. I highly recommend this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kids waiting for their food

UsJaMMjBuBTKGdgZfz7xtw.text: Always good food! Never been disappointed with any of the items we've tried! Caesar salad is best I've ever tasted, garlic knots soft and buttery, pizza just the right thickness crust... I could keep going, but really, you gotta try it out for yourself! One of our almost weekly eateries!!

Nvl61DWjZClHWOZenWquFw.text: Yelped for Pizza places....and came across this establishment.....there Pizza is amazing so is there hot wings and there salads are amazing.....had a ceasers salad it was amazing. ....the owner and everyone that worked there was very polite and Friendly. ....definitely worth going to. .....when in Vegas I will be coming back.......

pYfMWz7-L5uLYn_LdplS7Q.text: For 25 years I have been a Metro Pizza snob...until today. Biaggio's is pizza perfection. Cheesy, crispy, melty goodness. We had a meatball, pepperoni and mushroom and it was to-die-for delicious. The caesar salad is simple and tasty, and our order of zucchini chips were made in-house. They have a lot of gluten-free options, and THEY WILL DELIVER TO MOUNTAIN'S EDGE for a pittance of a delivery fee ($4). To top it all off, the owner greeted us and thanked us for visiting, and he sat and chatted with us while we enjoyed his amazing food. Our server was a doll, also.  I am sooooo on this train!

kN_iUz6fOY2OSQjHWyMs0A.text: I am a relocated NYer who knows good pizza when I devour it.  Raves:  Very very impressed with their garlic knots and white sauce pizza with Ricotta, very memorable and delicious. The service was friendly and delightful. The place was clean and comfortable. Their pizza dough is excellent and they do crust really really well. Their homemade Marinara sauce is terrific. Definitely worth visiting and make sure you try the desert. It's big so bring a few people to help you finish it.   Rants: They need to improve their signage for visibility. Both on the pylon and on the front of their storefront.  I was a little disappointed with the veggie calzone. It was cooked well but the veggies were not too cooked - kind of thrown in last minute and it was also light on the cheese. The positive is the size of the medium calzone was huge and I can't even imagine what the large calzone looks like!!!   Bottom line: Good value, good experience ... I will crave your garlic knots and your white pizza.  Thanks!    Phil

RvIKIRg7R5-mi2dVcwN5AA.text: We have eaten here many times, the food and service is amazing every time.  Tried the fettuccini alfredo for the first time today, absolutely the best I have ever had.  Our 7 year old was stealing it off my plate.  My husband is gluten free and he loves their gluten pizza and gluten free cheese balls.  Very happy customer, I tell everyone they have to try it!

diQv02bfJ2BFEQ2PklKTQg.text: Too good!! The owner is one of the nicest people I've met. Seems like a genuine person that just want to take care of his people the right way. Will be back!!

Ewjqlw658bEeTlT6-cfBZw.text: Stopped in for a quick lunch and the service was great, great lunch specials.  Pizza was fresh and made just the way you wanted it.  The house made sausage is great, perfect topping to any pizza.

ZJA9xRQtCbzhWuoFKLL5MQ.text: Monica located biagggio's from Yelp and my husband, and I had a delicious lunch served with a trail of meatballs in sauce with homemade bread, garlic knots w/marinara sauce, hand-tossed pepperoni and grande cheese piazza and the ending was a surprise of friend dough with butter sauce, raspberry sauce.  The whole event was superb.  Biaggio, you need to open a shop just like this one in Citrus Heights, CA.  All our friends would love the food and service just as we did. See you next trip to Las Vegas. Martha Hampton

wSW5zn-ZpL7FaasWwlszVA.text: Came here after a basketball game with 10 little boys and families (here from California). They were more than pleased to accommodate us. Not only did we get the best pizza we received the best service.  The older gentleman came out and spoke with all of us to see if all was good. He was so sweet. He came out with zeppoles and a sugar pizza for dessert for the boys. We left full and satisfied. Great food accompanied by great service.  If your in town and close by, a definite place to check out..Thank you for a great experience

VMAA3k0RC0LyUvXtbJ5I8g.text: 1 of the best pizza places in town. Friendly staff and they have a great deal for 2 slices and a drink.

ELenzgKzn7tpB3ZwXyMZRQ.text: Rarely do I review anything... In fact I never review anything, but Biaggio's has compelled me to take five minutes to write this. This pizzeria deserves 10 stars. Their garlic knots are the best I have ever had, their pizza is AMAZING, and the owner, Biaggio including his staff made  our experience over the top. It makes me happy to know that restaurants like this still exist!!!!!! GO GO GO GO GO

M4bQXI-ZEsagLn7DVml9xg.text: One of the best pizza I've tried in Las Vegas!! I placed order for a delivery online which was very convenience  It took about 40 minutes, considering the distance (about 5miles) it was pretty fast. I ordered meat lover, I loved it.! I usually leave crust when I eat pizza but  I even loved the crust.

FcAdsAqppFcNUqzEkCztzw.text: We had pizza here and it was awesome!  Small place, but great food and service.  Very delicious!  Can't wait to try some of their subs!

s-oHfdo6xDMqilIxtGkfeA.text: Amazing food and amazing people who work here! Love the family atmosphere! And the authentic Italian food! Coming back for sure!

IgugqtR9QKfcOpiiSWn8rg.text: Recommended by the gluten free group here in Las Vegas, I went today for the first time. I am Italian, like North Beach San Francisco second generation. This is as good as it gets. My first bite, sitting across the table from Biaggio who wanted to look in my eyes when I first tasted his marinara, I literally had tears in my eyes. Ten years since I've eaten good ravioli, and this was it. He said he is going to continue to grow his gluten free menu, since he is gluten free himself. This is so special. I will be a regular!

EsJH-5IEplo99qub8QfZqA.text: I can't imagine anyone complaining about this place for any reason whatsoever! We live near the Cannery in North Las Vegas to try this place that we'd heard so much about. It was well worth the drive! The food was amazing! Everything was fresh and tasted delicious! The service was over the top, very friendly and very hospitable! I would reccomend this place to any and everyone who asks for a great pizza!

asxOjgr9RDGJ2zVnI2C0IA.text: Best pizza in Vegas! Family business, if you go to eat there Biaggio will probably come out to chat, really kind guy. If not, they'll deliver anywhere in the whole city. I hardly ever eat salad but I can't help it here. The salads are always so fresh and delicious, but the pizza!!! Gotta try it.

22rzeu7rZBptg3R2HRIQ8g.text: I'm on the fence about what to give this place.  The service was good, the pizza was fine, nothing to write home about.  The garlic knots swam in butter and that was a bit of a turn off.    If I'm in that area, it might be worth a try, but not worth driving cross town for.

7Hv_caMlZNUVsRFE3Uf_cg.text: Great pizza if your looking for something with the "back East" flavor(which I always am!). The owner is SUPER nice and very involved with each guest that comes in. We got a large with bacon & onion, and it was perfect. Overall the menu is a little bare and it's a little pricey, but a must try if your looking for a delicious "pizzeria" style pie.

0_vGBWyDIWfnLYe-I6RsIQ.text: So I am going to once again post about Biaggio's since Yelp hasn't kept my review up.  Well my wife and I have been back to Biaggio's many times now ( 5 times I think) and the food has been great every time!  I read some of the reviews on here complaining about Biaggio increasing the size of food or giving them food while they wait or if they ask how something is!?!?!  Really people this is something to complain about?  I guess I am confused, people saying don't be bought by the owner Biaggio.  Well unless I am confused about the process of business, a business supplies a service, the public enjoys the service and wants more of it, thus returning many times to have the service again.  So by Biaggio giving AMAZING service and product; I am some how selling my soul.  THIS IS WHAT IS SUPPOSE TO HAPPEN AT A RESTAURANT!!!!  I guess some of you Yelpers have had such poor service for so long you have forgotten.  Look it is simple! 1.  AMAZING SERVICE 2.  AMAZING FOOD 3.  OWNER TREATS YOU LIKE FAMILY 4.  GO BACK OFTEN!!! None of this means anything shady is happening.  If I owned a store I would want return customers and for them to tell people about my store, this is good business and what A LOT of restaurants in the Valley could use lessons in.  Stop reading so much into it and go enjoy good food with good people at Biaggio's.  Oh yeah I forgot to mention they deliver ANYWHERE in Vegas...who does that?  How is this not 5 stars.  I also will not try to compare this to pizza in NY or Chicago, it is great pizza in Vegas.  So unless you plan on going 2500 miles for a slice do yourself a favor and don't over think it.  Best pizza in Vegas.  BY FAR THE BEST SERVICE IN VEGAS!

0AL1FwO9bhjFjZ8rwyiPYg.text: Food here is alright. Nothing special. The only reason they get so many 5 star ratings on here is because they give away more food than anyone could possible eat. Yeah, if you want a free mediocre pizza go to biaggios.  When I came in to get my carry out pizza, I was cornered by the owner and he basically begged me to give him a 5 star rating on yelp and tried to bribe me to do so with 2 meatballs and some stale foccacia bread. What ever happened to establishments on here earning their ratings by having FRESH DELICIOUS food - not handing out freebies and bribing their customers with mediocre frozen meatballs and their 5 hour old stale pizza "by the slice"? Call me old fashioned but I believe that you get what you pay for and well, since everything is FREE at biaggios, well you can obviously understand what exactly you get.....

S7w2hMuLo6FRp0ZTwlFBOw.text: Eating in Vegas can be a bit of a challenge with a large group. Following a hockey game, my team was hungry. We stumbled upon this location thanks to Yelp.  The owner was there and they did a great job of serving us quickly and the food was plentiful.   The highlight of the meal was the meatballs. Many reviews have said that it's a great pizza. I thought it was just average but it may be compared to other Vegas places. The toppings were good and the service was outstanding.

ELZXIqOphwRBdtdWTZC1UA.text: This is the best pizza in Vegas and they deliver anywhere in the valley. Now on my speed dial.

photos.caption: Photo of Biaggio's Pizzeria - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Call 911, I eaten so much I can&#39;t move!

yyTBDRYAA3OkOsFTWLvCvA.text: Hmmm....Biaggios. Nice gooey, greasy, chesse pizza for a reasonable price. This place is awesome! Wish I could eat here everyday, but u see my profile pic and see why i can't. Anyway great restaurant though!!!

drUcQpStPkRCIyDAFyzPWw.text: First time visitor. Food was excellent, service was terrific. You gotta love it when the owner of the restaurant greets you when you walk in! The wings were very good and the garlic knots were first rate. Prices were fair. All in all I think they deliver a good value and I will be back.

PLOu9AymadM1PmUlWIPfzw.text: My neighbor recommended this place to me after having their Italian sandwich.  Of course I had to try it, so on my first trip, I ordered the Italian sandwich.  It was very good, and had a generous amount of fine Italian meats and cheeses.  Even had enough left over for my lunch the next day.  I then saw they had zeppoles on their menu.  I LOVE zeppoles...but I am from NY so I had a different expectation, I guess.  Their version was almost raw pizza dough (?) with lots of powdered sugar, and a side of jam.  It tasted nothing like the zeppoles I know and love, but were satisfying in a dough-y, chewy sort of way.  OK, but probably won't order them again.   My next trip, I ordered a medium pizza, with their meatballs and sausage.  Meatballs were amazing, although very thinly sliced.  Sausage had a 'different' flavor, not the normal pizza type sausage I'm used to.  The owner is very friendly, and will offer samples if you want.  Place was busy on the times I have been there, so I think that is a good sign.  Price was a bit higher than I would have liked, but the food and service are a cut above the ordinary pizza places.  I definately will be back to try more items in the future.
